Then I want to join the community of volunteer pilots, to involve into charity flights, medical transport for the sick people, take action in distress situations like earthquakes, flood, forest fires , hurricanes, storms etc. I just want to give a hand in situations where my help is needed. I don't want to be a hero, I want people to know there is someone they can count on when disaster strikes. The courses will take place at a private airfield and will last between 6 and 8 months , starting from the next spring . I will keep you updated back then, with photos and videos . Your help will be very much appreciated, a small contribution would be even better. If there is no possibility for you to back me up, sharing my campaign and spreading the word to as many as you can would be a brilliant idea.

story:
KOTINOS - Experience Ancient Olympia

The first VR learning experience for one of Greece's most prominent archaeological sites. Help us create an educational platform for all. 



From ancient times to the future generations 

The new generation needs new ways to learn. 

KOTINOSvr is a Virtual Reality application that takes you back to the birthplace of the Olympic games, in a 360° interactive environment. 

It brings you face to face with Hermes of Praxiteles and Nike of Paionios. 
It tells the story of one of the seven wonders of the ancient world. 
It invites you to play games and reflect on your experience. 
It brings you in touch with one of the most influential cultures in history.

This is the first of a series of VR learning applications about ancient Greek culture, like never experienced before. 

Be part of it. Help us create an educational platform for all. 

Learning for the digital generation 

Virtual Reality opens up new possibilities for modern education. 

We tend to remember 10% of what we read,
20% of what we here and
90% of what we do or simulate. 

Immersive Virtual reality for learning is about realistic simulations where students of all ages have an active role, make decisions and go through a series of interactive experiences.

This makes learning engaging, exciting and effective. 

Now that Virtual Reality becomes more accessible is the time to create exciting learning experiences for the digital generation. 


Why ancient Olympia? 

Ancient Olympia is a place of outstanding universal value the most celebrated sanctuary of ancient Greece, and the birthplace of the most important athletic event of all times; the Olympic Games.

It is a symbol of peace, fair competition, humanism and a perfect starting point for coming in touch with the ideals of ancient Greece. An inspiration for students of all ages. Inhabited since prehistoric times established in the history of culture as the most important religious, political and sports center with one of the highest concentrations of masterpieces from the ancient Greek world a milestone in the history of art a unique universal symbol of peace and competition at the service of virtue demonstrates above all the lofty ideals of Hellenic humanism: peaceful and loyal competition between free and equal men... with their only ambition being the symbolic reward of an olive wreath 

Source: http://whc.unesco.org/en/list/517


The world of ancient Greece is an exciting subject matter, that offers valuable lessons and leaves room for thought and reflection.



Why Crowdfunding?

We are a startup based in Athens and since 2014 we have worked on Virtual Reality. 

We want to make our country's heritage accessible to all and specifically the digital generation, in an engaging way that speaks their language.

We started designing KOTINOSvr in April 2015. Bureaucracy, capital controls and the unstable environment in Greece didn't stop us from keeping our dream alive.

We have managed to receive the necessary approvals by the Central Archaeological Museum of the Greek Ministry of Culture, for the development of the project (and we are proud of that). 


Now we are ready to make KOTINOSvr a reality. 

The size and the expansion of KOTINOSvr creates new needs for human resources, software and hardware which we cannot afford.

Given the universal nature of the project as an educational platform we decided to bring this idea to the public. 

All we need is your support. 

Why support us? 

It's for a good cause. 

For the first time the treasures and ideals of ancient Greece will be experienced through Virtual Reality. 

KOTINOSvr will be available for free to all public schools around the world. 

Your support means that students of all ages will experience and learn about one of the most influential cultures in history, in a way never done before. 

You will help in spreading the ideals of ancient Greece to the modern world.

In addition, you will be among the first to experience KOTINOSvr. 

In a world shaped by digital culture, it's our responsibility to provide future generations, with knowledge that truly matters.


KOTINOSvr: The Experience 

KOTINOSvr takes you through Virtual Reality at the birthplace of the Olympic Games, in a feel-like real, interactive experience. 

A virtual guide to the treasures of ancient Olympia's archaeological museum, complemented with fun educational activities inspired by the exhibits, the Olympic games and ancient Greek culture. 

An exciting learning experience, designed for the digital generation and students of all ages. 

Here are some of the application's features and content to get you in the mood. 




Main features

  • 360° environment for an immersive experience 
  • Full 3D Scanned Rooms give a real-life feeling 
  • HDR Physical Based Textures for exceptional quality in images 
  • 3D models of selected exhibits for better understanding 


Virtual Tour

You choose how to live it. 

Text: Read the story of each exhibit 

Audio: Audio narration of the tour

Video: Take a full 360° video tour inside the museum

Avatar: Let Athena, our owl avatar guide you 


Will be available in Greek and English and with a view to expanding the information to the 10 most popular languages in the world.


Fun Educational Experiences

Mixing education with entertainment to evaluate, reflect and expand knowledge. 

Check your knowledge: Take a quiz after your visit in each room and reflect on what you've just experienced. 

Recreate the masterpieces: Find parts of selected exhibits, piece them together and get extra information. 

Discover the stories: Find hidden Greek words, learn their meaning and unlock stories about the ancient Olympic Games and their ideals. 

Learn more: Interactive quizzes about the ancient Olympic Games and life in ancient Olympia. 

Paint the exhibits: Interact with some of the museum findings and paint them with your own colours. 


Gamification

To maximise enjoyment and inspire students to continue learning.

Collect olive wreaths, for every completed activity. 

Get a gold, silver or bronze olive wreath, depending on your overall performance. 

See your name on KOTINOS Wall of Fame. 


Reflection and Evaluation

Both teachers and students can save their progress on the online version of the app.

Teachers can access results for each student, comment on their performance and give them tips to continue. 


How does it work?

Simple as that. 

KOTINOSvr can be accessed through any desktop or latest mobile device (laptop, tablet, smartphone). 

For the full VR experience you can use the following VR devices:

  • Oculus Rift
  • Samsung Gear VR
  • Google Cardboard
  • HTC Vive
  • and more


Virtual Reality devices are now becoming accessible to more. Let's use this technology to create exciting learning experiences for the digital generation.


Use of funds

Our budget will mostly go on human resources. We have set up a team of 3D designers, 360° photographers, programmers, educators, copywriters and translators, ready to make KOTINOSvr a reality. 

The rest of the budget will go on the necessary hardware and software equipment. 


Schedule 

We will need approximately 8 months to complete the application since we have the funds. 

We will let you know on our progress on every step of the procedure. 


Future expansions

Once we complete KOTINOSvr, we will ask your opinion on what to do next and shape our next project together.

Our main ideas up to now: 

  • Take the experience to the whole archaeological site of ancient Olympia. 
  • Concentrate on educational experiences around the ancient Olympic games, where the users participate in the games.
  • Create a representation of life in ancient Olympia and the Olympic Games. 
  • Go for the next Greek archaeological site of outstanding value; Acropolis, Delphi, Knossos, Myceane, to name a few.

How can you help? 

There are two ways: 

(1) Back it! 

Become a backer and be among the first to get KOTINOSvr on its release. 

(2) Share it 

Share our story with people or organisations you think are interested in KOTINOSvr. 

Let your local schools, colleges, universities and educators know about it. 

Share our campaign on your social media channels. 

Connect with us on Facebook and Twitter and share our content. 


Meet the founders

Now you know about the project, let us introduce you to our core team.

More people are coming in soon.

Dimitris Christodoulou / CEO / V

Founder of SpinAround and initiator of the project.
360° photographer since 2009.
Culture enthusiast, tech believer, never giving up attitude.

Takis Papadopoulos / Dev / R

The guy that makes ideas a reality.
Experience in 3D design, development, Virtual reality.
Never stops learning. 


We want to hear from you 

Whether you can back this project or not, if you have an interest in high-end learning experiences about ancient Greece, we want you to stay in touch. 

Follow us on our social media channels and join our discussions. 

Look out for the hashtags #KOTINOSvr and #LearningGreece.

Get involved: If you have an idea about an educational experience, a game or additional features for our application, let us know at ideas@kotinosvr.com


Press

Email info@kotinosvr.com for more information or to arrange an interview with a team member. 


Problem backing us? Please contact support@indiegogo.com.
story_txt:
KOTINOS - Experience Ancient Olympia
The first VR learning experience for one of Greece's most prominent archaeological sites. Help us create an educational platform for all. 




From ancient times to the future generations 
The new generation needs new ways to learn. 
KOTINOSvr is a Virtual Reality application that takes you back to the birthplace of the Olympic games, in a 360° interactive environment. 
It brings you face to face with Hermes of Praxiteles and Nike of Paionios. 
It tells the story of one of the seven wonders of the ancient world. 
It invites you to play games and reflect on your experience. 
It brings you in touch with one of the most influential cultures in history.
This is the first of a series of VR learning applications about ancient Greek culture, like never experienced before. 
Be part of it. Help us create an educational platform for all. 







Learning for the digital generation 

Virtual Reality opens up new possibilities for modern education. 
We tend to remember 10% of what we read, 
  20% of what we here and 
  90% of what we do or simulate. 
Immersive Virtual reality for learning is about realistic simulations where students of all ages have an active role, make decisions and go through a series of interactive experiences.
This makes learning engaging, exciting and effective. 
Now that Virtual Reality becomes more accessible is the time to create exciting learning experiences for the digital generation. 


Why ancient Olympia? 
Ancient Olympia is a place of outstanding universal value the most celebrated sanctuary of ancient Greece, and the birthplace of the most important athletic event of all times; the Olympic Games.
It is a symbol of peace, fair competition, humanism and a perfect starting point for coming in touch with the ideals of ancient Greece. An inspiration for students of all ages. Inhabited since prehistoric times established in the history of culture as the most important religious, political and sports center with one of the highest concentrations of masterpieces from the ancient Greek world a milestone in the history of art a unique universal symbol of peace and competition at the service of virtue demonstrates above all the lofty ideals of Hellenic humanism: peaceful and loyal competition between free and equal men... with their only ambition being the symbolic reward of an olive wreath 
Source: http://whc.unesco.org/en/list/517
The world of ancient Greece is an exciting subject matter, that offers valuable lessons and leaves room for thought and reflection.



Why Crowdfunding?
We are a startup based in Athens and since 2014 we have worked on Virtual Reality. 
We want to make our country's heritage accessible to all and specifically the digital generation, in an engaging way that speaks their language.
We started designing KOTINOSvr in April 2015. Bureaucracy, capital controls and the unstable environment in Greece didn't stop us from keeping our dream alive.
We have managed to receive the necessary approvals by the Central Archaeological Museum of the Greek Ministry of Culture, for the development of the project (and we are proud of that). 
Now we are ready to make KOTINOSvr a reality. 
The size and the expansion of KOTINOSvr creates new needs for human resources, software and hardware which we cannot afford.
Given the universal nature of the project as an educational platform we decided to bring this idea to the public. 
All we need is your support. 



Why support us? 
It's for a good cause. 
For the first time the treasures and ideals of ancient Greece will be experienced through Virtual Reality. 
KOTINOSvr will be available for free to all public schools around the world. 
Your support means that students of all ages will experience and learn about one of the most influential cultures in history, in a way never done before. 
You will help in spreading the ideals of ancient Greece to the modern world.
In addition, you will be among the first to experience KOTINOSvr. 


In a world shaped by digital culture, it's our responsibility to provide future generations, with knowledge that truly matters.


KOTINOSvr: The Experience 
KOTINOSvr takes you through Virtual Reality at the birthplace of the Olympic Games, in a feel-like real, interactive experience. 
A virtual guide to the treasures of ancient Olympia's archaeological museum, complemented with fun educational activities inspired by the exhibits, the Olympic games and ancient Greek culture. 
An exciting learning experience, designed for the digital generation and students of all ages. 
Here are some of the application's features and content to get you in the mood. 

Main features


 360° environment for an immersive experience 

 Full 3D Scanned Rooms give a real-life feeling 


HDR Physical Based Textures for exceptional quality in images 

 3D models of selected exhibits for better understanding 




Virtual Tour
You choose how to live it. 
Text: Read the story of each exhibit 
Audio: Audio narration of the tour
Video: Take a full 360° video tour inside the museum
Avatar: Let Athena, our owl avatar guide you 
Will be available in Greek and English and with a view to expanding the information to the 10 most popular languages in the world.


Fun Educational Experiences
Mixing education with entertainment to evaluate, reflect and expand knowledge. 
Check your knowledge: Take a quiz after your visit in each room and reflect on what you've just experienced. 
Recreate the masterpieces: Find parts of selected exhibits, piece them together and get extra information. 
Discover the stories: Find hidden Greek words, learn their meaning and unlock stories about the ancient Olympic Games and their ideals. 
Learn more: Interactive quizzes about the ancient Olympic Games and life in ancient Olympia. 
Paint the exhibits: Interact with some of the museum findings and paint them with your own colours. 


Gamification
To maximise enjoyment and inspire students to continue learning.
Collect olive wreaths, for every completed activity. 
Get a gold, silver or bronze olive wreath, depending on your overall performance. 
See your name on KOTINOS Wall of Fame. 


Reflection and Evaluation
Both teachers and students can save their progress on the online version of the app.
Teachers can access results for each student, comment on their performance and give them tips to continue. 


How does it work?
Simple as that. 
KOTINOSvr can be accessed through any desktop or latest mobile device (laptop, tablet, smartphone). 
For the full VR experience you can use the following VR devices:


Oculus Rift


Samsung Gear VR


Google Cardboard


HTC Vive


and more






Virtual Reality devices are now becoming accessible to more. Let's use this technology to create exciting learning experiences for the digital generation.


Use of funds
Our budget will mostly go on human resources. We have set up a team of 3D designers, 360° photographers, programmers, educators, copywriters and translators, ready to make KOTINOSvr a reality. 
The rest of the budget will go on the necessary hardware and software equipment. 



Schedule 
We will need approximately 8 months to complete the application since we have the funds. 
We will let you know on our progress on every step of the procedure. 


Future expansions
Once we complete KOTINOSvr, we will ask your opinion on what to do next and shape our next project together.
Our main ideas up to now: 


 Take the experience to the whole archaeological site of ancient Olympia. 

 Concentrate on educational experiences around the ancient Olympic games, where the users participate in the games.

 Create a representation of life in ancient Olympia and the Olympic Games. 

 Go for the next Greek archaeological site of outstanding value; Acropolis, Delphi, Knossos, Myceane, to name a few.





How can you help? 
There are two ways: 
(1) Back it! 
Become a backer and be among the first to get KOTINOSvr on its release. 
(2) Share it 
Share our story with people or organisations you think are interested in KOTINOSvr. 
Let your local schools, colleges, universities and educators know about it. 
Share our campaign on your social media channels. 
Connect with us on Facebook and Twitter and share our content. 


Meet the founders
Now you know about the project, let us introduce you to our core team.
More people are coming in soon.



Dimitris Christodoulou / CEO / V

Founder of SpinAround and initiator of the project.
360° photographer since 2009.
Culture enthusiast, tech believer, never giving up attitude.
Takis Papadopoulos / Dev / R
The guy that makes ideas a reality.
Experience in 3D design, development, Virtual reality.
Never stops learning. 


We want to hear from you 
Whether you can back this project or not, if you have an interest in high-end learning experiences about ancient Greece, we want you to stay in touch. 
Follow us on our social media channels and join our discussions. 
Look out for the hashtags #KOTINOSvr and #LearningGreece.
Get involved: If you have an idea about an educational experience, a game or additional features for our application, let us know at ideas@kotinosvr.com
Press
Email info@kotinosvr.com for more information or to arrange an interview with a team member. 

Problem backing us? Please contact support@indiegogo.com.

story:
This campaign has been cancelled and funders can anticipate a refund.

Fiona, Ginno, Annalise and Ray make up the team at Moray Firth Media Trust (MFMT). We are a Charitable, Not-for-Profit organisation (SC028658) based in Inverness and we provide training in radio skills and digital media to our local community.
This project is for the Primary kids of Inverness, designed for 7, 8 or 9 year olds to give them an early knowledge of radio, broadcasting, research, script writing, sound creation and all the skills involved in creating their own radio show. The shows are based around the class' term topic, click here to hear a sample of the work produced from the pilot project.
Delivered in school, we aim to increase confidence, motivation, learning and to inspire a generation into the world of media, broadcasting and digital technology. By supporting our campaign you will help enable us to deliver this project to over 25 of the primary schools in and around Inverness. That's over 600 children and having seen the success of the pilot project we can't wait to make this happen!
This course is run for 2 hours a week over 6 weeks and the children are awarded a certificate at the end of the course to evidence their achievements in learning, confidence, contribution etc. The school will also receive a copy of their final radio show. 
We run Monster FM 106.1 as part of our MFMT training services. This is a Restricted Service License that runs for just one month every September and this year the two pilot projects will be played out on air to those in Inverness and online. We hope that this could be the case for all the work produced through this primary school project in future years. 
As a Not-for-Profit organisation we are reliant on funding and at this moment in time the funds available are limited and we are unable to pursue this project we feel so passionately about.

What We Need & What You Get

The funding will pay for staff and trainers' time, resources, and business overheads. For us to run this project for up to 25 schools at a cost of £2500 per school we really need your support; in fact we can't do it without you! If we could achieve our targets we would be able to help to educate over 600 young children in a variety of media and digital skills for life.

Our perks are as follows:

£10+ - Personalised thank you e-mail

£50+ - As above and a mention on our web page

£100+ - As above and name mention on student certificates. 

£200+ Social Media Thank You, a mention on our web page, E-mail link to a digital download of a final show production.

If we don't reach our goal then please be assured that we will endeavour to put your funds towards this project catering for the number of schools the final funding allows. Any amount raised could be put together with other funding applications to try to fulfil this project or to ensure the continuation of the Trust and the training that we do within the community. 

The Impact

If successful, the potential impact of this campaign is immeasurable to us. Not only would we be able to run this project in Inverness but we would hope to be able to create a format for the work that we do and to license this for sale to other organisations, schools or individuals. This in turn would be income generating but as a Not for Profit Trust any money made would be put back into the business to offer the same project further afield or additional projects to other disadvantaged or community groups in and around Inverness. We ran a hugely successful pilot project as demonstrated in the video and the radio shows produced but we need to secure funds to be able to offer this service to all other schools. In addition we hope to be able to obtain other funders or sponsors for additional projects and to ensure the continuation of Moray Firth Media Trust during difficult funding and economic times. We feel that the training we deliver is invaluable to the community but we can't offer these services without your support.

Risks & Challenges

Moray Firth Media Trust has been established for over 18 years but not without fairly continuous funding struggles! We have the ability to offer a wide range of Media and Broadcasting courses and as an organisation we are constantly having to adapt and evolve to fit with our funders' requirements and the needs of the community. It costs approximately £150,000 per year to run the Trust and as a Not for Profit organisation there are always financial risks and obstacles to ensure our continuation. Other funding streams or sponsors still need to be sourced, but securing money from this campaign will help enable us to run this project and to sustain the business.

In addition to the Primary School project we hope to be able to continue with the variety of courses offered at Moray Firth Media Trust. These include one day courses in Introduction to Radio, Feature Making, Digital Editing and Building a Radio Show. We also offer two week intensive courses in Radio Broadcasting, a VQ in radio broadcasting and bespoke digital media courses to various community groups and within secondary schools, prison services etc.

Other Ways You Can Help

We really need your help so please support us in anyway you can. If you can't contribute then perhaps you may know someone who can and we would be grateful if you could forward these details on to them!

Thanks for taking the time to read this!

story:
Enter the Surgical Training Future with DOKit+

The surgical training future is nothing less than an App (iOS and Android), a synthetic skin pad and augmented reality.  Easy to use and flexible to your daily plans, all at an unbelievably affordable price. Enjoy surgical training like never before.

 

Surgical Training? Was also our Problem

There are over 20 million students involved in medical fields worldwide, who have the same goal: practicing. If you are one of those or even a young medical professional, you know that, in the medical field, practice is never enough. 

This was what pushed us when we met, as medical students. We had your same problem and we wanted to find something better than the actual supports to learn knots and surgical sutures.

 

 

DOKSkin is where we started

Almost 4 years ago we have created a synthetic skin support, a real one that gives REAL FEEDBACK and is tested for over 300 sutures! 

 

 

Our deal: Augmented Reality

After 4 successful years of courses, organized on our synthetic skin support, we decided to make one step further. In our experience, the most important aspect of practical learning is the chance to have constantly coherent and validated information. Unfortunately having one-to-one tutors is not very affordable.

That's why we thought: "Why not to use technology instead!". Something that nowadays everyone has, a smartphone. 

Using the included augmented reality headset and our App (iOS & Android), DOKit+ transform your smartphone in the perfect and affordable learning platform. 

 

 

LETS COMPARE

 

 

 

Everywhere you want

We know that nowadays people are always on the way, that's why our device is lightweight and portable. Learn and practice at home, at university or in the library, literally everywhere. 

Every time you wish

A student or a young doctor schedule is very variable, that's not a problem because with DOKit+ the exercise sessions can be paused every time you want so that you will be able to start today and finish when you have time.

 

 

WHY WE NEED YOUR SUPPORT

Our DOKit+ is not a rendering, it's reality and many have tried it already. We need you to back us for three simple reasons:

  • To develop the final version of our App (iOS & Android), currently in beta version
  • To produce it in large number so that we can keep the price "student-friendly"
  • Most important, to give us the chance to develop future applications in the medical field

 

REWARDS SUM-UP

 

 

 

OUR ROADMAP

story:
OUR STORY

Freda Thomas, MBA,  CEO/Founder of the Academy4Entrepreneurs, is a serial entrepreneur. She is also a New York State Certified Business Advisor with extensive experience in helping businesses become more efficient and effective at running a business. Thomas has created original content curriculum and facilitated 100's of courses in entrepreneurship. Thomas designed Academy4Entrepreneurs so that aspiring entrepreneurs can take courses in a fun interactive environment while learning how to avoid the pitfalls associated with starting a business. Courses are taught online by experienced, successful entrepreneurs. 

The online training modules will include components of Freda's prior course content as well as exercises to exemplify the experiences of the participating expert entrepreneurs. A4E comprises a team of six individuals: Freda Thomas, CEO/Founder, Karen Kellman, Social Media/Crowdfunding, Felicia Mann, Operations and Outreach Coordinator, Zakeyah Bennett, Outreach Coordinator, Jimmy Newson, Expert Entrepreneur Instructor and Videographer for the project, Daniel Bellizio, Esq., Expert Entrepreneur Legal Formations, and seven-year old Jordan Mann, official spokesperson and Secretary in Training. Click here to learn more about team A4E. You can also learn more by visiting our Facebook page 

We have several of our expert entrepreneurs already on board for the beta roll out.  We're in the process of finalizing agreements with additional course instructors.

Expert Entrepreneurs

 

 

"Evidence shows that job growth and the U.S. economy will never return to 2008 pre-recession labor market conditions.”-Washington Center for Equitable Growth. According to the Department of Labor Statistics, more than 2 million people quit their jobs in 2013. Why are so many people quitting? 1) They don’t like their boss. 2) The lack of empowerment, 3) Internal politics, and, 4) Lack of recognition.  In the past, a corporate job provided promotions and ultimately retirement with 401K savings and pensions. Those days are over!  Don’t find fault and blame others. Do something by learning about business ownership. If you or someone you know feels destined to start a business, it’s time to ask, if not now, when will I start my own business?

 

A4E includes a mission driven component where courses include sign language interpretation and 508 software. 508 software insures access by individuals with disabilities so that they too can learn to fulfill their dreams of business ownership. Inclusion for all is paramount so that we can begin to reduce barriers to success for Everyone!

What We Need

Your contribution of $25, $75, $200, or $400 will help us get the beta version of A4E up and running.

& What You Get

Imagine - entire generations of business owners who are creating jobs and strengthening the economy. It’s possible!!!!

Our crowdfunding fundraising goal achievable is $20,000!

At $20,000 we can get the beta version of A4E up and running. Without the $20,000, we won’t be able to create the leaning portal in beta, and individuals interested in business ownership will be forced to try and figure out on their own how to avert failure in business.

At $40,000,we can include five additional courses: 1)Strategic Growth Procedures, 2)Process Mapping, 3) Best Operational Practices, 4)Succession planning 5)Exiting, sign language interpretation and  508 software. 

 

Our crowdfunding perks:

  1. $25.00-I just want to support this initiative
  2. $75.00-Attend the pre-launch networking event and meet the A4E community and participating entrepreneurs who will provide course instruction.
  3. Gold level-$200.00-Access the Academy4Entrepreneurs website pre-beta (pre-beta is an intermediate stage, provided to a select few, and available for a select number of days)
  4. Platinum level -$400-Pre-launch –Receive individual coaching with an industry expert entrepreneur. This level also includes pre-launch access to training material to the course of your choosing (a special selection of expert entrepreneurs will be available for this exclusive service which will only be provided to a select few). Platinum level also includes those perks listed at $75.00 and Gold level.

We're a fixed campaign on Indiegogo.  That means contributors are charged right away but will be refunded if we don't reach your goal. 

The Impact

Strong evidence indicates that enterprise education increases the opportunity to get started in business.  At A4E, participants will learn the importance of managing their financials, as well as how to develop superior products and services. Each course will focus on goal setting and learning how to adapt those goals based on market conditions and other factors. Having expert entrepreneurs available, helps to minimize the guesswork associated with having a successful launch.  Entrepreneurship is a legitimate alternative to being a wage earner. When entrepreneurship flourishes, families, communities, society as a hold becomes the benefactor.

Risks & Challenges

To help us mitigate risk, the A4E team has instituted Google Analytics for tracking engagement. Participant questionnaires are implemented to stay in touch with the end user's needs, likes and dislikes.  Monitoring and addressing challenges as they arise, helps to diffuse an avalanche of challenges coming upon us all at once. The objective  - recognize a problem as soon as we are made aware of it and fix it.  Academy4Entrepreneurs also has the privilege of a strong business advisory team which includes affluent entrepreneurs who are experienced in launching similar platform's as A4E's.

Other Ways You Can Help

You can help spread the word by identifying the best places on social media where individuals are talking about starting a business. There are several groups trending on Twitter under #starting a business. If you know someone with disabilities who is interested in starting a business, please invite them to follow us on social media. Post weekly comments on Facebook and Twitter at @A4Entrepreneurs. Know someone who works in the media? Kindly make an introduction. You can do so via email message to Freda at freda@academy4entrepreneurs.com. We LOVE  free press. Our mission – “Imagine an entire generation of entrepreneurs.” It’s possible.

Imagine - entire generations of business owners who are creating jobs and strengthening the economy. It’s possible!!!!
Our crowdfunding fundraising goal achievable is $20,000!


At $20,000 we can get the beta version of A4E up and running. Without the $20,000, we won’t be able to create the leaning portal in beta, and individuals interested in business ownership will be forced to try and figure out on their own how to avert failure in business.

At $40,000,we can include five additional courses: 1)Strategic Growth Procedures, 2)Process Mapping, 3) Best Operational Practices, 4)Succession planning 5)Exiting, sign language interpretation and  508 software. 

 
Our crowdfunding perks:

$25.00-I just want to support this initiative
$75.00-Attend the pre-launch networking event and meet the A4E community and participating entrepreneurs who will provide course instruction.
Gold level-$200.00-Access the Academy4Entrepreneurs website pre-beta (pre-beta is an intermediate stage, provided to a select few, and available for a select number of days)
Platinum level -$400-Pre-launch –Receive individual coaching with an industry expert entrepreneur. This level also includes pre-launch access to training material to the course of your choosing (a special selection of expert entrepreneurs will be available for this exclusive service which will only be provided to a select few). Platinum level also includes those perks listed at $75.00 and Gold level.

We're a fixed campaign on Indiegogo.  That means contributors are charged right away but will be refunded if we don't reach your goal. 
The Impact
Strong evidence indicates that enterprise education increases the opportunity to get started in business.  At A4E, participants will learn the importance of managing their financials, as well as how to develop superior products and services. Each course will focus on goal setting and learning how to adapt those goals based on market conditions and other factors. Having expert entrepreneurs available, helps to minimize the guesswork associated with having a successful launch.  Entrepreneurship is a legitimate alternative to being a wage earner. When entrepreneurship flourishes, families, communities, society as a hold becomes the benefactor.
Risks & Challenges
To help us mitigate risk, the A4E team has instituted Google Analytics for tracking engagement. Participant questionnaires are implemented to stay in touch with the end user's needs, likes and dislikes.  Monitoring and addressing challenges as they arise, helps to diffuse an avalanche of challenges coming upon us all at once. The objective  - recognize a problem as soon as we are made aware of it and fix it.  Academy4Entrepreneurs also has the privilege of a strong business advisory team which includes affluent entrepreneurs who are experienced in launching similar platform's as A4E's.

Other Ways You Can Help
You can help spread the word by identifying the best places on social media where individuals are talking about starting a business. There are several groups trending on Twitter under #starting a business. If you know someone with disabilities who is interested in starting a business, please invite them to follow us on social media. Post weekly comments on Facebook and Twitter at @A4Entrepreneurs. Know someone who works in the media? Kindly make an introduction. You can do so via email message to Freda at freda@academy4entrepreneurs.com. We LOVE  free press. Our mission – “Imagine an entire generation of entrepreneurs.” It’s possible.

story:
Short Summary

It is important to train up a child in the way he/ she should go starting early age. Children at early age learn from their hearts. Early age is very vital age to lay foundation in a child's belief, value and character.

Fikir Media has been reaching gospel for kids through it’s Sunday school website and Facebook page “መጽሃፍ ቅዱስ ለልጆች - Gospel for Kids” We need your support for the successful completion of our works. With your contribution the entire project will achieve the following:-

  1. Build Sunday school website containing eBook with audio, videos, teacher’s guide and learning games
  2. Publish hard copy children's Pentateuch bible story and activity book

​

The Impact

Many Ethiopian parents and Sunday schools lack quality teaching resources for their children. By supporting this project you can make an impact to:

  • Children can enjoy learning using colorful book, videos and fun activities
  • Parents and teachers get structured lesson with activity works, teaching guide and tips, verse study, videos and quizzes

    Project Outcome

    For any amount of fund raised e-version of the children bible will be produced and delivered to contributors by December 2017.

    However, Minimum funding of 13,000€ required for printing hard copy book.

     

    What we have already prepared

    1. Children bible Pentateuch story (from creation up to Moses) with learning activities 

     

     

    2. Access on the website containing e-book with audio + videos  +  quiz games  + teacher’s guide

    Preview website CLICK HERE

    Watch website preview video below:-

     
     

    What is already completed in the project

    • Colorfully designed children bible with activity exercises
    • Website platform consisting e-books+audio, videos, and quiz

     

    What is currently being produced 

    • Teacher's guide on website
    • Quiz games on website per every lesson plan
    • Videos per every lesson plan
    • Publishing the hard copy book
    • Distribution to users

     

    What We Need & What You Get

    We need

    The financial requirement and cost breakdown is as shown in the graph below:-

     

    Products you get per donation:-

    You can contribute to the project as an individual or a church. If the minimum required budget for printing hard copy book is raised - the products sent will include the hard copy book. In case of shortage of fund e-version of all of the e-products with the amount specified according to your donation will be provided for our backers.

    • One e Book:- For your contribution of up to 50€ you will receive the children bible story and activity ebook
    • One e Book & WEB:- For your contribution of up to 100€ you will receive one children bible story and activity eBook and Access on our website to e-version of book with audio + videos  +  quiz games  + teacher’s guide
    • Two e Books & WEB:- For your contribution of up to 200€ you will receive two children bible story and activity eBook and Access on our website to e-version of book with audio + videos  +  quiz games  + teacher’s guide
    • Three e Books & WEB:- For your contribution of up to 300€ you will receive three children bible story and activity eBook and Access on our website to e-version of book with audio + videos  +  quiz games  + teacher’s guide
    • Seven e Books & WEB ACCESS:- For your contribution of up to 500€ you will receive package containing seven copies of children bible story and activity eBook and Access on our website to e-version of book with audio + videos  +  quiz games  + teacher’s guide
    • 15 e Books & WEB ACCESS:- For your contribution of up to 1000€ you will receive package containing 15 copies of children bible story and activity eBook and Access on our website to e-version of book with audio + videos  +  quiz games  + teacher’s guide
    • 35 e Books & WEB ACCESS:- For your contribution of up to 2000€ you will receive package containing 35 copies of children bible story and activity eBook and Access on our website to e-version of book with audio + videos  +  quiz games  + teacher’s guide
    • 100 e Books & WEB ACCESS:- For your contribution of up to 5000€ you will receive package containing 100 copies of children bible story and activity eBook and Access on our website to e-version of book with audio + videos  +  quiz games  + teacher’s guide
    • DONATION CERTIFICATE:- Give donation of any amount you wish to the project to receive donation certificate or gift card.

     

      Risks & Challenges

      The content preparation and prototyping of the project is complete. It has been tested with kids, parents and Sunday school teachers. Only polishing design, doing the publishing works and send for printing house is remaining. For the successful completion of the project, we will need to raise minimum of fund €13,000 required to the cover the publishing, printing and shipping.

      If the minimum required amount is not obtained, we will still give access to the e-book with audio and web access to quiz, videos and teacher's guide. We have a great, enthusiastic team and a good, sensible plan!

       

      Other Ways You Can Help

      If you just can't contribute money, it doesn't mean you can't help:

      • Please help us to get the word out and make some noise about our campaign.
      • Please follow, share and give us your likes or constructive feedback.
      • Partner with our vision by contributing small amount (5€, 10€, 20€ or 50€) CLICK HERE

       

      Connect with us through:-

      • Facebook - CLICK HERE
      • Our Website - CLICK HERE
      • Give us your Feedback through :- CLICK HERE
      • Partner with us by donating (5€, 10€, 20€ or 50€):- CLICK HERE

story:
Who We Are

 

STEMLabs is a nonprofit organization that promotes student engagement in the STEM (science, technology, engineering and math) fields. We believe it is critically important for kids to explore, create, play, and make, in order to learn about the world around them. We believe that students learn best when they are engaged in fun, challenge-based, hands-on learning experiences that connect the school curriculum to the real world in tangible and meaningful ways.

To do so we offer highly interactive after school programs in robotics, 3d printing, programming, science and math, to a variety of age groups, focusing on early childhood education.

We embrace a Growth Mindset and believe that every child can and should be literate in the domains of Science, Technology, Engineering and Mathematics.

Given our belief that every child deserves a well-rounded, connected, and meaningful learning experience, we envision a world where every kid, regardless of income, feels welcome to pursue his/her passion for STEM.

 

 

We believe in giving ALL kids the skills of tomorrow, today.

 

Through our programs, we aim to provide this service to underserved youth free of charge. All kids, regardless of economic background, deserve an extraordinary educational experience. 

Every young person who enters the lab will take inspiration and creativity back to their community and their peers. Programs like this are often kids' first introduction to science and engineering concepts not regularly taught in school.

We hope to help inspire the next generation of great inventors, artists, scientists, designers, engineers and makers. Thank you for supporting such an amazing, unique opportunity to build a collaborative ecosystem here in Tangier.

 

 

Why it Matters

 

"In the 21st century, scientific and technological innovations have become increasingly important as we face the benefits and challenges of both globalization and a knowledge-based economy. To succeed in this new information-based and highly technological society, students need to develop their capabilities in STEM to levels much beyond what was considered acceptable in the past." (National Science Foundation)

 

 

What We Need

Generous donors have pledged to match your gift dollar for dollar

  • 2 x Ultimaker 2 GO + Printing materials (3200 $)
  • 1 x Littlebits Workshop Set (2000 $)
  • 1 x Wonder Workshop Club Starter Pack (850 $)
  • 8 x Osmo the Complete Kit (1600 $)
  • 48 x 4M STEM Kit (3200 $)
  • 8 x Apple - iPad mini 4 Wi-Fi 16GB (2800 $)
  • 1 x Canon EOS 70D Digital SLR Camera (1400 $)
  • Science lab equipment (2200 $)
  • Furniture and space (9500 $)…

Once we fund our goal, remaining funds roll over into our scholarship fund. We want to grow our giving until every kid can have an extraordinary experience with STEM.

 

This can only be done with your precious support!

story:
Summary

Children living in informal settlements and slums tends to grow up fast, they become the informal solution to their families struggling to deal with daily problems involving infrastructure access and livelihoods. These children often has to take up roles such as watch over younger siblings, sick household members, and step into the role of productive contributors to help the household make ends meet.
Most of the time they become hawkers or petty traders at a very tender age, saddled with these responsibilities, they often limit or forego their schooling, cutting short their future educational potential and the economic and social opportunities, as well as skills, that education affords. This vicious cycle of poverty is one of the biggest issues in development, and necessitates significant creativity to problem solving.

What we have been able to achieve

For over two years that we have been in existence we have witnessed an influx of children in our targeted group, we have successfully enrolled over 80 children in our current school located at Ipaja Ayobo slums in Lagos state

We have been able to provide uniforms, books, lunch and care for these ones making them feel loved and not unfortunate to come from a poor home or drop outs.

Our Aim

Our major targets groups are children with disabilities, drop-out, orphans and vulnerable children from the slums of Ipaja Ayobo, Lagos.

Challenges

The root of the problem is large number of students in our school with poor infrastructure that has led to congestion and our inability to further enroll more pupils and few teaching staff, and a very poor infrastructure which leads to poor quality education. This has partly been an unintended consequence of …. success in increasing primary school enrollment. Also our school is ill equipped with learning materials.

What We Need

Rebuilding and expanding our classes so as to enable us bring in more children from these slums is one of our major priority also our team of volunteers with your support will be able to provide additional support to over-stretched teaching staff. This includes providing teaching assistance, distributing reading materials, individually supporting the children in most need through mentorship, and organizing extra-curricular activities such as sports, reading clubs, life skills mentoring.

Long-term Impact

With the continual success of this project more local children will be able to finish school with a high level of literacy and core skills to succeed in life. Helping them to shape their perspective about the society so that they can view it has one filled with possibilities and a society that calls for social responsibility with an opportunity to positively impacts several lives.

Fundraising Goals!

Our goal for this campaign is of $5,000 which will help us in reaching out to more children in ipaja ayobo slums and provide them with quality education.

Goals of our fundraising drive:

1.  Acquire a bigger facility for expansion of the congested class rooms

2.  School kits and classroom essentials

3.  Support volunteer teaching and non teaching staff allowance.

If we don't reach our entire goal we will keep up to achieve this dream. But we will always share our best with you.

EVERY EFFORT COUNT!!!

Even if you can't contribute right now, we would greatly appreciate your help in spreading the word about this campaign to your friends and family who might be interested in being a part of giving hope to children in Ipaja ayobo Slums by providing them with quality education. You can use e-mail, Indiegogo's share tools, or other social media to spread the word.

Thank you for everything you can do!

story:
Become Your Own Protector

With your help, we are building a state-of-the-art indoor shooting range in Orlando, FL. We are two US Navy Veterans that are a husband and wife team with multiple certifications and experience training gun owners. Visit our website, ComptonCombatArms.com or check us out on social media to see what we've been up to.

This facility is dedicated to you and your training. It is designed to equip you with the ability to keep your family safe. It’s to strengthen your 2nd Amendment rights and will have dedicated Instructors passionate about self defense and empowering you to become your own self protector. It’s part of a vision to take time-honored sporting traditions to a new generation.  

This is your chance to get some perks that will never be offered again. Why not be a part of something special? This is your opportunity to pitch in and be involved in building your community. You will be proud to know you were a part of the small beginnings of a company that is going to make a huge impact in Central Florida.  

All Well or Nothing....that's who we are. A time honored tradition of the Compton family for centuries. Doing everything to the very best of our ability is the only option. 

So why should you contribute to this project? Because we will make it well worth your while.

Out of respect for your time and money, we’ve included a lot of information for you.

 

What We Need & What You Get

We already have the range equipment, we just need the funding to get the build out of the facility done and permits. With the Management, Instructors and full Staff standing by locked and loaded, we need you.

Why contribute?

  • Once in a lifetime offers. We will NEVER offer deals like this again. Get it while you can!
  • Special recognition that will identify you as a "Founding Funder."
  • You'll be making a difference in the local community. No other range in the area is promoting safe gun ownership and continued education and training like we will be offering.

FOUR REASONS WHY YOU CAN'T MISS THIS OPPORTUNITY

1)  ONCE IN A LIFETIME PERKS

Sometimes you’ve only got one chance at an amazing deal. These packages will never be available again. Like a sniper with one shot, this is it. Breathe in, breath out, pause...squeeze the trigger.

2)  BUILD THE WORLD YOU WANT

Central Florida needs a training facility. The certification process for owning firearms in Florida only requires a basic firearm safety class. What happens is that citizens go to the gun show or their local gun shop and take an abbreviated course. Sometimes, not even involving live fire but using an airsoft pistol. This results in unequipped people with a false sense of security. Compton Combat Arms is the bridge to take normal, everyday citizen and turn them into well equipped, safe and knowledgeable gun owners. This facility will be a crisp, modern training center that supports those needs.  

If you intend to use a firearm to protect your home, PROPER TRAINING IS A MUST. Compton Combat Arms will provide an array of instructional classes designed to teach you and your family the safe, effective, proper use and storage of firearms. Safer homes means safer communities.

3)  MAKE A DIFFERENCE  

You have a chance to support responsible gun ownership.

Most of us had someone take the time to teach us the value of gun safety. Someone who taught us that responsible gun ownership improves the safety for the entire community. This is your chance to pay it forward. 

Maybe you're concerned about the current gun laws, but not sure how to make a difference. Compton Combat Arms will provide an atmosphere that creates responsible gun owners one experience at a time, strengthening our Second Amendment Rights. 

4)  TRAIN INTENTIONALLY

You are a legally permitted CCW holder. Have you ever practiced drawing from the holster? Speed and accuracy training? Moving and shooting? Utilizing cover and concealment? All the things you can't do at an indoor gun range in Central Florida. This is exactly what we are building. With your membership, you can come in, go to your stall, raise the bench and do holster work. Or maybe you want to move the firing line forward and use cover, we can accommodate that. With dedicated Range Safety Officers in the range at all times ensuring the safety of you and others, we can offer not only instructional training but you can train how you want with very few limitations. So get excited! Because you can now turn those dream's into a reality.

 

 

So........, if any of this excites you, here's what you should do:

 

Mix and match any (or all) of the following:

1)  Pick a perk! - Just click the grey boxes on the right.  (more info listed below)

2)  Send this page to people you know will be interested.

3)  "Like" Compton Combat Arms on Facebook  and follow us on Instagram and Twitter

4)  Share your thoughts with us!  Suggestions and encouragement mean a lot to us. Especially          during this phase. If you want something, TELL US. 

 

Why are we doing this?

The simplest answer to this question is that there are too many fly by night Instructors providing inadequate firearm training in unsafe gun ranges. Plus, unfortunately people get their CCW permit and never train again, yet they still carry a firearm. Our goal is to provide a safe indoor gun range and training facility that develops citizens to become their own protectors. Dedicated to training, not just a revolving door of people wanting to go out and just shoot a gun. All too often, like so many, we've been to other indoor ranges and left because we didn't feel safe with the people that were in there. Not anymore. All members will go through an orientation and will be vetted prior to ever stepping foot in the range with a firearm. 

Why Should You Care?

We are genuinely passionate about helping other people enjoy the sport of shooting and learning how to use a firearm as just another tool. Compton Combat Arms will provide a positive, safe, and low pressure environment for all shooters, especially those new to the sport. We have already built a reputation in Central Florida for safe, effective firearm training. Also, with a female as our lead instructor, we've been able to make a huge impact in the female market of this industry. We are often sought out by those new to shooting that want to learn to protect themselves. We look forward to helping the new and timid become acquainted with the basics of firearm safety, operations, and marksmanship. Furthermore, we are excited to help those with basic to intermediate knowledge test their skills and push their limits to become safer and more equipped. We hope Compton Combat Arms will extend the values and positive experiences of a responsible firearm community.

We firmly believe that education, training, and exposure are key factors in decreasing the number of gun related incidents and gun violence across our country. With specialized skill based classes and personal instruction, Compton Combat Arms will enlighten and equip people to be responsible gun owners. We feel that our youth should be educated about firearms in a safe and controlled environment. Our facility will provide this by keeping it safe but also fun. We've found that educating youth about firearm safety, purpose and proper use removes curiosity and builds respect for firearms. Educated kids are safe kids.

Compton Combat Arms will also be a great example to our state officials and the nation on some of the positive aspects of firearm usage. We plan to reduce ignorance and negligence with respect to the functionality, purpose, and legal use of firearms. We hope that with enhanced experiences and real understanding, we can demonstrate to our community, elected officials in Florida and our nation that lawful gun ownership enhances our lives. Safe gun ownership is a pillar of the American way of life that we will protect and promote.

 

Here are the PERKS!

Friend of the 2nd Amendment Donation: We will also be offering a Friend of the 2nd Amendment Donation for people who like the idea but really don’t ever see being able to visit us here in beautiful Orlando. This is something that can do to help just because you believe it’s a good thing.

Swag Package: You will receive a Compton Combat Arms swag pack that will have all kinds of branded swag. Merchandise and all kinds of other cool stuff not only from us but from some of our sponsors as well.

Training Package: You will receive 10% off all classes for one year (non-transferable). This also includes any specialized rare training classes or events that are offered within the year.

Gun Rental Package: This means that you will be able to choose one pistol per visit from our rental inventory whenever you come in for one year. 

1 Year Single Membership: This means you will get a one year membership for a single person. The Membership will cover your range time cost for the entire year.  This does not include ammunition or firearm rentals.  You will have the option to purchase those separately however.  Additionally, your yearly renewal price will be at the same discounted price as you get from the Indiegogo campaign. Yes, you read that right, it will never change unless you let it lapse.

1 Year Family Membership: This means you will get a one year membership for a family which includes you and your spouse and all minors who live in the same household (non transferable). The Membership will cover your range time cost for the entire year.  This does not include ammunition or firearm rentals.  You will have the option to purchase those separately though.  Additionally, your yearly renewal price will be at the same discounted price as you get from the Indiegogo campaign. Yes, you read that right, it will never change unless you let it lapse.

Lifetime Membership: This means you will get a lifetime membership for a single person (non transferable) along with a choice on one gun per visit from our rental inventory. The Membership will cover your range time cost for life. This does not include ammunition or additional firearm rentals.  You will have the option to purchase those separately though.  Again, you will never have to pay for range time ever again for yourself!

Family Lifetime Membership: This means you will get a lifetime membership for a family which includes you and your spouse and all minors who live in the same household (non transferable). The Membership will cover your range time cost forever for everyone in the same household. This does not include ammunition or firearm rentals.  You will have the option to purchase those separately though. 

Sponsor Highlight Package: We will have a Wall of Fame located in the front of the facility highlighting companies that have came on board to help us build the range. Buy this package and we will put your company logo on the Wall so that every client and visitor that walks through our doors will see your generosity and support!

Founder Donation Membership: You will have premier Founder status along with a Lifetime Membership.  You will have priority call ahead lane reservation and premier access to all new instructional classes before any other members.  That means you get to rent one gun for free per visit and you will be notified of upcoming new classes and be able to attend early before its available to the rest of the public. You will also receive 10% off ammunition.

Founder Sponsor Membership: You will have Premier Founder status along with a Lifetime Membership.  You will have priority call ahead lane reservation and premier access to all new courses before any other members.  That also means, you get to rent as many guns you like for free and will be notified of upcoming new classes and be able to attend early before its available to the rest of the public.  In addition to those great perks, we will name one of our shooting lanes after you (or your company name).  We will have an engraved name plate on that lane for all our members to see your donation! This is a great opportunity to work together in promoting safe and responsible gun ownership for companies in the 2A community.

 

No one is locked into any one amount. You can donate $1 or all the $125k  You don’t have to get a perk, but we think that it’s a pretty good way to give to the cause and get yourself a great deal in the process.

 

What will it look like?

The video above is the actual range before it was taken down to be relocated that will be installed.

Shooting Lanes:

Our plan is to start out with 8-10 lanes. This range utilizes frangible ammunition. So yes, you can shoot steel in the indoor range. Crazy right? Each lane will have individual stalls, separating you from other shooters.  They are high quality, heavy-duty clear stalls. And yes, they are bulletproof!  Each lane will also have a shooter’s table to load your firearms/magazines. This table is movable meaning you can lift it up and draw from your holster.  You will also have an area behind you where you can store your gear when you aren't using it, keeping the firing line safe and uncluttered. 

Target Systems: 

The target retrieval systems are electronic systems made by Action Targets allowing you to determine the length and reset your targets with a push of a button. No need to wait for a cease-fire to manually move your targets. These targets can be programmed to move and flip while you are shooting, 

Ventilation System: 

This is the most costly component of the range. Our customers’ health is not going to be compromised. Even though we are using frangible ammunition and there isn't any lead exposure, the powder and smoke still needs to be filtered. 

Our ventilation system will exceed NIOSH, EPA, and OSHA air quality standards and maintain a 100% success rate.

 

Simulation Range:

We will have, separate from the main range, a simulation range that utilizes simulation ammunition. Under the direct supervision of a Range Safety Officer, you will be able to run through our Simulator that is designed to test your abilities. The scenarios will change weekly and can even be done on a lunch break. The simulation ammunition can be man marking rounds or blanks that enable a vast array of scenarios from clearing rooms to an active shooter situation.

 

The Shop:

Our rental shop will carry the latest and greatest rifles, pistols,  and shotguns. We will have frangible ammunition of every caliber for purchase along with simulation ammunition. There will be a small amount of accessories available for purchase such as eyes and ears, range bags, holsters etc.

 

Lounge:

Our range will be a destination. Whether you come by alone or with a group of friends and family, we want to have a place with a sense of community.  We will have comfy couches and big screen TV’s. Will there be coffee you ask? We are Navy Veterans, of course there will be coffee. We are presently working out a deal with a very popular coffee company that is has a very loud voice for the Second Amendment.

Class Rooms: 

Our classrooms will hold up to 12 students each.  We will have multiple classes throughout the week that range from first time classes up to instructor level courses and advanced tactics in every discipline. We also will be offering safety classes to certify RSO's and even trauma medicine classes. So if you are just starting out or a seasoned veteran, at Compton Combat Arms, you can find the training you are looking for. 

Non-Affiliated Instructors:

Through the purchase of an Instructor Membership, we will allow other Instructors to utilize the range to teach. We are in this together and shouldn't be competing against each other. You will be required to go through a strict approval process, but once approved, you'll be able to schedule your own classes at our range. 

Are you STILL reading this?

If so, you clearly care about this and YOU SHOULD BE INVOLVED!  You should put your name on this project. We are building an amazing training facility like no other. You don't want to find yourself five years from now saying, "I wish I would've gotten involved from the beginning."

Grab a perk while you can, and send us an email at ccatraining@comptoncombatarms.com and share your thoughts! We are still developing this facility, your input could actually change what we do. Tell us what you want!

We look forward to meeting you, shaking your hand and saying "Thank You!" 

Stay safe, become your own protector.

Prepare=Train=Fight=Survive

Compton Combat Arms, LLC
story_txt:
Become Your Own Protector
With your help, we are building a state-of-the-art indoor shooting range in Orlando, FL. We are two US Navy Veterans that are a husband and wife team with multiple certifications and experience training gun owners. Visit our website, ComptonCombatArms.com or check us out on social media to see what we've been up to.
This facility is dedicated to you and your training. It is designed to equip you with the ability to keep your family safe. It’s to strengthen your 2nd Amendment rights and will have dedicated Instructors passionate about self defense and empowering you to become your own self protector. It’s part of a vision to take time-honored sporting traditions to a new generation.  
This is your chance to get some perks that will never be offered again. Why not be a part of something special? This is your opportunity to pitch in and be involved in building your community. You will be proud to know you were a part of the small beginnings of a company that is going to make a huge impact in Central Florida.  
All Well or Nothing....that's who we are. A time honored tradition of the Compton family for centuries. Doing everything to the very best of our ability is the only option. 
So why should you contribute to this project? Because we will make it well worth your while.
Out of respect for your time and money, we’ve included a lot of information for you.
 

What We Need & What You Get
We already have the range equipment, we just need the funding to get the build out of the facility done and permits. With the Management, Instructors and full Staff standing by locked and loaded, we need you.
Why contribute?

Once in a lifetime offers. We will NEVER offer deals like this again. Get it while you can!
Special recognition that will identify you as a "Founding Funder."
You'll be making a difference in the local community. No other range in the area is promoting safe gun ownership and continued education and training like we will be offering.


FOUR REASONS WHY YOU CAN'T MISS THIS OPPORTUNITY
1)  ONCE IN A LIFETIME PERKS
Sometimes you’ve only got one chance at an amazing deal. These packages will never be available again. Like a sniper with one shot, this is it. Breathe in, breath out, pause...squeeze the trigger.
2)  BUILD THE WORLD YOU WANT
Central Florida needs a training facility. The certification process for owning firearms in Florida only requires a basic firearm safety class. What happens is that citizens go to the gun show or their local gun shop and take an abbreviated course. Sometimes, not even involving live fire but using an airsoft pistol. This results in unequipped people with a false sense of security. Compton Combat Arms is the bridge to take normal, everyday citizen and turn them into well equipped, safe and knowledgeable gun owners. This facility will be a crisp, modern training center that supports those needs.  
If you intend to use a firearm to protect your home, PROPER TRAINING IS A MUST. Compton Combat Arms will provide an array of instructional classes designed to teach you and your family the safe, effective, proper use and storage of firearms. Safer homes means safer communities.
3)  MAKE A DIFFERENCE  
You have a chance to support responsible gun ownership.
Most of us had someone take the time to teach us the value of gun safety. Someone who taught us that responsible gun ownership improves the safety for the entire community. This is your chance to pay it forward. 
Maybe you're concerned about the current gun laws, but not sure how to make a difference. Compton Combat Arms will provide an atmosphere that creates responsible gun owners one experience at a time, strengthening our Second Amendment Rights. 
4)  TRAIN INTENTIONALLY
You are a legally permitted CCW holder. Have you ever practiced drawing from the holster? Speed and accuracy training? Moving and shooting? Utilizing cover and concealment? All the things you can't do at an indoor gun range in Central Florida. This is exactly what we are building. With your membership, you can come in, go to your stall, raise the bench and do holster work. Or maybe you want to move the firing line forward and use cover, we can accommodate that. With dedicated Range Safety Officers in the range at all times ensuring the safety of you and others, we can offer not only instructional training but you can train how you want with very few limitations. So get excited! Because you can now turn those dream's into a reality.
 
 
So........, if any of this excites you, here's what you should do:
 
Mix and match any (or all) of the following:
1)  Pick a perk! - Just click the grey boxes on the right.  (more info listed below)
2)  Send this page to people you know will be interested.
3)  "Like" Compton Combat Arms on Facebook  and follow us on Instagram and Twitter
4)  Share your thoughts with us!  Suggestions and encouragement mean a lot to us. Especially          during this phase. If you want something, TELL US. 
 
Why are we doing this?
The simplest answer to this question is that there are too many fly by night Instructors providing inadequate firearm training in unsafe gun ranges. Plus, unfortunately people get their CCW permit and never train again, yet they still carry a firearm. Our goal is to provide a safe indoor gun range and training facility that develops citizens to become their own protectors. Dedicated to training, not just a revolving door of people wanting to go out and just shoot a gun. All too often, like so many, we've been to other indoor ranges and left because we didn't feel safe with the people that were in there. Not anymore. All members will go through an orientation and will be vetted prior to ever stepping foot in the range with a firearm. 
Why Should You Care?
We are genuinely passionate about helping other people enjoy the sport of shooting and learning how to use a firearm as just another tool. Compton Combat Arms will provide a positive, safe, and low pressure environment for all shooters, especially those new to the sport. We have already built a reputation in Central Florida for safe, effective firearm training. Also, with a female as our lead instructor, we've been able to make a huge impact in the female market of this industry. We are often sought out by those new to shooting that want to learn to protect themselves. We look forward to helping the new and timid become acquainted with the basics of firearm safety, operations, and marksmanship. Furthermore, we are excited to help those with basic to intermediate knowledge test their skills and push their limits to become safer and more equipped. We hope Compton Combat Arms will extend the values and positive experiences of a responsible firearm community.
We firmly believe that education, training, and exposure are key factors in decreasing the number of gun related incidents and gun violence across our country. We feel that our youth should be educated about firearms in a safe and controlled environment. Our facility will provide this by keeping it safe but also fun. We've found that educating youth about firearm safety, purpose and proper use removes curiosity and builds respect for firearms. Educated kids are safe kids.

We plan to reduce ignorance and negligence with respect to the functionality, purpose, and legal use of firearms. We hope that with enhanced experiences and real understanding, we can demonstrate to our community, elected officials in Florida and our nation that lawful gun ownership enhances our lives. story:
Short Summary

Contributors fund ideas they can be passionate about and to people they trust. Here are some things to do in this section:

  • Introduce yourself and your background.
  • Briefly describe your campaign and why it's important to you.
  • Express the magnitude of what contributors will help you achieve.

Remember, keep it concise, yet personal. Ask yourself: if someone stopped reading here would they be ready to make a contribution?

What We Need & What You Get

Break it down for folks in more detail:

  • Explain how much funding you need and where it's going. Be transparent and specific-people need to trust you to want to fund you.
  • Tell people about your unique perks. Get them excited!
  • Describe where the funds go if you don't reach your entire goal.

The Impact

Feel free to explain more about your campaign and let people know the difference their contribution will make:

  • Explain why your project is valuable to the contributor and to the world.
  • Point out your successful track record with projects like this (if you have one).
  • Make it real for people and build trust.

Risks & Challenges

People value your transparency. Be open and stand out by providing insight into the risks and obstacles you may face on the way to achieving your goal.

  • Share what qualifies you to overcome these hurdles.
  • Describe your plan for solving these challenges.

Other Ways You Can Help

Some people just can't contribute, but that doesn't mean they can't help:

  • Ask folks to get the word out and make some noise about your campaign.
  • Remind them to use the Indiegogo share tools!

And that's all there is to it.

story:
We have been developing the Alexa Skills for Learners series, with the Spelling Teacher and the Genius Flashcard.  We want the Spelling Teacher to reach a larger user base and help all students with learning spelling.

What is Spelling Teacher?

Spelling Teacher is an Amazon Alexa skill that helps parents with their student's spelling lessons. The skill will read the words, leave time for the student to write it down before moving to the next word. It also listens the student spelling the word immediately, so Alexa will verify the answer. The basic access supports English words. The premium access allows for spelling of French and Spanish words.

What are we funding?

The Alexa Skill runs in the cloud, and requires internet domain name and servers maintenance. We want to add new features and unique capabilities. Additionally, we want to expand the usage of the skill and promote it to new users by distributing postcards as well as increase the online presence.

How is the Skill working?

The typical usage is as follow:

  • Ask Spelling Teacher to Create a new lesson
  • Open the email, and Enter the lesson in the online form
  • Student : Alexa, ask Spelling Teacher to Start a New Lesson
  • Alexa: The first word is : " Welcome "
  • Student: writes the word down and ask to move to " Next Word "
  • Alternatively, the student can say " The Spelling is: W E L C O M E " and Alexa will confirm
  • Once the lesson is completed, it can be re-played and the spelling self checked. The student would ask to "Spell this word" after each word to have Alexa helping with verifying the student's spelling.

The Skill also features a verification of the alphabet order, with 2 modes: by ABC order or by position.

Risks and Challenges

The skill is already available. We want to promote its usage. If we are successful, we will need to extend our servers capabilities. We are using a commercial hosting solution, that can easily scale to our needs. Since our servers run several applications, the only challenge is to re-partition the current distribution.

story:
I am the founder and CEO of WEAFAEGROUP of companies, and I am delighted to invite you to contribute to our Reward-Based Crowdfunding Campaign- Turning Challenges into Opportunities: Entrepreneurial and Innovative in Times of crises.
WEAFAEGROUP is a consumer e-commerce platform with diversified business models, spanning across connecting consumers and businesses, online retail, and wholesale of electronics, digital products, and services.
WEAFAEGROUP has 5 main subsidiary companies, namely,
1. Weafaeexpress.com: connects consumers and businesses around the world and provides online retail, and wholesale of electronics, digital products, and services.
2. The Virtual African University: Provides a high-quality online liberal arts education for students otherwise excluded from higher education due to financial, geographic, and societal, in low-income countries.
3. Weafae Real Estate Agency.com: Creates an open platform for online property sale by owners, property development, and construction services.
4. Weafaemoney.com: Works with small businesses to provide high-performance online payment and financial services.
5. Weafaegroup of Schools: constructs schools and provides a broad-based high-quality education for children in low-income countries.
Now, let me show you why and how you should support our Reward-Based Crowdfunding Campaign which will be launched on 30 March 2021.
Our company is actively involved by creating employment in low-income countries, as a result of covid19 pandemic which significantly affected tens of thousands of workers across low-income countries.
That's why I am inviting you to contribute € 1 or more to our Crowdfunding Campaign.
In appreciation of your anticipated contribution, you instantly receive an exclusive reward of 10 inspiring bestseller books, worth €380. 
You would also have the choice to selected the language in which you would like to receive your reward, either in German, English, French, or Spanish.
Our Crowdfunding Campaign goal is €1,000,000. 00 (One Million Euros), and your contribution will go toward financing the ongoing projects of our five main companies.
Thank you in advance for your contribution, and here are ways you can contribute to our Crowdfunding Campaign.
You may contribute through the links below:

Indiegogo

Thank you for your generosity and support to our Reward-Based Crowdfunding Campaign- Turning Challenges into Opportunities: Entrepreneurial and Innovative in Times of crises.
