story:
Over 10 years ago, the first cryptocurrency Bitcoin got to see the light of day and introduced a new and exciting era of how we exchange money. Currently, over 1,800 cryptocurrencies exist with market capitalization exceeding $ 300 billion.

It didn’t take long for criminals to share the excitement and abuse the favorable features of Bitcoin other emerging cryptocurrencies. It is estimated that one quarter of all cryptocurrency users, and even half of all Bitcoin users, use them for illegal activities. In fact, $ 76 billion of illegal activities involve Bitcoin alone every year.

Money makes the world go around and to encounter serious crimes (such as drug trafficking, human trafficking, illegal weapon sales and grievous bodily harm) from happening, it is essential to fight financial crimes around these crimes.

At Financial Crime Academy, it is our vision to substantially contribute to the global fight against financial crimes and to become the world-leading provider of no-barrier, easy-to-access, and on demand online education for financial crime prevention professionals. In fact, we are on a mission to empower financial crime prevention professionals around the world to successfully and effectively fight financial crimes in their organizations.

By supporting this campaign, you are directly supporting the production of this online course and are helping us, to help financial crime prevention professionals all over the world.

This course will be the world's best online course on cryptocurrency financial crime prevention and compliance!

Providing the right education is an essential steppingstone for them making the right decision when it really matters.

With your help, we will be able to produce an online course in this topic of uttermost importance and reach thousands of financial crime prevention professionals around the world. Eventually, your contribution will help to avoid actual criminal activity, safe lives, and make the world a better place – This is the magic that proper education can do.

This course is structured into a number of individual sections. Each section is dedicated to help you achieve a particular learning objective, which will support you in eventually becoming one of the few experts that understand blockchain technology and cryptocurrencies from an anti-financial crime and compliance perspective:

Section 1 - Introduction to this course

Section 2 - What you need to know about Blockchain

Section 3 - What you need to know about Cryptocurrencies

Section 4 - Understanding the use of cryptocurrencies in financial crimes

Section 5 - Understanding Cryptocurrency Money Laundering

Section 6 - Understanding Cryptocurrency Terrorist Financing

Section 7 - Understanding International Crypto Laws and Regulations

Section 8 - How to build an effective Cryptocurrency Compliance Program

 

Many certifications and course in the field of financial crime prevention that you can find might promise that they will be your one stop shop to. But is this really the case? For some of them, it might be. Others are just incredibly expensive and the value for money doesn’t seem right.

This online course is fundamentally different and offers you the best value you can possibly find:

 

Here’s what you will get for your contribution:

 

We have a successful track record of producing relevant and high quality online courses in the field of compliance and financial crime prevention. 

Here is an overview of what some of our students are saying:

 

 

To be as transparent as possible, find us on Udemy to take a look on the reviews yourself.

 

The only thing you need to follow the course is just any device (desktop, laptop, tablet, smartphone) and an internet connection. The course is browser-based and combines short videos with small assessments. You can do the course anywhere, anytime. All at your own pace.

                                                          

Everything is 100% Online! When we've finished the development of the course, you'll receive an email with login credentials. You log in on our website and start right away. It's that easy!

 

At Financial Crime Academy, it is our vision to substantially contribute to the global fight against financial crimes and to become the world-leading provider of no-barrier, easy-to-access, and on demand online education for financial crime professionals.

In fact, we are on a mission to empower financial crime professionals around the world to successfully and effectively fight financial crimes in their organizations. To succeed on our mission, we are creating high quality educational resources in various anti-financial crime dimensions and distribute them online with a modern approach to teaching and content-sharing to a global audience at an affordable price.

Here are our five core values that define how we're doing what we're doing:

 

Some personal words from the Founder of Financial Crime Academy: 

I started Financial Crime Academy in early 2020 during the Covid-19 pandemic. For a long time, I have been very passionate about anti-financial crime and I always wanted to do more to fight it in practice - Even more than I was already doing with my regular job as an anti-financial crime professional and compliance expert.

In fact, I have noticed during many of my work assignments as a management consults, where I have been investigating corporate and financial crime-related wrongdoing and helped company’s to build better compliance programs, that sound knowledge of a handful of financial crime and compliance specifics was the main driver to improve the effectiveness of their overall compliance organisations.

Subsequently, I decided to take a leap of faith and launch Financial Crime Academy.

 

By supporting this campaign, you are directly supporting the production of this online course and are helping us, to help financial crime prevention professionals all over the world. Providing the right education is an essential steppingstone for them making the right decision when it really matters.

Imagine this like a snowball effect. Your contribution, starting from as little as only € 5, is crucial to fund the development of the online course. If the course is produced, it will be distributed to thousands of financial crime prevention professionals around the world each year. Their increased abilities to more effectively handle the risk in cryptocurrencies in probably hundreds of thousands of transactions every day, will prevent millions of crimes from being executed.

In the past, we have seen similar successes with other online courses of ours. Most recently, for example, we launched a comparable online course and made it available to the public on Udemy in order to reach as many people as possible. In only a month time, over 100 financial crime prevention professionals from around the world have enrolled. Here, the snowball effect has already started... Join our community!

With your help, we will be able to produce an online course in this topic of uttermost importance and reach thousands of financial crime prevention professionals around the world. Eventually, your contribution will help to avoid actual criminal activity, safe lives, and make the world a better place – This is the magic that proper education can do.

If you have just any questions, please make sure to reach out to us and send us am email. We're here to help!

Send your mail to: hello@financialcrimeacademy.org

Or visit our website: www.financialcrimeacademy.org

Let’s fight financial crime together with online education!

story:
Our Mission

What is  the right thing to do with the money you earn? How much should you spend, save or invest? 

We created Nova to answer all these hard questions, and to help you be smart with your money.

 

Graphic: Demo Video

 

Meet our founding team

 

Sam: After spending years in the investment banking industry developing sophisticated models, I  realised that banks could provide similar intelligence to help people to better manage their money. But that would go against their business model of making money out of overdraft fees and abusive credit card interest rates.

So I decided to create Nova Money AI to share all the financial wisdom I have  learned , and rebalance the forces between the consumerism engine and people.

 

Alexandr: I have spent many years on the “dark” side - being the CTO of what became the largest loyalty program of Russia. The whole point was to incentivise consumers to spend more and more. I implemented the most advanced technologies including cutting edge AI and analytics to track customers behaviour, make targeted offers to spend their money that are hard to decline.

When I met Sam, I was inspired by his idea and have decided to switch to the “light” and to give all my experience to help people to stop being manipulated by the social media, loyalty programs and society and instead to redirect their money on what they really want and need.

 

Angela: Coming from the Philippines, I understood from a young age how money is hard to come by. I knew a lot of people who were in debt or barely making ends meet… and so to avoid being in the same situation, I started my journey to being financially free as soon as I started earning money. I joined Nova because I believe it is a powerful tool to educate people with financial management and help them achieve their goals, and I find huge value in it for people like myself.

The other reason I joined Nova is because I wanted to use art to make something as serious as finance a bit more fun and engaging. It’s so fulfilling to see how heartfully designing can impact the life of people.

 

Our team has worked at  these companies

Who is Nova for?

Nova is for millennials who have ambitious financial goals such as buying a house, becoming debt free, increasing their net worth, or improving their spending habits.

 

It’s harder for our generation to have good financial habits

Social media, digital advertising, and easy access to debt turn us into consumer machines. We buy what the others want us to buy; And even without realising it, we lose control of our financial decisions.

 

Nova puts you back in control of your financial life: you decide where your income should go.

 

What do you want? 

For most people, the answer is owning their home, being financially independent, and never being stressed about money.

 

Nova turns your financial goals into action plans that give you certainty over your future. The AI analyses your financial history to see when you could reach your savings goals. 

And if you want to progress faster, you can simulate how reducing your expenses will advance the completion date of your goals.

 

By planning your goals, Nova calculates your required saving rate.

 

 

The premium version of the app will allow you to set multiple objectives such as:

  • Building an emergency fund
  • Monthly/yearly investment objectives
  • Improving your spending habits
  • Becoming debt-free

 

Monthly Planning and Tracking

At the start of each month, Nova will automate your budgeting by breaking down your long-term goals into monthly objectives. 

 

75% of people fail to hit their budget, so we have designed a simplified way to track your spending. We call it the “Spending Zone”! 

 

 

 

Making Nova smarter every day

 

We have been building up the AI of Nova for 2 years. Our ambition is to create the most advanced AI financial planner. As of today, Nova is able to: 

  • Recognise the income, bills, variable costs, saving and investment
  • Identify transfers made between 2 accounts, or credit card repayment (internal transfers)
  • Monitor bills and alert users when they are increasing
  • Send relevant daily motivation messages
  • Calculate the monthly Net Worth increase 
  • Analyse monthly trends in spending habits

 

Our Features

Our roadmap

Upcoming features of Nova include: 

  • Multiple goals 
  • Group saving goals 
  • Debt free program
  • Saving simulator and recommendation
  • Safety net and monthly investment guidance
  • Net worth tracker
  • Personalised Budget Line that reflect your own spending pattern
  • Mortgage advisory

Premium plans

Rewards

Why we do it

Have you ever wondered why the rich get richer and the poor get poorer? Because there is a financial education gap preventing millions of people from making informed  decisions with their money.

Keeping good financial habits is becoming harder and harder with the rise of social media and technology. Google reads our inbox, social media tracks all our actions, and they use our data to advertise to us. Their technology is turning us into consuming  machines and  we buy what they want.

While most companies use AI to advertise or replace humans, we use AI to empower people to be  smart with their money. 

We have spent years working in leading financial institutions developing some of the most advanced financial models. Now we are democratizing financial wisdom through Nova. 

Our promise is to build an advanced AI to rebalance the forces between people and the consumerism machine.

 

Team

We have rallied an amazing and diverse team to our mission.

Data protection and privacy

Privacy

As many other personal finance products, Nova aggregates customers’ bank accounts in one place. 

Unlike many other apps, Nova never sells your data. We make money through our premium plans, and in the future by offering better interest rates to our beloved users. Our business model allows us to keep your data private.

 

Security

We know that security is also of paramount importance. And we know how to protect your data. Our founding team comes from the financial institution UBS and Malina Loyalty Card where customer privacy was deeply embedded in the culture.

 

Nova Money is registered by the UK regulatory authority, and has implemented the best in class security practices:

  • 256 bits server encryption 
  • Rotating encryption key
  • Read-only access: Nova can only download transaction data 
  • Biometric access

In the UK, we have already integrated from more than 40 banks using their Open Banking APIs. Read more about Open Banking here. 

 

Risks and Challenges

The Nova app is already live on the App Store and Google Play.

Our development team is already hard at work developing the upcoming features of Nova Money. Thanks to our experience building products, we are confident in our ability to deliver the updated product on time by Q4 2021.

story:
Pwaa~!

Hello, I am a cosplayer and artist but other than my love for anime, games, etc. ; Behind the scenes, I'm a hardworking student who is passionate to achieve and discover knowledge, to get along with scholars of different cultures and see the world in different perspectives. I come for the opportunity, and if there is more, I would like to grab it, but there are limits and factors that may halt you from achieving such dreams, but I believe there is always a way to accomplish it. :-)

During the Regionals round, out of many students and teams that participated in such a large-scaled event, I was able to get my whole team qualified for this amazing event that will be held next in Hanoi, Vietnam on the 26th of June up to the 1st of July. The time we have before the Globals is so rushed that it will be hard for my family to immediately provide the funds to get there so I was hoping for everyone's help in order for me to grab this great and amazing opportunity!

story:
I'm creator of Robomongo and I'm taking my last attempt to rescue the project. My goal is to create a team of C/C++ Developer and QA Engineer who can work on the project at Paralect office without being distracted to anything else for one year.

I bet Paralect reputation on fulfillment of our promises. 



About Robomongo

Robomongo is a popular open source and cross-platform MongoDB management tool. 


Plan for next 6 monts

We are planning to address 7 major features in first 6 months:

1. Support for MongoDB 3.x storages (WiredTiger and others)

From version 3.0 MongoDB introduces new pluggable storage architecture and WiredTiger storage engine. Currently Robomongo only supports MMAPv1 storage engine. From version 3.2 MongoDB starts to use WiredTiger by default. We plan to add support for WiredTiger first and work on other storage engines, such as In Memory and Encrypted storages right after.

2. Support for V8 JavaScript engine

At the moment, Robomongo is based on SpiderMonkey JavaScript engine. Since MongoDB 2.3.1, JavaScript engine was changed from SpiderMonkey to Google V8. But starting from 3.1.9 MongoDB is based on SpiderMonkey again. To support all versions of the MongoDB we need to implement V8 JavaScript engine and this is quite a lot of work. MongoDB 3.2 soon will be a production-ready release and we plan to focus on that release first, while still considering support for all versions of the MongoDB.

3. Support for Replica Sets

Supporting connections to the Replica Sets is one of the most awaiting features. This feature, along with two above, is our first priority and should cover needs of the major part of the Robomongo community.

4. In-place edit when in tree or table view

We think, that in place edit is a one of the best UX improvements we can make. This improvement should make use of Robomongo more efficient than it ever was.

5. Copying of documents, collections and databases

Copying documents, collections and databases are operations which are used very often in development and production. We want to add proper support for them.

6. Export and import to/from JSON and CSV

We want to add a quick way of sharing MongoDB data with others. While initially we planning to add basic import/exports support, later we plan to more deeply integrate with MongoDB tools.

7. Better GridFS support

While we think that GridFS is not the feature that is used by most MongoDB users, but we still plan to implement fast files view with abilities to create, edit and delete files.


More information

Visit robomongo.org site to get more information about Robomongo and this campaign. 


Watch 7 series movie about Robomongo.



Read "Robomongo future" blog post.


Thank you!
story_txt:
I'm creator of Robomongo and I'm taking my last attempt to rescue the project. My goal is to create a team of C/C++ Developer and QA Engineer who can work on the project at Paralect office without being distracted to anything else for one year.I bet Paralect reputation on fulfillment of our promises. About Robomongo

Robomongo is a popular open source and cross-platform MongoDB management tool. 





Plan for next 6 monts

We are planning to address 7 major features in first 6 months:
1. Support for MongoDB 3.x storages (WiredTiger and others)
From version 3.0 MongoDB introduces new pluggable storage architecture and WiredTiger storage engine. Currently Robomongo only supports MMAPv1 storage engine. From version 3.2 MongoDB starts to use WiredTiger by default. We plan to add support for WiredTiger first and work on other storage engines, such as In Memory and Encrypted storages right after.
2. Support for V8 JavaScript engine
At the moment, Robomongo is based on SpiderMonkey JavaScript engine. Since MongoDB 2.3.1, JavaScript engine was changed from SpiderMonkey to Google V8. But starting from 3.1.9 MongoDB is based on SpiderMonkey again. To support all versions of the MongoDB we need to implement V8 JavaScript engine and this is quite a lot of work. MongoDB 3.2 soon will be a production-ready release and we plan to focus on that release first, while still considering support for all versions of the MongoDB.
3. Support for Replica Sets
Supporting connections to the Replica Sets is one of the most awaiting features. This feature, along with two above, is our first priority and should cover needs of the major part of the Robomongo community.
4. In-place edit when in tree or table view
We think, that in place edit is a one of the best UX improvements we can make. This improvement should make use of Robomongo more efficient than it ever was.
5. Copying of documents, collections and databases
Copying documents, collections and databases are operations which are used very often in development and production. We want to add proper support for them.
6. Export and import to/from JSON and CSV
We want to add a quick way of sharing MongoDB data with others. While initially we planning to add basic import/exports support, later we plan to more deeply integrate with MongoDB tools.
7. Better GridFS support
While we think that GridFS is not the feature that is used by most MongoDB users, but we still plan to implement fast files view with abilities to create, edit and delete files.

More information
Visit robomongo.org site to get more information about Robomongo and this campaign. 






Watch 7 series movie about Robomongo.





Read "Robomongo future" blog post.




Thank you!

story:
Who did this?

My name is Vlasta Polach, 28 years old, from Czech Republic. I have been through dozens of (both civilian and military) first aid courses. My last badge is Combat Medic.

The last 5 years, I have been teaching hundreds of people first aid. I am not a doctor or paramedic by profession. My profession is teaching itself. I think it’s more important to hand information over in a way that will make it easy to remember and apply what you learned.

What is BACON Medic?

A simple, basic algorithm for providing first aid. It focuses only on the most important knowledge everyone should know.

  • How you can help and stay safe yourself. 
  • How you can properly call for help. 
  • How you can save someone’s life before the emergency arrives. 

Why I founded BACON Medic?

I am an example of a person who hates to learn anything confusing, overwhelming and useless.

Almost every first aid course I found (offline and online) can be described in one way: A lot of theory and topics you’ll never apply - they are not important for regular people.

Providing first aid for most of the population is mainly about calling emergency. You don’t need to know how to spot and fix a broken bone, how to deal with a snake bite or how to prevent hypothermia. This is what you call emergency for.

But it’s critical to know how to deal with life-threatening states - massive bleeding and unconsciousness. If you don’t do anything, the person can die before emergency arrives. The BACON Online course contains only the most important information. You won’t be buried by any unnecessary theory. You won’t have to invest a lot of time and when you’re done, you will remember the important thing: how to save someone’s life.

You can take this online course anywhere you want, anytime you want. You will get a lifetime access, so you can refresh your knowledge whenever you like.  

Why a crowdfunding campaign?

I have started the campaign to get the funds necessary for creating an online course in the best possible quality. The better the presentation, the more engaged you will be, the better you’ll remember material.

As a backer, you also get a much better, early bird price.

What will I use the money for?

Your contributions will help build and spread an online course that makes regular people into heroes. 

And the bonus?

When the campaign’s fully funded, we will choose a public school and give free BACON online courses to all the teachers and students.

What is my long-term goal?

I want BACON Medic to reach as many people around the world as possible. Like the slogan goes - Everyone can be a hero. You only need the right skills, to step out of the crowd and help. Everyone should know first aid.

I want to change the view of masses on first aid. It’s not about putting patch on a scratched knee.

Last but not least - I plan producing new first aid kits as the next step. Unlike most of the kits you can buy today, they will contain what’s really needed. And in an accessible, smart case that you can have on you at all times.

Final words

Thank you very much for your time, your contributions and for sharing the campaign. 

You are helping create heroes around the world - around you!

story:
Background 

Established by a group of young social activists in 2012, REFORM is an independent, secular, non-partisan Palestinian NGO that strives for a society where everyone has the capacity to participate effectively, individual and collective rights are respected, and pluralism is ensured in an independent Palestinian state. REFORM adopts a strategy of sustainably empowering marginalized groups, in particular youth and women from hard-to-reach communities, through establishing safe acting platforms, encouraging community-led development processes and shaping a more inclusive governing system that is responsive to people's needs. 

Why is this project important?

The Hub functions as a creative and interactive platform for various groups of Palestinian society, including students, young entrepreneurs, and women and youth from marginalized areas. Members, friends, and visitors, along with anyone who is curious about the Hub, can use this socio-cultural space to share and exchange ideas during facilitated discussions with participants, which provides them with the opportunity to network with like-minded people. Users of the Innovation Hub can use the premises to receive professional support from the community and experts from all over to become inspired for new and unconventional approaches in order to bring their ideas to life.

What will your contribution help to achieve?

Your contribution will not only support the current Innovation Hub but also develop our vision to up-scale and develop a new and more complex Innovation Hub with a greater spatial area capable of facilitating a number of activities at the same time, such as: vocational training, cinema club, book club, performances, exhibitions, workshops, dance classes, lectures, independent work, study hall, etc. This safe environment is to be open to all components of the community.

Cross-cutting Interventions:

Capacity development : Participants will be engaged in a participatory designed capacity-building program that aims to develop their capacities on two levels:

  • Ad-hoc training. This track will be designed for short-term trainings and capacity development that deals with interpersonal skills, facilitation skills, training skills and business fundamental skills for the target groups.
  • School of leadership. Building the capacities of young potential leaders through long-term leadership programs, shadowing processes and engaging them in structural and cultural reform. This track will be hosted at the Innovation Hub in cooperation with universities, NGO’s and international organizations, and will work to equip the younger Palestinian generation with skills and  capacities to undertake issues of social ills, peaceful transfer of authority, democratization processes and social transformation.

Social Entrepreneurship Development   

  • Younger generation engagement in social accountability: The Hand in Hand initiative will allow Palestinian youth and women from marginalized areas and hard-to-reach communities to engage in discussion in regards to specific issues related to their own living conditions in an innovative setting, where they meet with decision-makers  in order to develop community-led actions to enhance their communities’ living conditions and  their own engagement in policy making processes. 
  • Structural reform. Participants of the Hand in Hand initiative will be able to effectively engage in political processes by hold hearing sessions, conducting policy meetings and weekend solution events and facilitating public meetings in order to  enhance public policies’ responsiveness to the grassroots needs, mainly in the marginalized  and  hard-to-reach communities.
  • Establishing a radio station. The current pilot project of the Innovation Hub established a recording studio; this studio could be transformed into radio station (The Voice of Youth). 

Pre-business Incubation

  • Startup accommodation. The Innovation Hub will serve as a co-working space where startups could be accommodated and mentored through dedicating business experts that will provide the groups with business development methods and tools and fundamental business advice for women and youth, mainly from hard-to-reach areas.
  • Fostering engaging women and youth in creative technical industries: The Hand in Hand premises, through its permanent “Mashagel” up-cycling workshops, will host and target women and youth from hard-to-reach areas and peripheries, together with groups from privileged communities, in an innovatively designed training process which will allow them to create an income generating resource in a non-traditional way. 
  • Enhance social responsibility of the private sector. The Innovation Hub will lubricate the fixed relations between people, startups and cooperative organizations with private sector organizations in order to enhance their own responsibility on the development of the Palestinian society.

What We Need & What You Get

REFORM is working within the community to raise funds and receive contributions from a variety of sectors as this space will benefit all social components. We are asking for a partial contribution of $20,000 towards the overall costs for a newly develop Innovation Hub.  All funds raised will go directly to supporting and up-scaling the Innovation Hub.

By supporting this project you contribute to a social investment  which will benefit  the  Palestinian community.

For organizations and businesses, we will provide to you:

  • Press kit: including photos, graphics, written information and links at your disposal

  • Visibility: your logo will be placed in all our presentations/ publications/ web-presence

  • Recognition: be part of the first concept like this which is built in Palestine. An extraordinary design in combination with self-built and local materials will be linked with your company.

  • Responsibility: the project will contribute to the socially responsible and charitable appearance of your company

Click here for the full design and plan of the new Innovation Hub.

The Impact

  • Enhanced awareness of the local population towards the promotion of a culture of community-led development and self-sufficiency.
  • Increased opportunities for youth to hold decision-makers to account and influence them. 
  • Enhanced the responsiveness of policies to reflect the needs of women and youth. 
  • Issues of concern to youth and women, particularly in marginalized areas, publicized.
  • Participation of youth in local developmental processes enhanced.

Other Ways You Can Help

Please share this link on your social media pages and get the word out!

Recognition: be part of the first concept like this which is built in Palestine. An extraordinary design in combination with self-built and local materials will be linked with your company.
Responsibility: the project will contribute to the socially responsible and charitable appearance of your company

Click here for the full design and plan of the new Innovation Hub.

The Impact

Increased opportunities for youth to hold decision-makers to account and influence them. 
Enhanced the responsiveness of policies to reflect the needs of women and youth. 
Issues of concern to youth and women, particularly in marginalized areas, publicized.
Participation of youth in local developmental processes enhanced.

story:
More than 50% of the population is Protestant, while Haiti is the poorest country in the Caribbean. Haitian citizens are rejected, humiliated all over the world. Thus, there is not even the necessary to live. There is no electricity, no structure, superstructure, no development. Families do not have access to food, are poor, no quality university. Many people have only eyes on foreign countries. What does God say, what does the Christian faith do? Such a problem is major in the study of "Thinking Theology".

Show people that if we rethink the Christian faith, it can serve the growth of every Christian citizen, Christian family and the general population. Thus, Thinking theology is an association born in France that intends to work with the association in Haiti in order to reflect on theology, on the exercise of the Christian faith, we must begin to say to the Protestant sector HALTE LA, he There is a time to think, it's time. the time for a questioning of our faith, a time of pause, balance, rethink the way, to take the true path.

Because if you do not progress, you will perish, we will not talk about you for a day, if you do not want to be killed, well, someone else will do it for you, this is the case. Haiti, we are all calling for progress. We are at our 6th edition of national and scientific symposium of theology. Thinking theology in Haiti tries to give a new path to the Protestant sector, to propose a path, a new one, which will lead us to a new hope, which will give back to our country the glory it had in the past. It is for this purpose that we organize our 6th year of colloquium, we will take the opportunity to inaugurate for the year 2018, a library, a bookstore, a Protestant newspaper called Protestant Monthlyity of Actuality, all this to try to look for a new perspective for our dear Haiti.

story:
The Ambassadors of Change

South Africa is faced with chronic substance abuse and addiction challenges.  The team at SHARP Recovery Solutions is committed to becoming part of the solution through training of 1,000 Recovery Coaches.  By helping individuals to create and develop #RecoveryCapital which are the personal internal and external resources available to themselves, their families, their organisations and communities, the team is committed to professionalism, integration and education.  By training coaches who are able to educate and empower people through the forward-focused and solutions-driven nature of coaching, we believe that we can help addicts acknowledge their victim while developing their survivor, and learn the tools and techniques to live a fulfilled and purposeful life in recovery.

It Takes a Village to Raise a Child

SHARP Recovery Solutions has been training coaches for .... years, often without any payment from prospective coaches for the training.  However, as with any organisation we have overheads, operating costs and facilitator fees,  and are finding the financial pressures of training coaches on a bursary scheme need to be readdressed.  So we are reaching out for funding to support the work that we are so passionate about. 
Each Recovery Coach costs about $1,000 to train, and the training fee includes the following:
  • 3 face-to-face weekend training sessions of 20 hours
  • 65 hours of practical coaching 
  • Ongoing administrative support 
  • Coach supervision and mentorship for each coach
  • Monthly professional  development sessions for trainee- and qualified coaches
  • Examination, coaching assessment and certification
There is international training and certification path open to coaches once they have completed their national training, assessment and certification.
Creating and Developing #RecoveryCapital
#RecoveryCapital are the resources that support individuals, families, communities and organisations on the Recovery Journey.  These resources are unique to each individual, and a Recovery Coach acts as an accountability partner to assist people in discovering what resources are available to them.  These social, emotional, mental, physical and spiritual resources are part of personal development, which empowers individuals to take personal responsibility for their recovery and wellness.
Recovery Coaches are seen as Ambassadors of Change as they work from a place of non-judgement, and rather than offering advice or instruction, they use powerful coaching tools that let people develop and build the life that they envision.  People learn to goal set, action plan and problem solve while understanding their personal values and designing their life by incorporating and practicing a set of spiritual principles.

Risks & Challenges

Substance abuse and addiction work is fraught with challenges, but by offering our coaches ongoing supervision and professional development, they feel supported and sustained in the work that they undertake.  We also select our coaches for specialised training after running community workshop training weekends.  This means that people are introduced to the coaching model and have the opportunity to decide whether the work resonates with them before starting the specialised Recovery Coach training.

Commitment to the training process, which takes 3 - 6 months, can be a challenge for some people too.  We attempt to address this by holding one live training each month for three months and offering our trainee coaches constant support and supervision to keep them motivated.  We also host monthly professional development sessions, where coaches are given the opportunity to learn new coaching tools, attend workshops and network with other recovery-orientated individuals such as coaches, counselors, facilitators and recovering addicts.

We communicate constantly with our trainees through social media platforms and email so that they are informed of all training events, recovery initiatives and professional development sessions.  We attempt to give our coaches introductions to organisations and groups that will help them develop their business-building skills that will assist them once they have completed their training.

How can you help us?

We are very active on Social Media and would love you to share our campaign with your friends, family and personal and professional networks.

If you are interested in finding out more about us you can visit our websites; www.sharptreatment.com | www.thefoundationclinic.co.za

Alternatively, you can:

  • Like us on FaceBook 
  • Follow us on Twitter
  • Become part of our LinkedIn Network
  • Join us on Google+
  • Subscribe to our YouTube Channel
We would also love it if you shared our campaign through the Indiegogo site...and help us to become part of the solution to South Africa's substance abuse and addiction problem.

Like us on FaceBook 

Follow us on Twitter
Become part of our LinkedIn Network
Join us on Google+
Subscribe to our YouTube Channel

We would also love it if you shared our campaign through the Indiegogo site...and help us to become part of the solution to South Africa's substance abuse and addiction problem.

story:
| About Us |

Becary is my life project, my sand grain to make the world a better place. Education is the base of every society and the biggest tool for people to achieve higher goals. This is what it is all about, a web platform where you can research before deciding where and what to study based on actual reviews and student experiences.

With over 10 years of marketing experience including Digital Marketing, Performance, demand generation, CRM, Email Marketing, Methodologies Design, internal/external communications, PR, Social Media, budgeting and project management; my partner and I decided to create the best way to invest in education without losing money and time.  

Help us create a new standard in education by contributing with the development of the first education reviews platform in the world.

"The Tripadvisor of academic programs"

 

 

| What We Need |

We are looking for US$30.000 to develop the platform and start a powerful digital marketing strategy. We need the best developers to build Becary just once. Cheap developing in long term is very expensive.

| What You Get |

Be the first to carry around the world our brand next to your heart or all over your head. 

  • Hoodie
  • T-shirt
  • Becary Kit (Hoodie, T-shirt and Hat)

 

| What If We Don't Reach Our Goal |

We will make mugs, posters, stickers, speakers, underwear or whatever it takes to make this happen. We won't quit and with your help, we won't need to.

 

 

| Other Ways You Can Help |

If you just can't contribute, that doesn't mean you can't help.

  • Ask your folks to get the word out and make some noise about Becary!
  • Use Indiegogo share tools!
  • Follow us in social media @BecaryEdu

 

Thanks for reading, thanks for helping, thanks for changing education as it is. 

Thanks for believing in Becary!

| About Us |
Becary is my life project, my sand grain to make the world a better place. Education is the base of every society and the biggest tool for people to achieve higher goals. This is what it is all about, a web platform where you can research before deciding where and what to study based on actual reviews and student experiences.

With over 10 years of marketing experience including Digital Marketing, Performance, demand generation, CRM, Email Marketing, Methodologies Design, internal/external communications, PR, Social Media, budgeting and project management; my partner and I decided to create the best way to invest in education without losing money and time.  
Help us create a new standard in education by contributing with the development of the first education reviews platform in the world.
"The Tripadvisor of academic programs"
 


 
| What We Need |
We are looking for US$30.000 to develop the platform and start a powerful digital marketing strategy. We need the best developers to build Becary just once. Cheap developing in long term is very expensive.
| What You Get |
Be the first to carry around the world our brand next to your heart or all over your head. 


Hoodie
T-shirt
Becary Kit (Hoodie, T-shirt and Hat)

 
| What If We Don't Reach Our Goal |
We will make mugs, posters, stickers, speakers, underwear or whatever it takes to make this happen. We won't quit and with your help, we won't need to.
 

 
| Other Ways You Can Help |
If you just can't contribute, that doesn't mean you can't help.

Ask your folks to get the word out and make some noise about Becary!
Use Indiegogo share tools!
Follow us in social media @BecaryEdu

 
Thanks for reading, thanks for helping, thanks for changing education as it is. 
Thanks for believing in Becary!

story:
Short Summary

Contributors fund ideas they can be passionate about and to people they trust. Here are some things to do in this section:

  • Introduce yourself and your background.
  • Briefly describe your campaign and why it's important to you.
  • Express the magnitude of what contributors will help you achieve.

Remember, keep it concise, yet personal. Ask yourself: if someone stopped reading here would they be ready to make a contribution?

What We Need & What You Get

Break it down for folks in more detail:

  • Explain how much funding you need and where it's going. Be transparent and specific-people need to trust you to want to fund you.
  • Tell people about your unique perks. Get them excited!
  • Describe where the funds go if you don't reach your entire goal.

The Impact

Feel free to explain more about your campaign and let people know the difference their contribution will make:

  • Explain why your project is valuable to the contributor and to the world.
  • Point out your successful track record with projects like this (if you have one).
  • Make it real for people and build trust.

Risks & Challenges

People value your transparency. Be open and stand out by providing insight into the risks and obstacles you may face on the way to achieving your goal.

  • Share what qualifies you to overcome these hurdles.
  • Describe your plan for solving these challenges.

Other Ways You Can Help

Some people just can't contribute, but that doesn't mean they can't help:

  • Ask folks to get the word out and make some noise about your campaign.
  • Remind them to use the Indiegogo share tools!

And that's all there is to it.

story:
Summary

The Pocket Learner presents an easy and simplistic method for promoting language development - vocabulary building and literacy in children, especially those who have learning difficulties or who are developmentally delayed.


I'm  the mother of a little girl who has Downs Syndrome, Autism and associated learning difficulties. When I had my daughter Shari I had no understanding about the characteristics of children with special needs but I was determined to learn and to help her achieve her potential.  This is how I accidentally developed the Pocket Learner.  I started to explore the system and found that she grasped it with both hands.  Now, at the age of 8 she is able to identify pictures and words and although she still has difficulty forming sentences, she has an amazing vocabulary and can read several hundred written words.


We are really keen to share the fun, satisfaction and sense of achievement we enjoy with our daughter.  We are aware that there are many families who are struggling to help their children and are seeking a way that will enable them to do so.  The Pocket Learner system will provide that medium and I am confident that you will find it to be one of the most effective systems available for empowering your children.  I believed that my child could do more; surely your child can too!

The Pocket Learner is being developed under the auspices of ACT Training Services, a not-for-profit organisation based in London, whose remit includes the empowerment of people living in deprived communities.  The organisation runs short accredited and bespoke training programmes enabling its trainees to develop skills and competencies in order to secure sustainable employment.  Andrea Campbell co-founded ACT in 2006 and along with Richmond Tyser they serve as directors of the company through which they continue to provide services to the local community.


How it works

The Pocket Learner uses a system of words, images and transparent pockets to encourage participation and the concept can be extended to a range of uses including the promotion of early numerical skills as well as foreign language development.  It is initially tutor-led (by parents, carers or teachers) and then self-directed by the child if possible. 


Several focus groups and practice sessions were conducted with parents and children in order to observe the impact of the Pocket Learner on their educational development.  What we observed was very encouraging and this propelled us to develop the system without delay.

What We Need & What You Get

The aim is to widen access to education for children who struggle in their early years.  This includes not only children with learning difficulties but children who are starting to read and who are keen to build their vocabulary. 

We have already spent money on building the foundation - designing and producing the prototype, intellectual property, testing and remodeling. We are now looking for a further £28,000 to fine-tune the product and fund the first production run.  We would like to obtain samples for promotion to the relevant community organisations, government institutions and commercial entities.

Those who support our campaign will receive the limited edition set including an attractive carry box.  The materials are environmentally friendly.  Depending on your level of funding you will also receive a set of Pocket Learner numeracy cards for those children who are at the stage where they are focusing on developing competency in the use of numbers.

Achievements Thus Far 

The Pocket Learner - the book with no words - was conceived approximately two years ago and during that time the project has grown leaps and bounds.  The cover artwork was commissioned and the workbook was designed; a rudimentary prototype was developed and manufactured and in October 2014 the Pocket Learner was accepted for exhibition at the British Invention Show and Awards. The concept won a British Invention Silver Medal, a Global Women Inventors and Innovators (GWIIN) Special Recognition award and a GWIIN certificate of recognition.

During the period we were also able to design a logo and secure the relevant intellectual property registrations.


                                                       

British Invention Silver Medal                               GWIIN Special Recognition Award


We believe that introducing the Pocket Learner to the world via a crowdfunding platform will offer a unique opportunity to access those individuals who:

i)  have been through my journey and can understand the importance of developing such a system in order to support children with learning difficulties;

ii)  might have a child who could benefit from the product;

iii)  know of a child who would benefit from the system and

iv)  have a passion to support children who are disadvantaged in terms of their learning ability.


This is the latest prototype of the Pocket Learner.  There are still a few improvements to be made .

      


For your contributions we will send you complete sets of the pocket learner - the final product which will consist of an attractive carry box, a workbook and two sets of cards - images and words.  

We have a reasonable funding target and are conducting a fixed funding campaign. Should we be unable to reach our funding goal contributors will bear no risk as no funds will be transferred to us.  If unsuccessful we have a number of options we could consider including i) re-running the campaign and ii) seeking angel funding. We are however, keen to secure the required funds via this crowdfunding campaign and are committed to honouring every perk we promise within the time-frame indicated.   


The Impact

It is quite an amazing experience to see how quickly children grasp the concept and start to read. It appeals equally to both boys and girls and its flexibility encourages parents and teachers to be creative.

The benefits of the system are as follows:

·  It inspires children to learn

·  It encourages collaboration

·  It fosters creativity

·  It can be applied to a wide range of learning goals

·  It can be used by children with learning difficulty as well as other children

·  It is very affordable – buy the workbook once and then purchase only theme cards

·  There is no need to buy an expensive electronic device

·  Children learn the fundamentals in a fun way

·  The programme doubles as a game with several children or with adult and child

·   The system is easy to use

·  It teaches through play-based learning

·  It requires no prior knowledge (but helps if the child has a basic knowledge of phonics)

·  The system has been designed to make children comfortable with learning and develops their problem solving skills

·  The inbuilt prompting system ensures that children are not discouraged when they cannot work out the answer – the answers appear in a fun way.



What People Say

As the father of a child with special learning needs, I believe that the Pocket Learner is a successful balance of the "fun" and "structure" required to help her learn. It will help children, particularly those with learning difficulties to acquire the vocabulary they need to begin reading and improve communication.

I look forward to the pleasure of passing on those special family reading treasures in the not too distant future so she can share even more with us.  Dr Michael Bruce, Cognitive Psychologist

As educational professionals who are determined to ensure every child achieves his/her potential, we are constantly seeking high quality resources to support each child's learning.  I believe the Pocket Learner is a tool that will enhance reading skills and contribute to vocabulary building.  Marva Rollins, Headteacher

Brilliant and much needed concept to help all children improve their literacy. A practical and tried and tested solution from an inspirational mother, a great product for all children. Very inspiring, simple, clear and will change the future for many children.  H Memon, Publisher - Shade 7

The Pocket Learner looks like an innovative product which will be very useful to parents, especially those who have children with disabilities. D. Leadette, Ex-School Governor and Mother of Three

I have worked 1-to-1 with lots of kids with Down’s Syndrome. There is a real lack of useful educational interactive tools. This is great and specifically targets the abilities of these fantastic children finally.  Jenny Davie, Special Education Teacher & Inventor

I think you found IT!  Simply what the world has been waiting for but not looking for.  This product speaks every language and speaks for itself.  Release it! Peter Olorunnisomo - Poet, Writer, Playwright 


Stretch Goals

The objective of this campaign is to produce the first materials (i.e. the workbooks, the first sets of cards and the carrier boxes.  However, the range of potential usage is wide and in the event that we exceed the target we will be looking to produce the next sets of cards (based on different subjects). 

  

There are 5 additional products under consideration - activity sequencing cards, a nursery resource, a card game, labels and a computer application.  Any excess on our target will enable us to produce higher volumes of the workbook and be able to introduce the Pocket Learner to a wider audience.  In addition we will be able to produce a prototype of the next product - the much anticipated activity sequencing cards. We are social entrepreneurs committed to promoting social development focusing particularly on the welfare of disabled children.  In this regard ACT works in partnership with Camptys Foundation, a not-for-profit organisation which supports the work of frontline agencies engaged in the education and welfare of disabled children living in deprived communities across the globe. 


Risks & Challenges

We've spent the last year designing and developing the Pocket Learner. Over the period the system has been tested by parent groups, pre-school and primary school children.  It has input from primary school teaching professionals.  

As we are running a fixed funding campaign, if we fall short of our goal the funds will not be taken and we will endeavour to run a second campaign.  This removes the element of risk to our supporters.  In order to keep our manufacturing costs to a minimum we are required to produce a reasonable volume to enable us to offer our supporters good value for their contributions.


Other Ways You Can Help

We appreciate any support we can get. People can support the Pocket Learner in many ways including spreading the word. Please tell your friends, your work colleagues, family, as many people as you can. You can also share this campaign through social media and use the share tools provided here on Indiegogo.  Please, help us extend the reach of the Pocket Learner and help a child to aspire higher.

We take the opportunity to thank you for taking the time to read our crowdfunding page and look forward to your kind support as we embark on a journey to impact the lives of those who need it most. 


FAQs

We've compiled the following FAQs which aims to provide responses to some of the questions you may have.  We welcome additional queries if there is anything else you would like to know.  Please contact us through this platform, email us at info@pocketlearner.net or use the contact form on the Pocket Learner Pocket Learner contact page

1)  Are there other products available under the Pocket Learner series?  - There are a number of products under development including theme cards, the activity sequencing cards, playing cards, nursery resources and labels.  A computer app is also being developed.

2) Do you ship internationally?  - Yes we do; you will be asked to cover the cost of shipping.

3)  How quickly will the items be delivered?  - We expect to deliver in November 2015, aiming to ensure our supporters have the items in time for Christmas gifts.

4)  Is the Pocket Learner available on the market?  -  The system is not yet available commercially, our crowdfunding supporters will be the first to have access to the programme.

story:
1000+ CCENT and CCNA

All available FOR FREE to everybody. It's time to CHANGE the way you prepare for IT Exams. That's why I am creating this website:

www.trickyexam.net

Please note this website is UNDER CONSTRUCTION, however you can find some examples, simulations, and quizzes.

Why do we need a website like this?

We all know it's not enough to read a book or watch an online course to pass an IT exam. You need to go through as many questions as possible to test your knowledge, and learn how to answer exam questions.

The website will have more than 1000 items for the CCENT (100-105) and CCNA (200-205) exam. Cisco certificates are essential for every IT Specialist and are recognized worldwide.

Help us build an awesome community of students, teachers, and engineers.

 

This is what I am going to offer:

 

  • 1000+ well written practice exam questions, labs, simulations, and cheat sheets with detailed explanations to cover all CCENT and CCNA exam topics. Question types: multiple choice, drag&drop, video/audio/diagram questions, simulations, and more!
  • 25+ pages of cheat sheets available as an e-book (PDF) for you to download
  • Additional e-books with CCNA Labs and tips
  • Free access to my Udemy CCENT / CCNA video courses
  • Regular updates and live webinars
  • Live support and Q&A

Sound interesting?

 

What You Get

All practice exam questions will be created by a group of experienced Network Engineers and Instructors. I am certified in many areas. I have been teaching IT for 10 years now. I have a group of certified engineers and trainers who will create and check all questions to make sure you get the best product possible and as close to the actual exam as we can make it.

All exam sections will be covered and questions will be divided into multiple sections to make it easier for you to prepare for an exam. There will also be a final exam to make sure you have covered all areas. I also expect to run live webinars, 1-to-1 sessions, create simulations among other things...

 

A special bonus - Cisco CCENT/CCNA online courses for you!

As a bonus, depending on the perk you choose, you get free access to a number of IT courses I've created on Udemy. All details can be found in the perks' descriptions. Meanwhile, check out what you can get as a bonus from my list of courses:

https://www.udemy.com/user/marious/

Check out my secret perk to get even more!

 

Why do I need funding?

I want to finish the platform trickyexam.net. I need a CSS and WordPress expert to tweak my website and add more features. My website need a pro version of the quizz script to give you additional features...

It will take around 3-5 months to finish everything. Our goal is to offer  the highest quality, which means questions will be verified by a CCNP or CCIE instructor and detailed explanations will allow you to understand every question very well.

What's more, I want to offer:

  • LIVE webinars
  • A discussion board
  • Video lectures
  • Real World Examples
  • and more!
 

Risks & Challenges

As long as I get the funding planned, all exam questions and cheat sheets will be ready in around 3-5 months.

Video lectures
Real World Examples
and more!

 
Risks & Challenges
As long as I get the funding planned, all exam questions and cheat sheets will be ready in around 3-5 months.

story:
Intro for you

The modern map of stars in the  3d space with our Sun in the center - you pictured the Starmap Light. 

The map is in a 1 cm to 1 light year scale, so it gives an incredible insight to the vast distances of our galaxy. The stars seem to be only inches away at the scale, but the nearest black hole or the galactic center is hundreds of meters in the distance - as indicated on the map.

We all have a goal in the universe - and it is to be home in it ! 

(For the list of objects and stars displayed, see below !)

Greetings ! We are a small group of enthusiasts in Finland, who believe in enriching life trough interesting, inspiring and informative projects and tools with personal touch.

This project is specifically close to our heart since its conception. Its a project of passion, not a business by any means. It is small and simple and yet it is huge in many ways. After the initial design phase and brainstorming, we came up with a good solution and trustworthy partners to make it real in a  relatively short time - with supporters who share the enthusiasm.

[For more info about the how the campaign works, technical solutions and production, and a discussion see the last section !]

        

The Starmap Light lays on a 20 cm diameter round glossy plastic base which features the galactic map itself. The base contains the main electronics and contols.

In the galactic map printed on the top our Sun is positioned in the center and all it's neighbor stars are accurately placed around it on a 1 cm to 1 light year scale. The directions to the most interesting and significant locations in the deep space, like our galactic center or the nearest black hole, are indicated on the map, along with their relative distance.

The stars are dispersed, white glass orbs which come in 3 different sizes to represent theireal life dimensions relative to each other. The support rods have fiber optic light tubes inside, leading the light above from base.

Dual light system: Pure white and real star emission color - achieved trough individually addressable LED bulbs in the base. With a push of a button your stars will switch from pure white shine to their real emission color !

The map presents all the stars within a 10 light year radius (around  29 stars - See the star chart below).

Light modes:

- Pure white (The stars shine uniformly in warm white color) 

- Star emission (The stars shine in their real emission color)

 Additional modes ( What these modes lack in realism, they make up for it in fun)

- Fade (The stars light up and fade in random order in a slow, rhythmical pattern for relaxation and sleep - single and multi-color mode)

- Relative brightness (Each star glows with different brightness representing its luminosity) 

- Distance (The stars light up rhythmically in the order of their distance )

Game mode:

- Know your neighborhood (Guessing game)

(We will offer a guessing game delivered by updates to the mobile app (See below!) with a single or multiplayer mode, in which you have to guess the star in question by tapping on the virtual map. The map itself will respond with  appropriate colors and light patterns! Also, when a random star lights up, you could guess its type, temperature and distance by its position and color !)

 

Control hub and functions 

 

With enough support* we will offer an accompanying free mobile app  which serves as a control hub for every light related function - like activating individual stars or star groups, filtering the lit up stars by type, temperature or distance and other features.

 

* A certain amount of backers is needed for this functionality and hardware (This doesn't effect the current light system controls)

And shine all the stars

So how many stars then ?

Ultimately it depends on you ! The package will arrive with the base and the stars separated, and you can set up as many as you like and enjoy as they light up ! You can change the look and feel of your map every day! Or - if you wish - you can just leave the base empty and admire the map itself lit in the dark.

Square prototype without the stars showing only the map

The base and the stars come separate - the goal by this design is to make it your own by placing the stars yourself, learning their name and type along the line and have a lot of great fun. The individual stars will have different sizes and colors, representing their size and type in the real life! The solution is based on LED and fiber cable technology.

 

All the stars displayed within 10+ light years of radius, along with the distance and location of black holes, the galactic center, the nearby galaxies and more !

Some details of the map on a square prototype

Prototype with colored glass orbs (Depending on the level of support we might offer swappable star orbs with colors too)

 

The star map is covering a 10+ light year radius with our Sun in the center. Every star has a colorful and informative description in the instruction manual, and is colored and scaled appropriate to its type and size. 

But you can peek over the radius of the map - the directions to the most significant locations are indicated on the map along with their distances at scale. The Proxima Centauri (the closest star to us) is only 4 centimeters away, but you will need to walk dozens of meters to the nearest black hole - these proportions will give you a better sense of the actual distances in our local stellar neighborhood ! 

 

Galactic locations indicated on the map

(for list of stars, see below)

 

  • Canis Major Dwarf Galaxy (Closest known galaxy orbiting our Milky Way) - 250 m away from the Sun
  • Magellanic clouds (dwarf galaxies ) - 1790 m away from the Sun
  • Andromeda galaxy on collision course with the Milky Way- 25000 m away from the Sun
  • A0620-00 (V616 Monocerotis) - the nearest black hole - 33 m away from the Sun
  • Galactic center (Supermassive black hole - Sagittarius A)- 250 m away from the Sun
  • Direction of the galactic movement of our solar system (towards Vega)

​The map comes with a string with a centimeter scale, so measuring distances between stars and converting them to real light year units is a breeze and a fun.

Timeline, schedule and how to track the progress  

In addition to the updates here, we created a webpage as well to follow and track the progress of the project. The updates will come at a regular weekly schedule , and even more , they will be informative and sharing a lot of fine details (such as samples of blueprints and summaries of design changes).

Planned schedule:

  • Campaign starts 
  • Campaign period and successful conclusion - day 0
  • Finishing the technical details and (electronic parts) CAD designs - day 20
  • Concluding the negotiations with the producing partners and finalizing the finished product, packaging, instruction manual and more - day 50
  •  Mass production first wave concludes and products are ready to ship - day 90
  • Sending out our products to the backers and supporters - day 91 !

 

Some thoughts on production and cost. First, this is an exclusive product. We came up with the idea, made research, created 3D designs and blueprints and will engage many local workshops for a small scale production. The key here is local and small scale. We only produce for our campaign supporters (if the campaign is successful), so you will have a truly unique and exclusive product to call your own ! The prices are - off course - determined by the production method and scale. We insist on local workshops to ensure quality, and by the nature of crowdfunding campaigns, cannot guarantee large scale orders. Think about it as a partly handcrafted item, with many manual and independent design elements in the production - and take pride in owning one ! 

[Technical details and multi colored light system] Since the stars are separate from the base (concept) we decided that the led should be in the base circuit board and fiber optic cables inside rigid light tubes (or coated acrylic) lead the light up trough the bars to the white glass orbs (Our prototypes show that the light is bright enough and has a good angle of visibility). The bars are slide-in (or possibly magnetic). We have decided to go with only one version, which incorporates the dual light system - the stars can shine in pure white color or in their real life star emission color by a push of a button ! 

Answers about the campaign, Indiegogo and funding (Update)

We got a lot of questions since the campaign kicked of, and realized that the world of crowdfunding is as new to many as it was to us ! So we have decided to give you some clarification and update on the process !

We decided to set the goal to fixed, meaning that the campaign is only successful if the set amount is raised. We are confident about the set goal - it will provide the necessary resources to finalize the CAD designs, and secure the plastic mold, which are the most expensive parts of the operation.

(Right now we estimate around ~120 backers needed with the current method of production.)

But we brainstorm constantly on more optimal methods, and it might make the project possible even with lower amount of fund raised (meaning lower number of individual items.) But anything under a certain threshold makes the project impossible (plastic manufacturing, PCB and others).

(In any case we will inform you after the campaign concluded about the result ! In the optimal case the campaign was successful and we will update you about the manufacturing and shipping dates ! )

If the campaign stays under the critical number of orders in a month from now, we will be 1. sad that this project couldn't see the day of light and 2. you will get a refund automatically.(trough Indiegogo - you might loose the transaction fee in this case !)

And one more thing - we don't "lock" your contributions. So any point in time you might change your mind and retract it ! We only want to be sure, that we can fund the workshops for manufacturing.

Hope it helps ! 

 

Some social media to reach us

Webpage

Twitter

Instagram

Facebook

Reddit

 

 

The Impact of your contribution

This is easy: without you we wont do it. With you we Will. Period. We really hope that you like the product and the idea behind it, we trust that it gives you the same sense of awe and inspiration as it gave us - and will help to pave the way for more science and space design products and other cool gadgets. We believe that this product is worth it. We didn't hire  a marketing team, we didn't start an advertising campaign. It is strictly between us, here and only here.  It depends on You. Thank you !

 

 

And that's all there is to it.

 

 

 

 

Contact and support: codesignprojects@outlook.com

 

----

FAQ

When will if i get mine ?

As soon as the campaign concluded succesfully, we will star the manufacturing process and the estimated delivery to you is  2-3 month, with 3 month being the maximum planned. 

Is the postage included in the perks ?

Yes, it is - when you choose a perk the final price will include post added to the product cost. Although there might be hidden additional costs, like custom fees, which are different for every region and country. Generally, the postage included covers the cost of the shipping.
