story:
Short Summary

Hello,

My name is Marta, I am a young mother who has just returned to the office work after a maternity leave, during which I have been awarded a Master in International Finance degree (with merit). At the same time my little baby girl started to visit a kindergarten, then another one, and now I am thinking of switching the preschool again. I would prefer to give my child much richer experience than currently is available at the market and turn it into an accessible offer for busy successful parents, who care about the future of their kids and are willing to invest into it adequate funds. According to B. Franklin “Investment in knowledge pays the best interest.”

Contributors will help me to launch this pilot project from the scratch: design the unique weekly-based program with daily cross-cultural overlaps over the period of 3 months, employ at least 9 highly skilled professionals and establish a cosmopolitan kindergarten in the very heart of the Baltic States, acquire a license and launch operations of the kindergarten. Languages of command - English, Spanish, French, Mandarin Chinese and German (spoken by eloquent tutors) coupled with Latvian and Russian (spoken by caring nurses). Having numerous conditions met children would not have to study the above-mentioned languages, they will just have to play, interact and live in the supportive environment with fluent and articulate native-speaking adults.

Benefits provided by Happy Nations Kindergarten:

Cultural: getting used to 7 languages, leading to learning diverse customs, National holidays and related traditions,

Emotional: communication with peers and happy adults, two-hour walk on the street every day regardless of weather conditions;

Intellectual: listening to folks in different languages, playing table and educational games;

Creative: calligraphy, drawing, sculpture, LEGO and singing classes combined with  

Physical: ballet, choreography, karate, playing ball and having a lot of fun!

What We Need & What You Get

I apply for an initial outlay of 100 000 USD to cover the following costs at least partly:

1) Employment of 7 professors 3 months before the opening of the kindergarten to pay them the salaries for the development of the cross-cultural study program. Later on I will have to apply to the European Patent Office to protect Intellectual Property rights.

2) Rent of the premises including renovation and refurbishment to create a safe and comfortable environment. Educating materials, toys, games and a playground should also be covered in this section.   

3) The above two points will result in acquisition of a preschool licence from Latvian Ministry of Education and establishment of a private kindergarten.

4) Next, coverage of an advertising campaign and creation of an interactive web page, where parents would have personalized accounts enabling them to follow the activities and achievements of their children.

5) Safety precautions in terms of video cameras with storage of 30-day video information.

6) Coverage of overheads, salaries and catering services while the kindergarten is gaining reputation and the cash flows are low due to introduction discounts. 

Unique perks for contributors of the project:

1) For the investment of up to 15 USD  your kid's drawing will be hung on the wall of fame and a personalized thank-you card will be sent to him or her . Electronic personalized gratitude will be published on the official website. 

2) For a 30 USD investment 1 cross-cultural study video for the language pair of your choice from the list above will be sent to you and a personalized gratitude will be published on the official website. 

3) For a 100 USD investment syllabus for 1 week of cross-cultural study for the language pair of your choice will be sent to you and an electronic personalized gratitude will be published on the official website. 

4) For 200 USD  investment a syllabus for 1 week of 5 languages cross-cultural study will be delivered to you electronically and a personalized gratitude will be published on the official website. 

5) For 300 USD your child will be able to visit 1 week of preschool classes given that you cover relocation and accommodation costs for your family. A personalized gratitude will be published on the official website.

6) For 500 USD your child will be able to visit 2 weeks of preschool classes given that you cover relocation and accommodation costs for your family. A personalized gratitude will be published on the official website.  

7) For 1000 USD your child will be able to visit 1 month of preschool classes given that you cover relocation and accommodation costs for your family. A personalized gratitude will be published on the official website. 

8) For 5000 USD your child will be able to visit 6 months of preschool classes given that you cover relocation and accommodation costs for your family. A personalized gratitude will be published on the official website.   

For perks through 5 to 7 please make sure you book a place for your child within 3 months from the date the kindergarden gets launched. Please keep an eye on our progress on Happy Nation Kindergarten's Facebook page (the link is given below). Let us agree that these offers expire if you do not contact us within 3 years from the date the project gets launched.

If the goal of 100000 USD is not reached I will still invest as much as I gather in the creation of cross-cultural program by either cutting the number of languages involved, or by limiting it to an online video school. If the gathered amount is too small to launch a project you may either request a refund or we could agree to make a donation to disabled children Charity Fund. 

The Impact

Can you imagine the world 20 years from now, when our children will reach their employment age? What would it be like? What knowledge and skills will keep them competitive in the job market, professional and happy? I have no exact answers, but right now, we know the names of the leading economies. Why not to take advantage of this small clue in the era of uncertainty and encourage learn-by-doing approach in our children preschool agenda. In a globalized world, early language learning may contribute to understanding and appreciating different cultures, values, and speakers of other languages.

The greatest impact of this program is that it saves the family time for communication and love instead of rushing across all city traffic jams to ensure your child has enough physical and intellectual routine. Keep it all in one place and enjoy the time spent together in the evenings and on the weekends.

On a big scale by establishing a cosmopolitan kindergarten we will create an employment for highly educated professionals for a decent pay, let the kids enjoy their care and support and create a learning-inducive environment that will become a catalyst to change in a modern educational system. Graduates of this preschool institution will be too smart for the existing school program.    

Have a look at this amazing Ted’s talk regarding the linguistic genius of babies - https://www.ted.com/talks/patricia_kuhl_the_lin...

Risks & Challenges

One of the hurdles is low awareness regarding the children superpower, so that my advertising campaign will have an educational nature in order to create the demand.

The other risk is relatively high enrollment fees; however, it will be positioned it in the same category as a private babysitter, who would never be able to produce so much value for this money – 7 languages, ballet, choreography, karate, calligraphy and singing classes combined with communication with peers, two hours of fresh air in any weather conditions every day and 7 times more National holidays and related traditions.

Other Ways You Can Help

Please be so kind and share this campaign on Indiegogo with your network of friends and professional contacts if you genuinely believe it is valuable. 

Please feel free to contact me on the project’s official Facebook page https://www.facebook.com/HappyNationsKd/ . I will be grateful to get your thoughts, ideas and suggestions and will definitely consider applying them in this project.

Thank you for your contribution and good luck in your future endeavors!

 

From Marta with warm greetings!

According to B. Franklin “Investment in knowledge pays the best interest.”Contributors will help me to launch this pilot project from the scratch: design the unique weekly-based program with daily cross-cultural overlaps over the period of 3 months, employ at least 9 highly skilled professionals and establish a cosmopolitan kindergarten in the very heart of the Baltic States, acquire a license and launch operations of the kindergarten. Languages of command - English, Spanish, French, Mandarin Chinese and German (spoken by eloquent tutors) coupled with Latvian and Russian (spoken by caring nurses). Having numerous conditions met children would not have to study the above-mentioned languages, they will just have to play, interact and live in the supportive environment with fluent and articulate native-speaking adults.Benefits provided by Happy Nations Kindergarten: Cultural: getting used to 7 languages, leading to learning diverse customs, National holidays and related traditions,Emotional: communication with peers and happy adults, two-hour walk on the street every day regardless of weather conditions;Intellectual: listening to folks in different languages, playing table and educational games;Creative: calligraphy, drawing, sculpture, LEGO and singing classes combined with  Physical: ballet, choreography, karate, playing ball and having a lot of fun!What We Need & What You GetI apply for an initial outlay of 100 000 USD to cover the following costs at least partly:1) Employment of 7 professors 3 months before the opening of the kindergarten to pay them the salaries for the development of the cross-cultural study program. Later on I will have to apply to the European Patent Office to protect Intellectual Property rights.2) Rent of the premises including renovation and refurbishment to create a safe and comfortable environment. Educating materials, toys, games and a playground should also be covered in this section.   3) The above two points will result in acquisition of a preschool licence from Latvian Ministry of Education and establishment of a private kindergarten.4) Next, coverage of an advertising campaign and creation of an interactive web page, where parents would have personalized accounts enabling them to follow the activities and achievements of their children.5) Safety precautions in terms of video cameras with storage of 30-day video information.6) Coverage of overheads, salaries and catering services while the kindergarten is gaining reputation and the cash flows are low due to introduction discounts. Unique perks for contributors of the project:1) For the investment of up to 15 USD  your kid's drawing will be hung on the wall of fame and a personalized thank-you card will be sent to him or her . Electronic personalized gratitude will be published on the official website. 2) For a 30 USD investment 1 cross-cultural study video for the language pair of your choice from the list above will be sent to you and a personalized gratitude will be published on the official website. 3) For a 100 USD investment syllabus for 1 week of cross-cultural study for the language pair of your choice will be sent to you and an electronic personalized gratitude will be published on the official website. 4) For 200 USD  investment a syllabus for 1 week of 5 languages cross-cultural study will be delivered to you electronically and a personalized gratitude will be published on the official website. 5) For 300 USD your child will be able to visit 1 week of preschool classes given that you cover relocation and accommodation costs for your family. A personalized gratitude will be published on the official website.6) For 500 USD your child will be able to visit 2 weeks of preschool classes given that you cover relocation and accommodation costs for your family. A personalized gratitude will be published on the official website.  7) For 1000 USD your child will be able to visit 1 month of preschool classes given that you cover relocation and accommodation costs for your family. A personalized gratitude will be published on the official website. 8) For 5000 USD your child will be able to visit 6 months of preschool classes given that you cover relocation and accommodation costs for your family. A personalized gratitude will be published on the official website.   For perks through 5 to 7 please make sure you book a place for your child within 3 months from the date the kindergarden gets launched. Please keep an eye on our progress on Happy Nation Kindergarten's Facebook page (the link is given below). Let us agree that these offers expire if you do not contact us within 3 years from the date the project gets launched.If the goal of 100000 USD is not reached I will still invest as much as I gather in the creation of cross-cultural program by either cutting the number of languages involved, or by limiting it to an online video school. If the gathered amount is too small to launch a project you may either request a refund or we could agree to make a donation to disabled children Charity Fund. The ImpactCan you imagine the world 20 years from now, when our children will reach their employment age? What would it be like? What knowledge and skills will keep them competitive in the job market, professional and happy? I have no exact answers, but right now, we know the names of the leading economies. Why not to take advantage of this small clue in the era of uncertainty and encourage learn-by-doing approach in our children preschool agenda. In a globalized world, early language learning may contribute to understanding and appreciating different cultures, values, and speakers of other languages.The greatest impact of this program is that it saves the family time for communication and love instead of rushing across all city traffic jams to ensure your child has enough physical and intellectual routine. Keep it all in one place and enjoy the time spent together in the evenings and on the weekends.On a big scale by establishing a cosmopolitan kindergarten we will create an employment for highly educated professionals for a decent pay, let the kids enjoy their care and support and create a learning-inducive environment that will become a catalyst to change in a modern educational system. Graduates of this preschool institution will be too smart for the existing school program.    Have a look at this amazing Ted’s talk regarding the linguistic genius of babies - https://www.ted.com/talks/patricia_kuhl_the_lin...Risks & ChallengesOne of the hurdles is low awareness regarding the children superpower, so that my advertising campaign will have an educational nature in order to create the demand.The other risk is relatively high enrollment fees; however, it will be positioned it in the same category as a private babysitter, who would never be able to produce so much value for this money – 7 languages, ballet, choreography, karate, calligraphy and singing classes combined with communication with peers, two hours of fresh air in any weather conditions every day and 7 times more National holidays and related traditions.Other Ways You Can HelpPlease be so kind and share this campaign on Indiegogo with your network of friends and professional contacts if you genuinely believe it is valuable. Please feel free to contact me on the project’s official Facebook page https://www.facebook.com/HappyNationsKd/ . I will be grateful to get your thoughts, ideas and suggestions and will definitely consider applying them in this project.Thank you for your contribution and good luck in your future endeavors! From Marta with warm greetings!

story:
"If you could dream it, you could do it" . ~ Walt Disney

It's all begin with a dream. 
A dream to make impacts for helping parents and children with a good daycare.

Oct 2016,  We had a passion to build a good daycare in Jakarta to help busy parents nurture their beloved children. 

We see this passion as an urgent need, not only to parents but to the children too as they need to have a good and proper care on SQ, EQ and IQ that the children might not get from a regular baby sitting/babysitter.

Daycare especially good daycare is very rare in Jakarta, and We're seeing this as a call and challenge for us to start building one.

We're not seeing this opportunity only in business perspective but we see this passion as a way to help both parents and children. 

For Parents (especially parents that both are working from 9 to 5), leaving their children to a new babysitter might had some issue of trust, will the new babysitter could nurture ,love , care their child/children and had a proper action on how to handle babysitting? We've heard some (not majority) of babysitters doing some scary violance to a baby because they don't have a true passion, love and care to other's children.

For Babies/Children that are under baby sitting mostly only get an ordinary / common upbringing from babysitter, without a proper education on teaching the children about knowing each other, right/wrong, good character, good knowledge, physical activity on playground, stimulation on playing an education toys, toilet training, how to say good words like thank you, sorry, motoric stimulation, etc. 

Good character education nowaday seems faded away and we need to fix it starting from a good family model. We believe that good manner/character is a seed that must "planted" from baby/child age.

Those circumstances makes us sad to hear it and wants to make changes for the situation (we started to save money in order to make this dream possible) and was the background why we had passion to build a daycare that is called Trust DayCare.

Trust DayCare is a new daycare located at West Jakarta established at Oct 2016.

 

Trust DayCare Outdoor Area


Trust DayCare Multimedia Room


Trust DayCare Indoor


Trust DayCare Indoor Pool


Trust DayCare Bed Room


Trust DayCare Class Room


We had made a site for TrustDayCare : 
(in local language : Bahasa)

www.trustdaycare.com
You could use chrome to translate it and very welcome to check the website.

Some of our children activities. You may check it out more here.

Up until now November 2017 we are trusted to nurtured 23 Children at our day care center at West Jakarta and we are very happy to see that we could help both parents and children gets their quality time.

Currently Trust DayCare is located in West Jakarta and we had a Big dream to have Trust DayCare open a new branch to reach and help other parents and children in the other area of Jakarta with your help on donation.

Some people asked us, you had running business, why you still need a donation?
We start this business with a mission to help parents and children with a low fee / low cost daycare service starting from $120-$160 per month, with 1 time registration fee $75 (you may check this pricing at our website. Those fees are used to covers up : house renting fee on current location, caregivers salary and also food and monthly bills (electricity, waters, phone), that is why we still need your funding and donation in order to open a branch and reach out other parents and children in another area of Jakarta.

Most major expenses that we need to covers on opening a new branch are :
1. House Renting Fee. 
We are hoping to rent the house in Yearly Basis.
2. Stuffs for Decoration, Educational toys, Children Books, Shelfs, Children/Infant bed, Chair and desk for children. etc
3. Hosting fee monthly for website
4. Caregivers salary
5. Electricity , Water, Telephone monthly Bills
6. Transportation for events

If you feel and had same passion with us to make impact / positive change helping parents and children with Trust DayCare, you are very welcome to take part on funding.

All the funds collected would means so much for us and we could not thank you enough. 
May God Blessed you hundred and thousand times on your funding.

All the progress of funds expenses would be updated until the end of the campaign.

Thanks alot from deep of our heart for all the funds collected.

Sincerely,


www.trustdaycare.com
https://www.facebook.com/TrustDayCare
https://twitter.com/trustdaycare
https://www.instagram.com/trustdaycare

story:
L².I.F.T is committed to helping women find their purpose, believe in their dreams and lead the lives they desire, a life of limitless possibilities.

We cater to the career woman, caught up and chained in the chaos of corporate America. She is struggling twice as hard to prove that she is worthy of the extra twenty cents she is rightfully due.  The recent graduate fighting for a chance. The single mother seeking a better way to provide. The divorcee determined to discover her independence after a failed marriage. The homemaker, bound to birth a dream deferred.  We inspire and empower these women to Live, Lead, Intentionally, Faithfully, Truthfully.

 Taking a one-of-a-kind holistic approach to business coaching, L².I.F.T provides a strong foundation in entrepreneur and leadership development as well as financial education through empowerment using a variety of educational avenues; from virtual group workshops to one-on-one coaching sessions.

Your contribution is essential to helping us fulfill our mission to cultivate strong and soaring leaders; helping sophisticated women find their voices while reaching higher heights in leadership and build thriving businesses. Your contribution will not only affect the lives of the women mentioned in our target market but the generations to follow as they continue on to become positive change agents. 

We enable women to establish a strong foundation for business start-up and growth through engaging masterclasses, workshops and one-on-one programs, which are available ranging from 4-12 weeks.  Women aging from 21-60 years old are immersed into empowering, enlightening and life-changing activities we refer to as “Barrier Breakers”; fears blocking women from living up to their full potential.

We communicate virtually on a weekly basis and provide rich content, including easy-to follow guides, complementary inspirational products and other supporting material. We also encourage accountability partnership, provide on-going support following programs/workshops and much more!

Why is this an effective method of empowering women to pursue their dreams?

By addressing fears, in which fear of failure is the greatest, finding profit producing purpose and providing them the tools to financial education (including saving, budgeting and smart investing), women receive the liberation and confidence they need to embark on a fearless entrepreneurial journey!

Through the collaborative efforts of a team of experts, our program is developed through extensive research, tested methods and reflective feedback using the framework and standards implemented by International Coaching Research Foundation, Inc(ICS).

Our program aims to empower and develop women in the following core areas:

Faith: Dispelling lies of self-doubt, addressing fears and anxieties. Women are empowered to believe in themselves, their dreams and abilities, removing all limits.

Entrepreneurship: Equipping women with tools to build a strong foundation in business; from starting a business plan to providing resources for funding.

Leadership: We inspire positive agency through mentor-ship, networking and live empowerment events.

Financial Education: Geared towards financial freedom through proper money management such as saving, and budgeting. Additionally, we encourage and educate on generational wealth building through proper resource allocation, risk management and smart investments.

Once in the program, participants receive a full agenda breaking down in-depth the content which will be covered. They may also look forward to:

Barrier Breakers: Engaging activities in which participants dive deep into self-discovery discussing backgrounds and stagnation issues. In this capacity, we dispel lies of self-doubt and dismantle fears of failure through a sequence of engaging exercises and assignments.

Our inspirational complementary products are designed to motivate women throughout their journey which includes everything necessary to complete program such as guides, worksheets, branded inspirational pens, agendas, t-shirts, water bottles and words of affirmation.

Being an Entrepreneur is good for your Health

“Women entrepreneurs in the United States rank their happiness at nearly three times that of women who are not entrepreneurs or established business owners.”

Being an Entrepreneur is good for your Wealth

“Female founders…contribute some of the greatest stats in growth in revenue, growth in employment, and financial efficiency.”

-Lisa Calhoun (30 Surprising Facts About Female Founders, Valor Ventures 2015)

We as women are the givers of life, natural nurturers and encouragers, yet too often are we disproportionately at a disadvantage when it comes to respect and earnings. Women of minority in particular, we tend to be the first to be rejected, the last protected and least respected. We have to work twice as hard just to prove ourselves in many areas but particularly business, leadership, and finance which are heavily male dominated fields. From an early age, women are groomed to be good wives and mothers but very few are encouraged to pursue entrepreneurship and seek financial independence.

 There are few entrepreneurship programs which integrate financial education in their curriculum. We are committed to giving a fighting chance to the recent college grads who lack experience in the work force but has a dream. A second chance to the single mother with a flair for fashion determined to show her girls a better way, so they can pass it along to their children. Hope for the homemaker destined to prove to herself and her family that she is valued outside of the household. New beginnings for the divorce determined to reinvent herself. The career woman ready to escape the chains and chaos of corporate America and blaze a path of her own in business.

That is why L².I.F.T believes in empowering women to pursue their dreams through entrepreneurship and leadership development as well as financial education.  We are committed because every woman deserves to be equipped with the tools she needs to be an empowered entrepreneur.

Hi I’m Titania Huff. I was raised by a single mother raising two girls.  I was that college graduate fighting for a chance. I was the divorcee who had to start a new. I was that career woman caught up and chained in the chaos of Corporate America until I broke through the barriers of fear and failure and decided that I was worthy of more. I can make a positive impact in the world.  I have experienced firsthand how liberating and empowering it can be to know your purpose and the value of walking in it to make a difference.

 I started L².I.F.T because I want to be a living example of empowerment for my two beautiful nieces to pave the way for them and women around the world to take the limits off of their dreams and guide them through necessary steps to realize them. Research shows that less than 30% of America’s business owners are women and the gender gap closes when women fund women, which is why mentor-ship and scholarship is a vital part of our mission. 

By educating and providing the development necessary to pursue entrepreneurship and leadership as well as finance, we can help women become prepared for the hosts of challenges they face as women in business.  I created L².I.F.T because I want to enable woman to break barriers of fear and embark on an empowered life of seeking limitless possibilities in which they may pay it forward to future generations.

We have made great strides since launching in 2016. Our first entrepreneurial workshop was booked to capacity drawing in women from the local community and surrounding areas. In 2017, we started the “I AM” movement in which women from across the nation were inspired, encouraged and empowered to share their stories, dispel lies of self-doubt and affirm the greatness within them; due its success, the “I AM…Affirmations of an Empowered Woman” seminar quickly ensued. Featuring a panel of women entrepreneurs from different walks of life and various industries, including international panelists, “I AM…Affirmations of an Empowered Woman” impacted women nationwide. Your support is pivotal to help widen our reach and strengthen our impact as L².I.F.T desires to empower women around the world through our programs, workshops and empowerment events.

We are seeking $50,000 to pursue marketing efforts. The funds will go towards:

  • Enhanced Software
  • Curriculum development
  • External sourcing for inspirational complementary products
  • Live empowerment events and workshops

But most closely to our hearts, a percentage of the funds will be allocated towards start-up investment scholarships for deserving women. According to business news daily, “Raising capital is even more difficult for women owned firms: A 2014 Babson College report found that less than three-percent of venture capital-funded companies had female CEOs. 

All funds will be used towards developing programs and products, but most importantly optimizing on our efficiencies.

Exceeding our goal will help us to increase visibility and broaden our marketing exposure faster, setup the best fulfillment solution to handle higher demand, create a world class team and provide other employment opportunities.

As a contributor, you can look forward to some of our exciting perks at every level to show just how much we appreciate your generosity; including L².I.F.T branded inspirational products, loads of swag gifts, meet and greet brunch opportunities in your city and a chance to be an honorary guest at a L².I.F.T empowerment event!

As a virtual-based business, supportive software is crucial to L².I.F.T’s efficiency and success; however, keeping up with the latest and greatest technological advancements could prove to be costly and takes time to implement. Curriculum enhancement, production fulfillment and shipping costs are all the things we strive to achieve the best efficiencies for programs and products. Our campaign and efforts beyond it will bring those efficiencies within reach, so please be sure to spread the word! 

We want every woman to feel liberated and empowered, paving the way for future generations, so we will explore different models to make our barrier breaking mentor-ship and scholarship programs available to under privileged women and young girls around the world.

While we greatly appreciate those who offer financial contributions, we understand that not everyone has the means to donate, but you can still help by telling everyone you know. Spreading the word is just as valuable to us as your financial support and we THANK YOU for helping us in any way you can. You can use the share tools on this page to share with other champions of women empowerment and leadership. Social media is also one of the easiest and fastest ways to get the word out!

Here are some our suggested language and hashtags for you to use or feel free to create your own:  

Facebook & Instagram

Join me in closing the gender gap: support women entrepreneurship igg.me/at/empowerher2lift #queendompreneur #lift2empowerwomen #shesempowered2lift #shesoarsinbiz

Let’s start her off strong as #shebuildsbiz, as a woman entrepreneur igg.me/at/empowerher2lift #queendompreneur #lift2empowerwomen #shesempowered2lift #shesoarsinbiz

It’s a movement! Join us as help empower and develop women entrepreneurs igg.me/at/empowerher2lift #queendompreneur #lift2empowerwomen #shesempowered2lift #shesoarsinbiz

We are open to suggestions and ideas so, if you have any, please contact us, we would love to hear from you!

According to business news daily, “Raising capital is even more difficult for women owned firms: A 2014 Babson College report found that less than three-percent of venture capital-funded companies had female CEOs. All funds will be used towards developing programs and products, but most importantly optimizing on our efficiencies.Exceeding our goal will help us to increase visibility and broaden our marketing exposure faster, setup the best fulfillment solution to handle higher demand, create a world class team and provide other employment opportunities.As a contributor, you can look forward to some of our exciting perks at every level to show just how much we appreciate your generosity; including L².I.F.T branded inspirational products, loads of swag gifts, meet and greet brunch opportunities in your city and a chance to be an honorary guest at a L².I.F.T empowerment event!As a virtual-based business, supportive software is crucial to L².I.F.T’s efficiency and success; however, keeping up with the latest and greatest technological advancements could prove to be costly and takes time to implement. Curriculum enhancement, production fulfillment and shipping costs are all the things we strive to achieve the best efficiencies for programs and products. Our campaign and efforts beyond it will bring those efficiencies within reach, so please be sure to spread the word! We want every woman to feel liberated and empowered, paving the way for future generations, so we will explore different models to make our barrier breaking mentor-ship and scholarship programs available to under privileged women and young girls around the world.While we greatly appreciate those who offer financial contributions, we understand that not everyone has the means to donate, but you can still help by telling everyone you know. Spreading the word is just as valuable to us as your financial support and we THANK YOU for helping us in any way you can. You can use the share tools on this page to share with other champions of women empowerment and leadership. Social media is also one of the easiest and fastest ways to get the word out!Here are some our suggested language and hashtags for you to use or feel free to create your own:  Facebook & Instagram Join me in closing the gender gap: support women entrepreneurship igg.me/at/empowerher2lift #queendompreneur #lift2empowerwomen #shesempowered2lift #shesoarsinbizLet’s start her off strong as #shebuildsbiz, as a woman entrepreneur igg.me/at/empowerher2lift #queendompreneur #lift2empowerwomen #shesempowered2lift #shesoarsinbizIt’s a movement! Join us as help empower and develop women entrepreneurs igg.me/at/empowerher2lift #queendompreneur #lift2empowerwomen #shesempowered2lift #shesoarsinbizWe are open to suggestions and ideas so, if you have any, please contact us, we would love to hear from you!

story:
Check us out at - www.fluingo.online

Language Conversation App ? What is that ?

There are a lot of language learning apps out in the market that help users to learn many different languages. BUT, their mode of learning does not offer interactivity and is often very static.

Speaking and Interacting with people is the fastest way to Learn to speak a language. 

The main problem with MOST language learning apps:

  • Boring quiz-based learning method
  • No real interactivity / social aspect

So.. What's the solution ?

Fluingo is a match based language conversation app that enables the users to have a real-time conversation with other matched users in the language of their choice.

Fluingo provides situational conversation sets and feedback for the user, to help them learn to speak the language in different situations.

Unlike traditional language learning apps, The goal of Fluingo is to make it possible to learn a language by actually speaking it and provide a social and more personalized aspect to language learning.

How it Works..

1. Create a Personalized Profile

2. Choose a language to speak and a situation of conversation

3. Get matched with a user with similar language interest and GET SPEAKING!

Fluingo uses advanced cloud based speech technologies to recognize the user's conversation in various different languages.

The built in A.I would provide the appropriate replies as per the situation that the user chose.

So you can just focus on practicing the language rather than thinking about what to speak.

The app also provides users with the live time pronounciation and translation.

Funding Logistics and Timeline

What will we use the funds for ?

- Speed up development and develop the app using professional expertise

- Market the brand and grow user base

- Backend / Hosting costs

Current Timeline

So Far..

- Initial Market Research success and built a strong idea and business model

- Over 500 people signed up already for beta access

- MVP app in development.

- In the process of growing the user base.

Future..

- App development complete by November 2020 end and user testing/release.

Constant updates about the progress of the app/company frequently.

story:
If you have any questions about this campaign, please email anthony@stepbystepsportsuniversity.com.

The coronavirus pandemic has shaken the world, and unfortunately the sports world has been put on hold. For the past 150+ years, baseball has been an American pastime begining in the spring.  This year it will be delayed.  While we go through baseball withdrawals, it is the perfect time to learn how to make watching baseball more enjoyable and exciting.  You can be part of the action and feel the rush of competition. Daily fantasy baseball is a great diversion from the stresses of everyday life, and a way to escape for a few hours.  A Whole New Ball Game is a step by step book that will teach you how to win at daily fantasy baseball. Through lessons learned over the past 20+ years, there are specific statistics that you can rely on to predict future results.  I will teach you how to gather this information for free and how to build winning lineups.  A Whole New Ball Game will teach you the 3 secrets professional fantasy players don't want you to know about playing daily fantasy baseball.

You will learn how to rank Starting Pitching, Hitting, Bullpens, Weather, and Ballpark Factor in minutes. More importantly, how to sort that information and turn it into winning Daily Fantasy Sports (DFS) lineups. This system was used to win over $450k in the past two years only taking about 15 minutes a day! Although, these results are not typical.  You don’t need to be an excel wizard with algorithms. You can win at daily fantasy sports as a hobby, it does not need to be a full time job. This book is designed to make you self-reliant and not have to buy picks or join membership sites.

This book is written by Anthony Lange, known as Clubber62 in the fantasy sports industry.  Anthony started Step By Step Sports University to help sports fans learn to play Daily Fantasy successfully. This is something we are very passionate about. We will teach with a combination of online courses, livestreams, and resource guides. We lay out the exact blueprint so you can benefit from 20+ years of experience and win consistently!

 I am writing this book because I was sick of seeing people taken advantage of by the fake sports gurus. The quality of the information being sold is terrible and customers are wasting their money on losing sports picks and lineup purchases. I have learned a lot in my time playing daily fantasy sports. While learning these lessons I have won hundreds of thousands of dollars and been to multiple DFS World Championships.  I don't say this to brag, but to ensure you that the information you are getting has worked!  I have been able to break down my process for picking winning MLB lineups into easily repeatable steps. I genuinely want my students to succeed. So much so, I am going to be creating an online fantasy sports community to support you on your journey. This will help make sure you are on the right track.  If all this book did was make your fantasy sports hobby profitable, would it be worth it?

I utilize a simple Green, Yellow, and Red sorting system.  If you can read a stoplight you can use this system! This book will have step by step breakdowns and color images to help explain all the concepts.  Math is not needed!  if you can count to 20, then you can use this system.

I am reaching out to the fantasy sports community to help bring good information to the masses and keep things interesting while we're all staying home. We are going to have a bunch of unique rewards available to our backers.  We will have everything from limited edition merchandise, private lessons with Anthony, Slack chat access, weekly livestreams, and even Anthony's daily plays sent to you.  These items will only be available to people who pledge to this campaign and we will be posting new rewards a few times a week, so keep checking this space! Thank you for checking out our Indiegogo campaign, I look forward to delivering this book to you!

In an effort to give back to the community, 25% of backer funds received will be donated to the Miracle League!

The Miracle League Mission Is To:

•Provide opportunities for children with disabilities to play Miracle League baseball, regardless of their abilities.

•Promote community support and sponsorship of Miracle Leagues.

•Promote the construction of special facilities that meet the unique needs of Miracle League players and their families.

“EVERY CHILD DESERVES A CHANCE TO PLAY BASEBALL.”

Risks & Challenges

Risks are super low. The production of the book is straightforward and I am already in discussions with a factory we have printed materials with before. They provide exceptional work and can deliver on time. I have already conducted thorough research, planned the chapters, and have the system documented. I am writing the book myself and don't need to rely on third parties to meet deadlines. I have consulted with several book authors to see how long each part of the process takes and I have considered all factors when estimating timelines.

Other Ways You Can Help

  • Please get the word out to your friends and family who play fantasy sports! 
  • Share the link to this campaign on your social media. My backers are my main marketing plan! You can reach people in your circle that I may never get to know. Share the good news and everyone gets more STRETCH GOAL Items!
  • Sharing is easy with the Indiegogo share tools!

story:
Hello Friends, Family, Colleagues, Mentors,

I hope you have all been well!  I am happy to announce that I have been accepted into the MMus in Opera program at UBC in Vancouver. I am extremely excited and eager at the prospect of working with one of the best teaches in Canada, Patrick Raftery, who comes highly recommended from one of my mentors. I am hoping to attend in the Fall; I believe this program will help me achieve a level of professionalism and consistency required for this career. 

   In order to attend, I need to fundraise $4500-$6000 to help with the move, tuition costs, housing etc. AEROPLAN AND AIR MILES DONATIONS ALSO ACCEPTED!! I would need to raise the allotted amount by July 14th to know if I can move to Vancouver by middle August l. I plan on finding a job upon my arrival. After going through my finances, if I can raise this amount then I can live in Vancouver without going further into debt.  This is something that is really important to me  and anything helps! If the allotted amount is not raise raised after two months, all online donations will be refunded. I am very much looking forward to this new adventure and fresh start! I thank you for your consideration.

Diploma Program Cost: $4500 

Transit Pass for the Year: $432 ($36/month)

Flight to Vancouver (one way): $381-$453 (including tax)

Average Rent: $850(1-2 bedroom)

Hostel for two weeks: $250 (to find a place and job)

Food for a month: $250


Ryan Hofman

story:
Green Mountain Collective is our shared dream to build an education space to provide a learning experience for people of all ages.

We would like to create an artist studio and working farm that will offer a variety of classes as well as workshops taught both in the studio and outside on the beautiful forested property.

Our workshops will include, but are not limited to:

  • Natural and sustainable living that will be tied directly into the working farm and homestead found on the property
  • A multitude of natural wellness classes that will be taught by local instructors from the community
  • Basic clay techniques including hand building and use of a pottery wheel
  • Other creative workshops that will be ever changing to meet the demand and need of our members.

Together we have a combined 25 years of experience in both the art and farming community.

We would like to offer our experience to the public who have expressed a great interest and desire to learn skills not currently available in our area.

this project is very important to us and our community, we hope that you will join us on our journey.

story:
"Education is the most powerful weapon which you can use to change the world"

By Nelson Mandela

"Every Child has Right for Education"

"Buy Maasai handmade product to support this school"

Frank Swai and Rev. Joshua laiser are the founders of Pambazuka Naisinyai School. The idea of starting Pambazuka Naisinyai School came to the mind of Frank and Joshua after seeing the challenges facing Maasai communities in Tanzania. Rev. Joshua is a Maasai by tribe and he was born and raised in the Maasai communities so he knows much about the challenges facing his communities.He says "Education has been severe challenge in the Maasai communities as most of families don't know the importance of education for future life of their children. So we are working hard to educate parents and community in general so that they can know the importance of education. So the Pambazuka Naisinyai School is for Maasai children and nearby communities. Please join us and donate something to support this project!!

 

Early Marriage and circumcision for the young Maasai girls.

Imagine a world where every child is educated and can contribute to the development process!!

So many times parents in Maasai  areas tend to give away their young girls for marriage in exchange for just a kilogram of sugar, a goat, a cow , some tea leaves and sometimes for salt. These young girls are then subjected to domestic violence, torture, early child birth and many times girls have died while giving birth because their bodies are never ready to experience child birth.

Many times the parents to these girls need to be empowered with information about the benefits of keeping their children in school until they complete their education. Once these girls have acquired the education, they can provide all the above mentioned items to their parents for the rest of their lives. All that parents need to to practice some bit of patience and sacrifice a little in order to enjoy the fruits of their children.

Circumcision for the women is prohibited but Maasai societies they still circumcise their young girls. We are working hard to educate them so that they can stop this.

Its time to reach out to the parents in the Maasai land settings and sensitize them if we want a better future for girls. A future where they can participate in leadership positions. A future where they can make informed choices and start up families the the men of their choice.

The time is now. Lets teach the Parents because they need this knowledge.

Beautiful Maasai girls

Young Boys:  Young boys normally are send to keep cows and goats far away from home and come back evening everyday. Others they like to go to school but not allowed to go!!

Young Maasai Kids in the bush keeping cows

Education: Most of Maasai children don't go to school due to the environment they are living. Their parent don't understand the importance of their children to get better education. So we are trying our level best to educate these Maasai societies so that they can allow their children to go to school. Also there are scarcity of nearest school in their areas so we are working hard to build school near them to attract and convince their parent to allow them to attend school.

Our effort made us to start building Pambazuka Naisinyai School http://www.pambazuka.sc.tz  for which this school started under the tree but with our own effort we have managed to build some two classes and bought some desks so we need to work hard to make it happen!!

 Maasai children in front of their houses

 

Our School Started under the tree

Our school started under the tree as we do not have resources to help us for building classes for the Maasai children. Education should start with their parents to educate them so that they can know the importance of education to their children. Some of the parents are now aware about education to their children so they are allowing them to attend school. We are still talking to the parents so that they can give us a good cooperation.

Students and their teacher having class session under the tree

 

 NEW TWO CLASSES

Through our own efforts we have managed to build two classes where grade one and two are using for studying. We have more 10 acres where we want to build more classes as we have more students coming soon. We want to build more classes up to seven classes, we also need to build kitchen, toilet as the one we have is not enough, computers and computer lab, well for keeping water as there is scarcity of water, desks, books, office for teachers, salaries for teachers.

Our two New Classes

 

WHY THIS CAMPAIGN IS IMPORTANT

We decided to start a school in Maasai society so as to convince the Maasai on Education. Maasai society is leaving a life with no permanent settlement, thus not getting a chance for schooling. Also the society lives a life of animal husbandry which is difficult for parents to allow their children in distant schools due to they depend of them for rearing animals. Therefore starting a school within Maasai society will convince parents allowing their children to attend school near by them. That is the school I started within Maasai society is purposely to help the Maasai children. It is called PAMBAZUKA NAISINYAI PRE & PRIMARY SCHOOL         http://www.pambazuka.sc.tz   . Already our school has grade one (1) with 65 pupils , grade two with 55 and grade three with 35  pupils and 4 teachers who use most of their time teaching the children for most of them can’t speak neither Swahili nor English, but Maasai language.

Student doing class work on the ground

 

What We Need 

We need to build two more classes at this stage to make a total of four classes. The cost of one class and it desks is $7000 so two classes will cost $14000. You can donate direct for those who don't want anything in return and those who need something from Tanzania then choose your interested perk.

 

What gift you get by donating to the project

Maasai tribe are expert in making different jewelries handmade products so by donating to our project you will be benefiting with a nice handmade product from Maasai land. 

1. Maasai Brass earrings

2. Maasai Bracelet

3. Maasai Blanket

4. Hat with a photo of Mount Kilimanjaro or Maasai Picture

5. Maasai beaded jeweler sandals

 

Other Ways You Can Help

Please tell friends and family about our campaign and our socially-good mission!

Please share our campaign page through the IndieGoGo share buttons on our campaign page!

Please share our campaign on your social networks such as facebook, twitter e.t.c

Thank you very much for your support! Every bit is greatly appreciated!

 

School website: www.pambazuka.sc.tz

Facebook:  https://www.facebook.com/Pambazuka-Naisinyai-Sc...

Twitter:   https://twitter.com/PambazukaSchool

We want to build more classes up to seven classes, we also need to build kitchen, toilet as the one we have is not enough, computers and computer lab, well for keeping water as there is scarcity of water, desks, books, office for teachers, salaries for teachers.Our two New Classes WHY THIS CAMPAIGN IS IMPORTANTWe decided to start a school in Maasai society so as to convince the Maasai on Education. Maasai society is leaving a life with no permanent settlement, thus not getting a chance for schooling. Also the society lives a life of animal husbandry which is difficult for parents to allow their children in distant schools due to they depend of them for rearing animals. Therefore starting a school within Maasai society will convince parents allowing their children to attend school near by them. That is the school I started within Maasai society is purposely to help the Maasai children. It is called PAMBAZUKA NAISINYAI PRE & PRIMARY SCHOOL         http://www.pambazuka.sc.tz   . Already our school has grade one (1) with 65 pupils , grade two with 55 and grade three with 35  pupils and 4 teachers who use most of their time teaching the children for most of them can’t speak neither Swahili nor English, but Maasai language.Student doing class work on the ground What We Need We need to build two more classes at this stage to make a total of four classes. The cost of one class and it desks is $7000 so two classes will cost $14000. You can donate direct for those who don't want anything in return and those who need something from Tanzania then choose your interested perk. What gift you get by donating to the projectMaasai tribe are expert in making different jewelries handmade products so by donating to our project you will be benefiting with a nice handmade product from Maasai land. 1. Maasai Brass earrings2. Maasai Bracelet3. Maasai Blanket4. Hat with a photo of Mount Kilimanjaro or Maasai Picture5. Maasai beaded jeweler sandals Other Ways You Can HelpPlease tell friends and family about our campaign and our socially-good mission!Please share our campaign page through the IndieGoGo share buttons on our campaign page!Please share our campaign on your social networks such as facebook, twitter e.t.cThank you very much for your support! Every bit is greatly appreciated! School website: www.pambazuka.sc.tzFacebook:  https://www.facebook.com/Pambazuka-Naisinyai-Sc...Twitter:   https://twitter.com/PambazukaSchool

story:
PLEASE SEE THE ENGLISH TEXT BELOW


(ITA)

HI HERE App: una proposta innovativa per rispondere alla "crisi dei rifugiati"


HI HERE è una App che permette ai rifugiati di connettersi, condividere la propria esperienza e raccogliere informazioni sul diritto di asilo e i servizi locali di accoglienza, verso il recupero psicologico, l'empowerment e l'integrazione.

I punti di forza di HI HERE

 

HI HERE è una soluzione generata dal basso

HI HERE nasce dai bisogni concreti espressi dai richiedenti asilo stessi e fornisce loro un mezzo per creare una rete di supporto reciproco in cui poter esprimere la propria voce.

HI HERE è unica

HI HERE riesce a dare una risposta comune a diversi bisogni: connettere, informare, dare voce e supportare.

HI HERE è scalabile

HI HERE si sviluppa a partire dal territorio italiano, ma è ideata per essere successivamente potenziata e diffusa in tutta Europa.

HI HERE ha bisogno del tuo supporto per completare la programmazione della App



HI HERE sta diventando realtà grazie al contributo di organizzazioni e persone come te! Ogni piccola donazione farà la differenza. E' stimato che:

per ogni EURO donato un RIFUGIATO potrà scaricare HI HERE gratuitamente!

Nel 2015 più di un milione di migranti hanno raggiunto l'Europa via mare e si stima che nel 2016 il numero di arrivi sarà ancora maggiore.

Cosa succede se HI HERE riceve più di 20'000 euro?

Maggiori i fondi a disposizione, più numerose saranno le realtà locali raggiunte da HI HERE!

Con questa campagna HI HERE si pone l'obiettivo di completare la programmazione della App, ma il lavoro per sfruttare al meglio le potenzialità di HI HERE non finisce qui. Ogni donazione ulteriore verrà utilizzata per finanziare la campagna di diffusione di HI HERE in Italia, programmata per l'estate 2016. 


Il quadro della situazione: traguardi raggiunti ed obiettivi futuri



HI HERE ha trovato una prima comunità di consenso e supporto

L’Università London School of Economics ha già sostenuto HI HERE ospitando un evento di live crowdfunding YTFN il 26 gennaio 2016, dove il progetto è stato presentato in anteprima. I fondi e le competenze ottenuti in questa serata hanno reso possibile avviare la programmazione della App.

Quali sono i passi futuri?

Nel maggio 2016, quando una versione test di HI HERE sarà pronta, verranno eseguiti i primi test nelle città di Trento, Parma e Foggia coinvolgendo direttamente le realtà locali che si occupano di accoglienza e i richiedenti asilo presenti in questi territori.

La App sarà perfezionata secondo i riscontri dati dai test per essere lanciata ufficialmente a fine giugno 2016. HI HERE sarà scaricabile gratuitamente da smartphone con sistema operativo Android e iOS.

Durante l'estate 2016 si svolgerà una campagna di diffusione della App in tutta Italia.


Scopri di più


Come è nato il progetto HI HERE?

HI HERE si propone di tradurre la RICERCA in AZIONE!

HI HERE nasce da un'approfondita ricerca sui sistemi di accoglienza di richiedenti asilo e rifugiati, condotta da Martina per il conseguimento del MSc in Regional and Urban Planning Studies (London School of Economics, novembre 2015). 

Durante il lavoro sul campo condotto in sud Italia durante l'estate 2015, Martina e Caterina hanno rilevato alcuni degli aspetti critici dell'accoglienza ed hanno potuto analizzare i principali bisogni espressi dagli stessi richiedenti asilo: ristabilire dei legami sociali, accedere all'informazione, trovare nuove opportunità, esprimere la propria voce.


Perchè una App?

Una App per smartphone è lo STRUMENTO più efficace per CONNETTERE, INFORMARE, DARE VOCE e SUPPORTARE il maggior numero di richiedenti asilo!

La maggior parte dei richiedenti asilo investe i propri risparmi nell'acquisto di uno smartphone per potersi connettere in un punto WiFi ed avere accesso ai social network. In questo modo i migranti hanno la possibilità di rintracciare familiari e conterranei presenti in Italia e/o in Europa per comunicare con essi, condividere commenti sui territori ospitanti cercando nuove opportunità, raccogliere informazioni sul diritto di asilo e sui servizi di accoglienza locali.

Quale impatto avrà HI HERE?

Oltre ad assistere i richiedenti asilo, HI HERE costituisce un mezzo per migliorare il Sistema Nazionale di Protezione, la rete di ONG operanti nel campo dell’accoglienza e l'intera società!

Monitoraggio dal basso

Raccogliendo le esperienze e le percezioni dei richiedenti asilo sui progetti e i servizi di accoglienza locali, HI HERE fornisce un monitoraggio dal basso esteso a tutta Italia. Il team di HI HERE avrà un accesso sicuro e controllato a questi dati e produrrà report scritti misurando la soddisfazione dei richiedenti asilo riguardo al Sistema Nazionale di Protezione.

Potenziamento della rete di ONG

HI HERE potenzia il raggio d’azione e l’efficienza della rete di ONG. Postando annunci, eventi e offrendo aiuto online, le ONG saranno in grado di raggiungere un ampio numero di utenti in differenti località. Inoltre, una maggiore trasparenza nella fornitura di servizi migliorerà la qualità dei servizi stessi.

Superamento di barriere sociali

HI HERE aiuta a superare i pregiudizi e le barriere all'integrazione, nella convinzione che questi siano causati da disinformazione e mancanza di contatto diretto tra rifugiati e comunità locali. Tutta la popolazione potrà scaricare HI HERE, entrare in contatto con la realtà dei migranti e raccogliere personalmente informazioni sul funzionamento dell’accoglienza.


Supporta HI HERE e condividi questa campagna!

Visita il sito www.hihere.eu - puoi trovare maggiori informazioni riguardanti il TEAM, la STORIA, la APP e il suo IMPATTO, e scoprire altri modi per SOSTENERE HI HERE. 

Diventa un tassello del nostro MOSAICO! Invia una foto della tua MANO a info@hihere.eu, specificando il tuo nome, iniziale del cognome e il tuo luogo d'origine.



(ENG)

HI HERE App: an innovative proposal in response to the "refugee crises"


HI HERE is a mobile phone App enabling refugees to connect, share their experience, and gather information on asylum law and local services of reception towards psychological recovery, empowerment and integration.


Main strenghts of HI HERE


HI HERE is a bottom up solution

HI HERE generates from concrete needs, as expressed by asylum seekers themselves. HI HERE provides a network of  mutual support enabling asylum seekers to express their voice.

HI HERE is unique

HI HERE is a joint response to multiple needs: connect, inform, empower and recover.

HI HERE is scalable

HI HERE takes form in the Italian context, but it is designed to be progressively upgraded and diffused all over Europe.

HI HERE needs your support to complete the development of the App



HI HERE runs on contributions from organisations and people like you! Every small donation can make a huge difference. It is estimated that:

every EURO donated, a REFUGEE will download HI HERE for free!

In 2015 over a million migrants made their way to Europe by sea and it is foreseen that in 2016 the number will be even greater.

What happens if HI HERE gets more than 20'000 euros?

The more funds we raise, the higher the number of localities HI HERE will be able to reach!

Through the campaign, we aim to complete the development of the App. Anyway, much more work has to be done to take full advantage of HI HERE potentiality. We will invest any additional donation in HI HERE marketing campaign, which is planned for summer 2016.


Picture of the situation: achieved goals and future objectives



HI HERE has found a first community of support

The London School of Economics has already supported HI HERE by hosting a live crowd funding event (YTFN) at which the project was presented. That event enabled us to raise the funds and recruit the skills we needed to get the project up and running.

What are the next steps?

In May 2016, when the HI HERE test version will be ready, we will test the App in Trento, Parma and Foggia, involving local organizations and refugees settled in these territories.

The App will be redefined according to the test findings, in order to be officially launched at the end of June 2016. It will be possible to download HI HERE for free to smartphones with Android and iOS operating systems.

During summer 2016, a marketing campaign will occur all over Italy.


Learn more


How was HI HERE born?

HI HERE aims to translate RESEARCH into ACTION!

HI HERE is the result of extensive research regarding systems of refugee reception conducted by Martina for the completion of an MSc in Regional and Urban Planning Studies (London School of Economics, November 2015).

During the fieldwork conducted in Southern Italy in the summer 2015, Martina and Caterina noticed some of the critical aspects of reception. They analized the main needs reported by asylum seekers: re-establishing their social networks, accessing information, getting new opportunities, expressing their voice.

Why an App?

A mobile phone App is the most efficient TOOL to CONNECT, INFORM, EMPOWER and RECOVER as much asylum seekers as possible!

Most asylum seekers invest all of their savings in buying smartphones to connect to WiFi hot spots and access social networks. They do so to catch up with dispersed family members and countrymen in Italy and all over Europe, to share comments on the host territories in search of new opportunities, to gather information on asylum rights and local services of reception.

What impact will HI HERE have?

In addition to assisting refugees, HI HERE constitutes a tool to improve the National System of Protection, the network of NGOs operating in the field of reception and wide society!

Bottom up monitorage

HI HERE provides bottom-up, nation-wide monitoring of local projects and local services of protection, through collecting asylum seekers’ experiences and perceptions. The team of HI HERE will have secure access to this data and will produce written reports surveying asylum seekers’ satisfaction with the National System of protection.

NGOs networking

HI HERE enhances the outreach and the efficiency of the NGOs’ network. By posting announcements, events and offers of help online, NGOs will be able to reach a wide range of users at different locations. Moreover, greater transparency in service provision will enhance the quality of the services provided.

Breaking down social barriers

HI HERE helps to break down prejudices and barriers to integration, in the conviction that these are based on misinformation and a lack of contact between refugee and local communities. Anybody will be able to download HI HERE, get in touch with the refugees' reality and gather first hand information on the functioning of protection.


Support HI HERE and share this campaign!

Visit our website www.hihere.eu to find out more information about our TEAM and BACKGROUND, the APP and its IMPACT, and learn other ways to SUPPORT HI HERE. 

Join our MOSAIC! Send a picture of your HAND to info@hihere.eu, indicating your name, surname initial and your place of origin.

story:
English readers, please scroll down.

Vous rencontrez des difficultés pour valider votre panier ? On vous guide pas à pas, ici!

vous pouvez également nous écrire directement au 237@intellectcameroun.com;opepamjacques@yahoo.fr;  Tel :  +237 694737624

Présentation du projet

Intellect est une école virtuelle qui interconnecte les élèves et étudiants de divers établissements, dans le but de mutualiser les connaissances et apporter des solutions aux problèmes des uns et des autres afin de réduire l’échec scolaire.

C’est un projet ambitieux et passionnant dans la mesure où il permettra à chaque collégien, étudiant, où qu’il soit, de bénéficier d’une assistance académique de qualité, d'une veille académique (les élèves s’informent de ce qui est fait ailleurs), ce qui réduira les inégalités entre ceux qui peuvent payer de bonnes études et ceux qui ne le peuvent pas.

Plus concrètement

Intellect est un ensemble de salles virtuelles où les élèves et étudiants sont regroupés par spécialités, niveaux et par régions. Un élève qui fait par exemple une Terminale  Scientifique, s’interconnecte avec tous ceux qui font la même classe. De manière journalière, les problèmes sont posés et résolus sous plusieurs formats (images, PDF, Vidéos, Audio et autres).

Objectifs du projet

Le projet vise tout d’abord à apporter une assistance académique à distance aux élèves des zones rurales et enclavées d’Afrique. Ensuite, à interconnecter les élèves des zones enclavées avec les établissements des grands centres urbains. Enfin, interconnecter tous ces établissements  à l’international. Il est question ici, dans un monde de plus en plus compétitif, de permettre une égalité de chance pour tous, une éducation équitable. Le coaching des élèves est important pour les préparer à un Monde en pleine mutation et compétitif.

L’impact

Le projet viendra réduire l’échec scolaire, rehausser le niveau scolaire des élèves et étudiants et permettre à une majorité de ces derniers de divers horizons d’être compétitifs.

Selon le dernier classement 2017 des 500 meilleures Universités du Monde par l’Université jiotong de Shanghaï, l’Afrique n’a que trois universités représentées dans ce classement. Nous sommes  également  en arrière dans l'enseignement  secondaire  avec quelques exceptions. L’éducation, le savoir est l’arme de développement de toute nation. Nous pensons qu’il faut assurer une meilleure éducation à notre jeunesse afin d’éclore une multitude de talents et non la minorité comme c'est le cas en ce moment .De dizaines de millions de jeunes élèves et étudiants à travers le continent font face à de multiples problèmes d’encadrement académique, de coaching et d’orientation. Plusieurs jeunes Talentueux, du fait du manque d'encadrement, d’orientation et de moyens financiers, sombrent dans la débauche d'où l’arrêt brusque d’études de certains et la non insertion dans la société.

 

Présentation du porteur de projet

Je suis  jacques OPEPAM, entrepreneur et élève ingénieur en Génie Industriel, MASTER 2 (Université de Douala-Cameroun).J’ai effectué mon cycle primaire et secondaire dans l’arrondissement de SA'A,  à 70 km de Yaoundé, où j’ai parallèlement développé des activités en agriculture et vannerie alors que j’étais en classe de 5ième. Après mon Baccalauréat en science  Physique et Mathématique (BACC ''C'')  en 2012, j’intègre l’une des prestigieuses écoles d’ingénieur de la sous-région, la Faculté de Génies Industriel (FGI) de Douala-Cameroun. A peine deux mois de cours, j’ai la chance de rencontrer  un aîné académique aujourd’hui  patron d’une PME prospère, qui va réveiller en moi l’amour de l’entrepreneuriat. Je commence par la conception des fascicules (corrections des sujets d’examens et autres), puis je continu à développer des projets Technologiques avec des camarades. Président du Club de ma filière (TCI) en Master 1 , je décide me lancer définitivement dans l’entrepreneuriat dans le but d’aider notre jeunesse à une réussite scolaire et une meilleure insertion dans le monde socio-professionnel. Je pense être à la hauteur et j’espère rejoindre les grandes figures de l’entrepreneuriat moderne à l’instar de TONY ELUMELU (Nigéria), Paul FOKAM KOMOGNE (Cameroun),Elon Musk (USA), Jeff Bezos et autres. 

L’équipe

 

Nous sommes une jeune équipe dynamique de 6 membres et une cinquantaine de volontaires

1) Jacques Opepam                                      Ceo and Co-Founder   

2) Gaelle Patricia Talotsing                        Co-Founder

3) Louisette  Ateba Fouda ,                         Marketiste

4) Rodolf Biloa Ngah                                     Développeur

5) Daril Ousmanou                                        Développeur

Responsable  département

6) Mathématique :      Kuate Hyppolite ; licence en Mathématique-master 1 en HSSI

    Technologique :     Onana jean pierre ; licence en physique -master 2 en TCI

     Physique :                Tchoupa Albin, licence en physique- master 1 en HSSI

Une cinquantaine de volontaires Licenciés, Masters, Doctorants et Docteurs en diverses disciplines travaillent avec nous.

 

Pourquoi le Crowdfunding ?

Nous recherchons 5000 &  pour s’implémenter et se déployer sur le terrain dès la prochaine rentrée scolaire 2018/2019 au Mois de Septembre.  

 

Utilisation des fonds

 

1) Développement de l’application mobile (1500 $)

2) Achats du matériel de travail et informatique (ordinateurs, imprimantes, photocopieuses,  Vidéo projecteurs, cameras, micros et autres) (2000 $)

3) Frais internet (pour  100 utilisateurs à destination des correcteurs) pendant 03 mois (700 $)

4) Fonds de roulement (800 $)

Total : 5000 $

Nos références

Nous avons un site internet www.intellectcameroun.com , une page Facebook intellect Cameroun https://web.facebook.com/Intellectcameroun/. Nous avons eu des distinctions nationales (finaliste malheureux au business challenge du ministère de la jeunesse du Cameroun-février 2018), nominé au digital Thursday (mai 2017) https://twitter.com/africatechie/status/867831684196184064, meilleure start-up ayant impactée les étudiants de la Faculté de Génie Industriel de l’Université de Douala en 2017) et une distinction internationale (celle de la Fondation de Tony Elumelu)http://www.tonyelumelufoundation.org/uploads/2018/03/TEF_1000_NAMES_2018.pdf. Tous ces organismes nous ont fait confiance. A partir de rien, nous avons réussi en  deux ans, à apporter des solutions aux divers  problèmes des milliers d'étudiants, et à mettre au point un certain nombre de nos produits.

 

Date prévue de distribution des contreparties : Septembre 2018

Si les Objectifs ne sont pas atteints

On mettra les fonds au développement de l’application mobile et à l’achat du strict minimum de matériel indispensable à l’avancement du projet.

Risques et défis

De petits risques sont à signaler. En ce moment, nous sommes en train de développer l’application mobile et des algorithmes d’apprentissage, dont la finalisation devrait être à la fin du Mois d'Août.  Il peut arriver qu’on ait des retards de délais.

Mais nous aurons suffisamment de temps pour  remédier.

Le Budget souhaité est estimé à 8 000 & soit 3000 & de plus. Si on dépasse le strict minimum de 5000 &, nous augmenterons notre capacité en Matériel et augmenterons notre Fonds de Roulement. 

Soutenir le projet

Pour prendre part à ce projet, choisissez votre don.

Mais soutenir ce projet c'est aussi en parler autour de vous, le partager sur vos réseaux sociaux... Bref faire du bruit car n'oubliez pas, notre réussite dépend de vous. 

 

 

 

English version

 

Presentation of Project

Intellect is an educative and teaching platform (web and mobile) which brings together students of all institutions and schools, to mutualize knowledge and solve problems faced by each other to achieve better school results. Our mission is to bring school support, coaching and orientation in a system where only the rich have access to quality education.

This an ambitious and social project because it provides quality academic assistance to students wherever they are. Moreover it’s a vector to share experiences and knowledge between students in different location, in real time. This can reduce inequalities between those who can afford access to good schools and those who can’t.

 

In Few Words (Summary)

Intellect is a set of virtual classrooms, where students are grouped by specialties. A student doing for example upper sixth science connected with those of the same level.

Objective of project

The main objective of project is to provide remote academic assistance to students in rural areas. Then, to interconnect those of rural areas with those of urban schools. Finally, interconnect all schools around the world. In a world that is more and more competitive we have to give the same opportunity in life to everybody, one education for all. That is why, student’s coaching is so important just to prepare them for a world that is replete with challenges and competitiveness.

impact

   The project’s overall outcome is to reduce academic mediocrity. To rise up the school level and help many students of different areas to be competitive.

According to a ranking of the world’s best 500 done in 2017 by Jiotong, of the University of Shanghai , Africa had only three representations. We are also backward in secondary education with very few exceptions. Education, Knowledge, is a powerful arm for the development of a nation. We have to assure a better education to our youth to rise up many talents and not only have a minority as we have today. Many young students, estimated at a million all over our continent, are facing many problems of academic care, coaching and orientation. Many young talented people who lack academic care, orientation and financial resources generally go astray and fall short of in their way to successful integration into the society.

 

Who is the project’s founder?

I’m Jacques Opepam, young entrepreneur, student engineer in Industrial engineering and holder of a Master 2(University of Douala- Cameroon).

I did my primary and secondary course at SA’A, 70 km from Yaoundé. In form 2, I started doing some agriculture and basketry.

 After my Baccaulaureat in Physics and Mathematics in 2012, I went to the prestigious Faculty of industrial engineering (FGI) of the University of Douala- Cameroun. After only  two Months of attendance, I was lucky to meet an academic elder ,who’s the chairman of a medium enterprise nowadays, and he gave me the love of entrepreneurship which later develop in the desire to emulate entrepreneurship  trailblazers such as Tony Elumelu (Nigeria), Paul Fokam Komogne ( Cameroon),Elon Musk ( USA) Jeff Bezos and others.

Team

We are 6 members and more than 50 volunteers

1) Jacques Opepam                                            Ceo and Co-Founder   

2) Gaelle Patricia Talotsing                              Co-Founder

3) Louisette   Ateba  Fouda ,                             Marketist

4) Rodolf Biloa Ngah                                           Developer

5) Daril  Ousmanou                                              Developer

Head of department

6) Mathematic : Kuate Hyppolite  license in mathematic- master in hssi

   Technology, Onana jean pierre license in physic-Masrter 2 -TCI

    Physic      Tchoupa Albin, license in physic- master 1 – HSSI

And more than 50 volunteers having license, masters, Doctor Degrees and doing many others disciplines are working with us.

 

Why crowdfunding?

We are looking for 5000 USD for the platform’s development, on-the-ground activities for the upcoming 2018/2019 school year, as from September 2018.

 

Use of money

  1.  Development and mobile application ( 1500 USD)
  2. Purchase of Electronic equipments ( computers, printers, photocopy Machines, cameras and others) ( 2000 USD)
  3. Internet access related fees for 100 members of the technical and support team during 03 months ( 700 USD)
  4. Working capital ( 800USD)

Total: 5000 USD

 

Our references

 

Our internet Website www.intellectcameroun.com , one Facebook page: intellect Cameroun https://web.facebook.com/Intellectcameroun/

We had a nationals distinctions ( unhappy finalist of the business challenge of Ministry of youth of Cameroun in February 2018), nominated at digital Thursday ( may 2017)https://twitter.com/africatechie/status/867831684196184064,best Start-up to impact students of Faculty Industrial Engineering at the Douala University in 2017 and one international distinction From the Tony Elumelu Foundation http://www.tonyelumelufoundation.org/uploads/2018/03/TEF_1000_NAMES_2018.pdf. All those organism have confidence of us. Without nothing we got success in two years only to bring solutions having by more than one thousand students and to fix certains of our products.

 

 

Distribution of counterpart: September 2018

If the crowdfunding campaign is successful, we are going to fund the development our mobile application and to buy what is necessary.

 

Risks and attempt

 

Little risk are to be bring out.in this moment, we develop a mobile application and learning algorithms up to this August 2018. So we can be late. But we will try hard to do it within the scheduled time.

The budget needed is estimated at 8000 USD, so 3000 USD  more , If we get more than 5000 USD, the extra cash will be used to increase our capacities as well as our working capital

Support the project

To participate in this project, choose a donation.

But supporting this project also means spreading the word, sharing it on social networks... In short, getting people interested, because don’t forget, our success depends on you
