story:
Meet Robert Jakus and Read a Brief Summary of this 'Beyond the Classroom Aquarium' Professional Development Workshop Fundraising Campaign for Educators

Hello. Thank you for visiting this campaign. I have been an educator since 1978. My efforts to develop an engaging curricular sequence of project-based, STEM-Oriented and aquatic ecosystem themed learning activities has occupied much of my time since the early 1990's. I was only able to complete this work in December, 2014 after taking the opportunity to retire from teaching. I call the curricular sequence Beyond the Classroom Aquarium. It is designed to help teachers guide their students through an unimaginable sequence of project based, aquatic ecosys-STEM themed learning activities that transcend traditional classroom aquarium experience - by far - thus "Beyond" is a key word in the title.

I wrote Beyond the Classroom Aquarium, in part, as a response to questions numerous educational colleagues asked me about various aquarium systems in my classrooms and also, in part, as a reaction to the enthusiasm and natural spirit of exploration and wonder these ecosystems inspired in students - throughout the school. My goal with this campaign is to gain the opportunity to offer pre-service and in-service educators an intensive professional development workshop that condenses the curricular sequence of project based, STEAM-Oriented and aquatic ecosystem themed projects and pedagogical processes in Beyond the Classroom Aquarium into a one week experience.

Monies that this Beyond the Classroom Aquarium - PD Learning Space/Lab fundraising campaign generate will provide for the set up of a well-stocked, state-of-the-art demo lab/classroom specifically designed to emphasize all aspects of the aquatic ecosystem design, assembly and management project path that educators and their students may experience throughout a school year. A successful Beyond the Classroom Aquarium fundraising campaign will literally bring this book to life for educators and their students. Participation in this workshop involves a lot of collaborative hands-on design work, modeling, and ecosystem assembly activities. Participants will explore ways their students will be able to fit these projects to the footprint of their own classroom/learning space.

Description of funds and resources needed in order to provide a Beyond the Classroom Aquarium PD workshop & what PD participants get

This fundraising campaign requires $225,000. Costs include: PD staff, (as guides, assistants. & technicians), class-space and/or building and utilities, materials necessary to fabricate and assemble aquatic ecosystem projects, various aquatic ecosystem monitoring technologies, materials & equipment to collect & share data & integrate project work across the curriculum, a used vehicle to haul equipment, insurance for PD participants while on-site, office equipment, furniture, program "swag" for donors, and resource takeaways for PD workshop participants. Funds will not cover transportation to/from the workshop destination. Funds raised will also cover single occupancy lodging for PD workshop participants (5 nights) with complimentary breakfast bar and working lunch meals & snacks during the workshop. Funds will not cover evening meals/dinner. A portion of the received fund will also be provided to do a program follow up site visit to evaluate PD participant implementation of workshop projects with their own students & learning spaces. Finally, funds received will also be used to hire an outside program evaluator who will collect and analyze program data and make it available as unbiased evidence of this professional development program's value for consideration for funding from federal and state educational funding agencies.

Funds raised in this campaign will be used to guide participants of week long PD sessions to set up a fully functioning Beyond the Classroom Aquarium work space, displaying all 14 Beyond the Classroom Aquarium projects in operation - as their students may be guided to do - by:

  • Introducing PD workshop participants (in respective teams) to collaborative group work design critique processes and decision making.
  • Providing technical support to PD workshop teams to expedite design and assembly of all Beyond the Classroom Aquarium aquatic ecosystem projects.
  • Providing materials and equipment necessary for design, assembly, and operation of Beyond the Classroom Aquarium aquatic ecosystem projects.
  • Providing materials, equipment and support to introduce workshop participants to the personalized integration of technology, engineering, math, and arts into each project
  • Guiding PD workshop participants in processes of using experiences from designing, assembling, and operating classroom aquatic ecosystems to design an aquatic ecosystem themed scientific investigation (experimental design & execution)
  • Introducing workshop participants to various "beyond the classroom" aquatic ecosystem themed issues that might be of particular interest to students as they design and implement a service learning project
  • Exploring advanced hi-tech aquatic ecosystem themed project designs for students to report upon and/or actually design/prototype/develop

Beyond the Classroom Aquarium perks are available for a range of donation levels. Every consideration is deeply appreciated. Perks provided to donors who help meet the financial target include: a song-download conveying the story of the reversal of the flow of the Chicago River and describing the issue of "Clean Water;" Beyond the Classroom Aquarium hot/cold cups; additional Beyond the Classroom Aquarium paraphernalia including: canvas bags, golf shirts, colored beach towels, caps, copies of Beyond the Classroom Aquarium, and reserved professional development workshop registration and lodging (for individuals or groups of up to twelve).

If this campaign does not reach the published goal of $225,000 all donations will be returned.

The Impact

Beyond the Classroom Aquarium is my personal contribution to the expanding nationwide effort to transform public education for students, teachers, and communities. It is a grassroots effort that I designed over a period of twenty-two years. This campaign represents my effort to share this curriculum with educational colleagues and students. The projects are eminently worthwhile, engaging, authentic and fun-filled. Yet as a grassroots effort, each project and activity within this curriculum celebrates the spirit of uniqueness that characterizes every individual educator who is as well prepared to express compassion for each student as he/she does for their subject/content. In the book and workshop, educators are encouraged to modify project activities to best meet the needs of their students. And educators are trusted to be capable of knowing their students well enough to make such decisions. Many contributors to this Beyond the Classroom Aquarium campaign may well be supporting "old-school" educational sensibilities that require implicit trust of and respect for educators. At times, some might find Beyond the Classroom Aquarium a bit complicated while many will acclaim that this curricular sequence of STEAM-Oriented and aquatic ecosystem themed projects might also be what is best for numerous students, teachers, and communities. Public education is as important today as ever and some contributors to Beyond the Classroom Aquarium may make a contribution to support the pedagogical voice and vision presented in the book/workshop. 

Many educators are searching for professional development opportunities like this (for their students sake)! Some organizations are beginning to promote the idea that educators should be in charge of their own professional development choices and voices. Beyond the Classroom Aquarium could well be a good fit for many - in the service of our children, their parents and society.

The potential environmental impact of this sequence of projects is also substantial. These projects are also designed to transform students into environmental stewards.

Risks & Challenges

Risks and obstacles I may face on the way to expanding my ability to share this curricular sequence of learning projects with colleagues and students on a large scale might arise from my need to compete with large national and/or corporate professional development providers.

My experience as an educator, my work with colleagues, my enjoyment in seeing students learn and care, and my belief in the value of this book/workshop qualify me to overcome these hurdles.

In addition to being able to obtain all necessary support staff, work space, and materials, this campaign seeks funding that will also be sufficient to allow for the hiring of an impartial program evaluator. This evaluator will collect and analyze program data and make it available as unbiased evidence of this professional development program's value for consideration for funding from federal and state educational funding agencies.

Other Ways You Can Help

I am fully aware that some people just can't contribute financially to this campaign. But I am equally grateful to everyone who helps this campaign reach its fundraising goal whether they personally contribute money or not. If you would like to support this campaign but cannot contribute financially please share your ideas about this program so that others might take note - and contribute. Please pass along the robertjakus.com web page to others. I enjoy seeing that caring, education-minded people "like" Beyond the Classroom Aquarium on social media. And if you see any good tweets that might be related to this professional develop fundraising campaign please also pass them my way at #BtheCA. Perhaps one day soon we can even participate in a #BtheCA PD chat with like-minded educators.

And in order to support this campaign, please also make use of the Indiegogo share tools!
story_txt:
Meet Robert Jakus and Read a Brief Summary of this 'Beyond the Classroom Aquarium' Professional Development Workshop Fundraising Campaign for Educators
Hello. Thank you for visiting this campaign. I have been an educator since 1978. My efforts to develop an engaging curricular sequence of project-based, STEM-Oriented and aquatic ecosystem themed learning activities has occupied much of my time since the early 1990's. I was only able to complete this work in December, 2014 after taking the opportunity to retire from teaching. I call the curricular sequence Beyond the Classroom Aquarium. It is designed to help teachers guide their students through an unimaginable sequence of project based, aquatic ecosys-STEM themed learning activities that transcend traditional classroom aquarium experience - by far - thus "Beyond" is a key word in the title.
I wrote Beyond the Classroom Aquarium, in part, as a response to questions numerous educational colleagues asked me about various aquarium systems in my classrooms and also, in part, as a reaction to the enthusiasm and natural spirit of exploration and wonder these ecosystems inspired in students - throughout the school. My goal with this campaign is to gain the opportunity to offer pre-service and in-service educators an intensive professional development workshop that condenses the curricular sequence of project based, STEAM-Oriented and aquatic ecosystem themed projects and pedagogical processes in Beyond the Classroom Aquarium into a one week experience.
Monies that this Beyond the Classroom Aquarium - PD Learning Space/Lab fundraising campaign generate will provide for the set up of a well-stocked, state-of-the-art demo lab/classroom specifically designed to emphasize all aspects of the aquatic ecosystem design, assembly and management project path that educators and their students may experience throughout a school year. A successful Beyond the Classroom Aquarium fundraising campaign will literally bring this book to life for educators and their students. Participation in this workshop involves a lot of collaborative hands-on design work, modeling, and ecosystem assembly activities. Participants will explore ways their students will be able to fit these projects to the footprint of their own classroom/learning space.

Description of funds and resources needed in order to provide a Beyond the Classroom Aquarium PD workshop & what PD participants get
This fundraising campaign requires $225,000. Costs include: PD staff, (as guides, assistants. & technicians), class-space and/or building and utilities, materials necessary to fabricate and assemble aquatic ecosystem projects, various aquatic ecosystem monitoring technologies, materials & equipment to collect & share data & integrate project work across the curriculum, a used vehicle to haul equipment, insurance for PD participants while on-site, office equipment, furniture, program "swag" for donors, and resource takeaways for PD workshop participants. Funds will not cover transportation to/from the workshop destination. Funds raised will also cover single occupancy lodging for PD workshop participants (5 nights) with complimentary breakfast bar and working lunch meals & snacks during the workshop. Funds will not cover evening meals/dinner. A portion of the received fund will also be provided to do a program follow up site visit to evaluate PD participant implementation of workshop projects with their own students & learning spaces. Finally, funds received will also be used to hire an outside program evaluator who will collect and analyze program data and make it available as unbiased evidence of this professional development program's value for consideration for funding from federal and state educational funding agencies.
Funds raised in this campaign will be used to guide participants of week long PD sessions to set up a fully functioning Beyond the Classroom Aquarium work space, displaying all 14 Beyond the Classroom Aquarium projects in operation - as their students may be guided to do - by:

Introducing PD workshop participants (in respective teams) to collaborative group work design critique processes and decision making.
Providing technical support to PD workshop teams to expedite design and assembly of all Beyond the Classroom Aquarium aquatic ecosystem projects.
Providing materials and equipment necessary for design, assembly, and operation of Beyond the Classroom Aquarium aquatic ecosystem projects.
Providing materials, equipment and support to introduce workshop participants to the personalized integration of technology, engineering, math, and arts into each project
Guiding PD workshop participants in processes of using experiences from designing, assembling, and operating classroom aquatic ecosystems to design an aquatic ecosystem themed scientific investigation (experimental design & execution)
Introducing workshop participants to various "beyond the classroom" aquatic ecosystem themed issues that might be of particular interest to students as they design and implement a service learning project
Exploring advanced hi-tech aquatic ecosystem themed project designs for students to report upon and/or actually design/prototype/develop

Beyond the Classroom Aquarium perks are available for a range of donation levels. Every consideration is deeply appreciated. Perks provided to donors who help meet the financial target include: a song-download conveying the story of the reversal of the flow of the Chicago River and describing the issue of "Clean Water;" Beyond the Classroom Aquarium hot/cold cups; additional Beyond the Classroom Aquarium paraphernalia including: canvas bags, golf shirts, colored beach towels, caps, copies of Beyond the Classroom Aquarium, and reserved professional development workshop registration and lodging (for individuals or groups of up to twelve).
If this campaign does not reach the published goal of $225,000 all donations will be returned.

The Impact

It is a grassroots effort that I designed over a period of twenty-two years. This campaign represents my effort to share this curriculum with educational colleagues and students. The projects are eminently worthwhile, engaging, authentic and fun-filled. Yet as a grassroots effort, each project and activity within this curriculum celebrates the spirit of uniqueness that characterizes every individual educator who is as well prepared to express compassion for each student as he/she does for their subject/content. In the book and workshop, educators are encouraged to modify project activities to best meet the needs of their students. And educators are trusted to be capable of knowing their students well enough to make such decisions. Many contributors to this Beyond the Classroom Aquarium campaign may well be supporting "old-school" educational sensibilities that require implicit trust of and respect for educators. At times, some might find Beyond the Classroom Aquarium a bit complicated while many will acclaim that this curricular sequence of STEAM-Oriented and aquatic ecosystem themed projects might also be what is best for numerous students, teachers, and communities. Public education is as important today as ever and some contributors to Beyond the Classroom Aquarium may make a contribution to support the pedagogical voice and vision presented in the book/workshop. 
Many educators are searching for professional development opportunities like this (for their students sake)! Some organizations are beginning to promote the idea that educators should be in charge of their own professional development choices and voices. Beyond the Classroom Aquarium could well be a good fit for many - in the service of our children, their parents and society.
The potential environmental impact of this sequence of projects is also substantial. These projects are also designed to transform students into environmental stewards.

My experience as an educator, my work with colleagues, my enjoyment in seeing students learn and care, and my belief in the value of this book/workshop qualify me to overcome these hurdles.

Please pass along the robertjakus.com web page to others. I enjoy seeing that caring, education-minded people "like" Beyond the Classroom Aquarium on social media. story:
Introducing… 

The Create Your World Healing Arts Center

The first of it’s kind, creative arts based live-in community for young adults 

Hello, my name is Kelli Vissers, and I am here to tell you about a very unique community that I am building. The “Create Your World Creative Arts Community”, is posed to be the first live-in community of it’s kind for low to middle income young adults ages 18-22 who would like to embrace and nurture their passion for the arts.  With school art and music programs being limited or cut more than ever before, it is imperative that we come together to find alternatives for disadvantaged young adults interested in pursuing careers in art, music, theatre and dance after high school.  My goal is not only to help young adults find and embrace their passion and their voice, but to give them a head start in life.

The Create Your World Community is a beautiful concept that will provide young adults with a safe, judgement free environment where they can immerse themselves into the activities that feed their soul. 

But that's not all…

Members of the community will be given a tiny home that they will be able to take with them when they leave the community, provided that they help maintain and work in the community during their stay. Tiny home stays will typically run anywhere from 6-12 months and will be determined during the application process and adjusted for individual needs.  

The goal of this campaign is to reach like-minded people for collaboration, raise money and to spread the word about the importance of supporting our young people.  It is my hope that I will be able to open small communities in cities across the country.  So, I ask you to please spread the word.  Talk about it, provide me with your input, and please get involved!

It all starts with a dream…

A Quote from our Founder: I have a dream. A dream of a place where being unique is encouraged, embraced and nurtured. A place where you can come to express the gifts of your soul and experience true, deep emotional healing in a way that is not normally acknowledged in our society. I truly believe that self-healing begins with the freedom of self-expression, and to truly practice self-expression, you must have a vehicle to present it to the world. The Create Your World Tiny Home Community was created to be a sacred, nonjudgmental community where under-privileged young adults can get a head start in life by engaging in activities they love, all while learning how to be self-sufficient entrepreneurs. As a reward, we give them their first home, which we believe, will give them both a head start and a brighter future.  


More about the Project

I am out to change the way society values self-expression and self-reliance! Please help us establish this initiative to serve our future leaders from every walk of life. As little as $5 can help change a life and help this initiative grow.  


The Community will Include the Following:

  • Twenty 8x16 tiny homes arranged around community gathering areas
  • A music studio with private recording/practice studios, as well as music & voice instruction, drumming classes and even hands on drum making classes
  • A full dance studio that offers an array of healing dance/movement arts such as tribal dance, ballet, jazz, yoga, Tai Chi & Qi Gong as well as freestyle dance and hip hop.   
  • A full art studio that offers both instruction and the ability to engage in freestyle art, painting, drawing, clay and model making, mandala creation, you name it! 
  • A public art gallery where artists can display their work 
  • A performance hall where members of the community can not only put on performances, but practice their art form and create a name for themselves
  • A public cafe & coffee shop that focuses on obtaining local produce and offers organic meals with options for raw, vegetarian, vegan, gluten and dairy free. 
  • Full meditation & relaxation rooms with an indoor & outdoor meditation garden
  • A full service healing center with a focus on healing & empowering the whole person, from the inside out.  Therapies will include herbal medicine, aromatherapy, color & sound therapy, Ayurvedic medicine, massage therapy etc.
  • A bunkhouse that will support up to 20 additional young adults on a waiting list for a tiny home
  • Resources and education with a focus on self-reliance and entrepreneurship


About Us

I am extremely passionate about creating this unmatched solution for all young people interested in exploring their passion for the arts. I come from a family of artists, dancers, writers and creative thinkers, and my mission is to give every child and young adult the opportunity to flourish and express themselves in the way that speaks to them, regardless of their income, and equip them with a place they can call their own when they go out into the world.  I want to put an end to the term "starving artists!" We welcome your support as we strive to enhance the lives of those we serve by helping our future leaders reach their full potential.

How You Can Help

For us to bring the Create Your World Community to life, we need your support! The total needed to get this project off the ground and running is $900,000. Your generous support will assist us with the cost of development and build-out of the 2.5 acre location, which we have already secured.

We will be using the funding for: 

  • Construction and build-out of the community arts center and all its components (theatre, music studio, dance studio, art studio, cafe etc)
  • Construction of the bunkhouse building 
  • The building and furnishing of the initial 20 tiny homes 
  • Any excess funds will be used to further improve the center, initial running capital and to house additional youth.  

*Create Your World needs pledges, but above all it needs your attention and interest! If you love this concept as much as we do, please take a moment to tweet about it, talk about it and post about it! Help us spread the word and get things started! 

Final Thank You and Links

We feel so grateful to everyone who has taken the time to read our campaign, spread the word, and we especially thank all of those who contributed what they could to help us make a difference.  We have spent the last twelve months working hard to bring our vision to life and it was worth every minute.  Please know that your efforts, no matter how small, will not go unnoticed.  We will continue to keep you posted on what your donation has helped us achieve.  You are part of our Create Your World family.

If you cannot donate but you are interested in helping, please contact us so we can set you up with a referral program! You might even be able to earn perks, just by spreading the word!

CONTRIBUTIONS…

Your generosity and support could make all the difference in the fruition of this wonderful project.  

It would be great to have 900 people contribute $1,000. But in reality, 9,000 people contributing $100, or 90,000 people contributing $10 would achieve the same goal.  Anything will be extremely helpful and oh so appreciated. Please share this with anyone you think would be willing to help.  

Old school?  No Problem!

For those of us who don't like making donations over the Internet, please feel free to contact me via email: projectfunding@cwhealingartscenter.com and I will provide you with a mailing address to send check or money order to.  

Final Note...

Please help spread the word!

This has proven to be one of the hardest things I have ever done.  I don't have a million friends to share this with.  But, I have the Internet and wonderful people who want to see me succeed. Whether or not you contribute financially, please use the share tools on this page. Tweeting, sharing on Facebook or any other venues you have at your disposal will greatly enhance our exposure and increase our chances of success.

story:
Who are we?

KloudMagica is a unique, live and interactive e-learning platform that is redefining professional e-learning. Our purpose is to bridge the gap between talented and expert Instructors from around the world and other professionals and students, eager to learn new skills in the IT sector, colleges and schools, enabling them to expand their knowledge and enhance career opportunities to the fullest.

Each Instructor and their content on our site goes through a rigorous but efficient screening process to ensure, only the best in the industry are made available to our students. On Kloudmagica, learners have the flexibility to learn at their own time and pace or what we define as ‘Self-paced Learning’. Students can book live classes or access recorded sessions to accommodate their busy schedule. Our courses are specially curated by experts who constantly gauge and keep track with latest developments in the IT industry, resulting in the most relevant and practical e-learning experience.

Kloudmagica Leader

The project is taking a lead under the leadership of Mrs. Archana Raj,  the Director and founder of the platform named Kloudmagica Infotech Private Limited. Archana also has working experience with RBS and ADITI technologies. She is highly energetic, enthusiastic and self-motivated entrepreneur. She holds her Master of Business Administration degree in Finance. Born and brought up from a small village in India, she has faced a lot of challenges in completing her education as there was no legitimate asset at her village. She has even been teaching students, to afford the cost required of her education. Since then, she had a dream to contribute her learning and expertise in the field of education field and helping the students in need.

We all deserve a chance to be better programmers!

An increasing number of professionals and immediate college graduates are finding difficulties in getting a job. This is primarily due to the gap between available and the required skills in the industry. On the other hand, we even have a pool of veteran professionals who can impart these skills, but are limited in terms of reach. And the idea quickly spread through the state and is now backed by dozens of Lecturers, as well as local, national, and international Professionals! There are millions of professionals who are looking for a brand-new opportunity because either they are no longer happy with their present job profile or are looking to expand their skill set either for their own growth or as part of a new requirement. Most of these young minds want to become the champion in their respective teams, but are unaware on how to upgrade their skills at all, as most of the experienced instructors are not reachable. The main reason for such a gap between the students and the instructors is the approach-ability and accessibility. Instructors cannot reach everywhere because of some individual limitation like job agreement or family and even the logistics limitations. For students, the limitation can be economical or unapproachable.

What's the problem audience is currently facing?

Most of the students does not know how to upgrade their skills at all because lacking good instructors for them. The main reason for this is, the gap between the students and the smart instructors because of the diverse region, country or cities. Instructors cannot fly out because of individual limitation like job agreement or family. The student cannot venture out because of financial constraints.

Apart from this Most of the hot skill courses available in the market are few plus expensive and mostly are out of reach of maximum students. The courses for which is the cost is low, the quality is likewise low which will result in insufficient and no-value learning. 

Kloudmagica's Solutions For you!

Kloudmagica is right here to fill the gap by providing a huge platform where everyone can learn significantly more by utilizing our courses. We have been working hard and we have few talented instructors who are also buckling down, but we need to break through many more trainers because of the rapid change in technology. We have the stage set of different goals, but the first one is to educate the people. Kloudmagica is working like a bridge between the students and instructors. At Kloudmagica the students can get easy registration and they can purchase the courses without any difficulty to upgrade their skills.

Our goal is to bridge this gap by creating an affordable platform that provides high quality, self-paced + live classes + classroom training courses. This will communicate the missing skills/knowledge, not only to the students but skilled professionals as well. At the same time, this will provide employment and a healthy living to the participating teachers by means of earnings using economies of scale.

Kloudmagica’s goal

is to give the best quality material at a reasonable and affordable cost with maximum benefit so that all the students can avail the magic of learning. 
That is why Archana started her own venture Kloudmagica Infotech Private Limited (https://www.kloudmagica.com/) an online e-learning courses (Self-paced courses + live classes + classroom training) for Class 4-10, Class 11-12, Undergraduates and IT professionals. We have developed our portal in multiple iterations and have reached the prototype stage. We also have recently undergone with our first Beta Launch. Since we are at a decisive stage, we are looking for support in terms funding and guidance to scale our venture and grow in the right direction.

Why is the goal set at $500K or What will the investment/fund Cover?

Our endeavor will help a lot of people across the world that are avaricious for learning. We impulse the people to raise funds for the Kloudmagica because we need Five Hundred Thousand USD for our project. As it is the progressing venture, there are lots of expenses involved that will help us to continue with our vision. For example:

Administrative & Infrastructures

  • First We Will pay  personal loan taken from friends & relatives to establish this company (~ USD 25000.00)
  • One time setup (soundproof setup for recording + furniture +laptop +modem +ac + projector +central system to store data)
  • Rent(office)
  • cloud server , video hosting
  • Internet & electricity

Core development

  • Website Development,
  • Website testing,
  • Website enhancement,
  • Website maintenance
  • Mobile app development from scratch,
  • Mobile app testing,
  • Mobile app enhancement and
  • Mobile app maintenance

HR

  • content writer

  • Directors Sal

  • Call center

  • CA

We will even have to orchestrate more Instructors because the students for the upcoming courses will be increasing rapidly, so we must make certain arrangements for this. Our endeavor is boundless and we want to create a strong platform for those in need of jobs such as college graduates and school undergraduates. We must hire more Instructors and experts for this purpose and we are on-track with it.

Kloudmagica has the social responsibility to help the people around the globe for the betterment of the society. Kloudmagica has a plan to contribute 25% of the total profit where 10% of the profit will go in the development of economically much less privileged students; for whom an amazing training remains a dream. We will contribute 10% of the profit to those hard-working people who cannot afford a meal a day and we will spend 5% of the profit to orchestrate clothes, books and basic amenities for them because food, clothes, and education are the basic needs.  We cannot instruct everyone, we cannot help everyone who are in need, but we can positively start with a few. We trust that every big change in the world had been possible because someone decided to take that one little step.

What will you get for your donation?

If your donation amount is more than $100.00 then We will provide the discount of $ 200 on self paced courses and for entire life you can avail 20% discount on all the self-paced courses. Apart from this you will be more glad to know that we will contribute 25% of the total profit where 10% of the profit will go in the development of economically much less privileged students. We will contribute 10% of the profit to those hard-working people who cannot afford a meal a day and we will spend 5% of the profit to arrange clothes, books and basic amenities.

We welcome anyone and everyone who wants to contribute, regardless of location, region or country. The Contribution cannot be always in terms of money. If you can’t help out financially, but you would like to do something for the betterment of society, then simply spread about this story, and who knows, maybe one of your friends might be interested in one of our perks! Kindly join and assist us to help who are in need.

***Your helping hand will boost our motivation.***
story_txt:
Who are we?
KloudMagica is a unique, live and interactive e-learning platform that is redefining professional e-learning. Our purpose is to bridge the gap between talented and expert Instructors from around the world and other professionals and students, eager to learn new skills in the IT sector, colleges and schools, enabling them to expand their knowledge and enhance career opportunities to the fullest.
Each Instructor and their content on our site goes through a rigorous but efficient screening process to ensure, only the best in the industry are made available to our students. On Kloudmagica, learners have the flexibility to learn at their own time and pace or what we define as ‘Self-paced Learning’. Students can book live classes or access recorded sessions to accommodate their busy schedule. Our courses are specially curated by experts who constantly gauge and keep track with latest developments in the IT industry, resulting in the most relevant and practical e-learning experience.
Kloudmagica Leader
The project is taking a lead under the leadership of Mrs. Archana Raj,  the Director and founder of the platform named Kloudmagica Infotech Private Limited. Archana also has working experience with RBS and ADITI technologies. She is highly energetic, enthusiastic and self-motivated entrepreneur. She holds her Master of Business Administration degree in Finance. Born and brought up from a small village in India, she has faced a lot of challenges in completing her education as there was no legitimate asset at her village. She has even been teaching students, to afford the cost required of her education. Since then, she had a dream to contribute her learning and expertise in the field of education field and helping the students in need.
We all deserve a chance to be better programmers!
An increasing number of professionals and immediate college graduates are finding difficulties in getting a job. This is primarily due to the gap between available and the required skills in the industry. On the other hand, we even have a pool of veteran professionals who can impart these skills, but are limited in terms of reach. And the idea quickly spread through the state and is now backed by dozens of Lecturers, as well as local, national, and international Professionals! There are millions of professionals who are looking for a brand-new opportunity because either they are no longer happy with their present job profile or are looking to expand their skill set either for their own growth or as part of a new requirement. Most of these young minds want to become the champion in their respective teams, but are unaware on how to upgrade their skills at all, as most of the experienced instructors are not reachable. The main reason for such a gap between the students and the instructors is the approach-ability and accessibility. Instructors cannot reach everywhere because of some individual limitation like job agreement or family and even the logistics limitations. For students, the limitation can be economical or unapproachable.
What's the problem audience is currently facing?
Most of the students does not know how to upgrade their skills at all because lacking good instructors for them. The main reason for this is, the gap between the students and the smart instructors because of the diverse region, country or cities. Instructors cannot fly out because of individual limitation like job agreement or family. The student cannot venture out because of financial constraints.
Apart from this Most of the hot skill courses available in the market are few plus expensive and mostly are out of reach of maximum students. The courses for which is the cost is low, the quality is likewise low which will result in insufficient and no-value learning. 
Kloudmagica's Solutions For you!
Kloudmagica is right here to fill the gap by providing a huge platform where everyone can learn significantly more by utilizing our courses. We have been working hard and we have few talented instructors who are also buckling down, but we need to break through many more trainers because of the rapid change in technology. We have the stage set of different goals, but the first one is to educate the people. Kloudmagica is working like a bridge between the students and instructors. At Kloudmagica the students can get easy registration and they can purchase the courses without any difficulty to upgrade their skills.
Our goal is to bridge this gap by creating an affordable platform that provides high quality, self-paced + live classes + classroom training courses. This will communicate the missing skills/knowledge, not only to the students but skilled professionals as well. At the same time, this will provide employment and a healthy living to the participating teachers by means of earnings using economies of scale.
Kloudmagica’s goal 
is to give the best quality material at a reasonable and affordable cost with maximum benefit so that all the students can avail the magic of learning. That is why Archana started her own venture Kloudmagica Infotech Private Limited (https://www.kloudmagica.com/) an online e-learning courses (Self-paced courses + live classes + classroom training) for Class 4-10, Class 11-12, Undergraduates and IT professionals. We have developed our portal in multiple iterations and have reached the prototype stage. We also have recently undergone with our first Beta Launch. Since we are at a decisive stage, we are looking for support in terms funding and guidance to scale our venture and grow in the right direction.
Why is the goal set at $500K or What will the investment/fund Cover?
Our endeavor will help a lot of people across the world that are avaricious for learning. story:
يساهم الحصار المفروض على قطاع غزة منذ عشر سنوات في تردي الأوضاع الاقتصادية  ورفع معدلات الفقر مما يمنع آلاف الطلبة الفلسطينيين في قطاع غزة من متابعة دراساتهم الجامعية. وتهدف حملة "أنقذوا مستقبل طلبة غزة" إلى دعم الطلبة المحتاجين واليتامى وذوي الاحتياجات الخاصة من أجل مساعدتهم على مواصلة العملية التعليمية مما يعزز فرص حصولهم على عمل مستقبلا.

 

Because of the above mentioned numbers , the UCAS took the initiative to assist needy students in Gaza strip by looking for fully or partially scholarships for them , reaching for integrating them in the working environment .

Moreover, UCAS offers a high quality education, training, and how to be an entrepreneur.  UCAS students are highly qualified in the jobs market as shown below:

بسبب الاحصائيات المذكورة أعلاه، فإن الكلية الجامعية للعلوم التطبيقية بادرت إلى إطلاق هذه الحملة للمساهمة في مساعدة الطلبة المحتاجين بحثاً عن منح كاملة أو جزئية، وصولاً لدمج الطلاب في سوق العمل.

علاوة على ذلك، فإن الكلية الجامعية للعلوم التطبيقية تقدّم تعليما عالي الجودة وبرامج تدريبية تساهم في تأهيل الطلاب ليصبحوا أصحاب مشاريع صغيرة. طلبة الكلية الجامعية لديهم التأهيل الكافي للتميز في سوق العمل، كما هو موضح أدناه:

We need your donations for: نحتاج دعمكم لكي نتمكن من

 

How You Can Help 

Make a financial investment of $100, $200, $300, $400, or more. 

Share this page with your friends and family. using the sharing tools above!

Volunteer and join the team.  Contact us at donate@ucas.edu.ps

كيف بإمكانك المساعدة؟

تبرع لو ب 100$ أو 200$ أو300$ أو أكثر

شارك هذه الصفحة مع أصدقائك والعائلة وساهم في انتشارها باستخدام أدوات المشاركة أعلاه

انضم لفريق التطوع الخاص بالحملة، للتواصل عبر البريد الالكتروني: donate@ucas.edu.ps

  لمزيد من المعلومات عن الكلية الجامعية للعلوم التطبيقية من فضلك حمل العرض التقديمي التالي:  

For more info about UCAS kindly have a look at the presentation

http://www.ucas.edu.ps/designs/shortfli/UCAS 2017.pptx

story:
What you get in this program

The program maintains a balance between both: the practical i.e. the coding part and the theory i.e. the mathematical part of Machine Learning. The syllabus has been curated by experts and has an example-based approach which will help you become more comfortable applying algorithms to real world problems. Below are the features of this program:

  • Life time access to video lectures
  • Downloadable resources
  • Ample exercises and projects to practice the learnt concepts
  • Online Q/A and discussions
  • 30 days Money-Back Guarantee if you are not happy with the course

Why learn Data Science?

Increasing Demand - Job postings for data scientists rose 75 percent from January 2015 to January 2018 at Indeed.com

High Pay - A typical data scientist job pays about $119,000 at the midpoint of salaries and rises to $168,000 at the 95th percentile, according to staffing agency Robert Half Technology.

Used in Various Industries – Data science is being increasingly adopted across various industries: Banking, Insurance, Telecom, Advertising and Health care are the top adopters

Freelancing Opportunities – Since data scientists are in high demand, there are ample opportunities for you to become a well-paid freelancer or consultant.

“It’s the sexiest job in the 21st century,” - Harvard Business Review

According to The Future Impact of Data Science on Business Analytics, data scientists will play a leadership role in Business Analytics, leading the connected machines through unexplored paths

Details of courses in the program

Microsoft Excel

The Microsoft Excel masterclass is a course covering the basic and advanced topics of Microsoft Excel.

What will students learn in this course?

  • All the essential Excel formulas
  • Data tools like Sorting, Filtering, Data validations and Data importing
  • Lookup functions such as Vlookup, Hlookup, Index and Match
  • Pivot tables with slicers
  • Conditional and Table formatting options
  • Data visualization using Bar charts, Scatter Plots, Histograms, Waterfall charts etc.
  • How to create and use important Excel shortcuts
  • Advanced Analytics techniques in Excel such as Regression, Goal seek and Solver
  • Learn Automation techniques by using Macros
 

 

SQL for Data Science

SQL for Data science is a course covering important topics of Business Intelligence for SQL Database management system (PostgreSQL) from Beginner to Advanced level.

What will students learn in this course?

  • Knowledge of all the essential SQL commands
  • Tools like GROUP BY, JOINS and Subqueries
  • Sorting and filtering commands in SQL
  • String, mathematical and date-time SQL functions
  • Enhancing the performance of Database by using Views and Indexes
  • Increase your efficiency by learning the best practices while writing SQL queries

 

Machine Learning Basics in Python

The course "Machine Learning Basics: Building Regression Model in Python" teaches you all the steps of creating a Linear Regression model, which is the most popular Machine Learning model, to solve business problems.

Why use Python for Machine Learning?

Understanding Python is one of the valuable skills needed for a career in Machine Learning.

Though it hasn’t always been, Python is the programming language of choice for data science. Here’s a brief history:

  • In 2016, it overtook R on Kaggle, the premier platform for data science competitions.
  • In 2018, 66% of data scientists reported using Python daily, making it the number one tool for analytics professionals.

Machine Learning experts expect this trend to continue with increasing development in the Python ecosystem.

 

What will students learn in this course?

  • How to convert business problem into a Machine learning Linear Regression problem
  • Preliminary analysis of data using Univariate and Bivariate analysis before running Linear regression
  • Predict future outcomes basis past data by implementing Simplest Machine Learning algorithm
  • Understanding of basics of statistics and concepts of Machine Learning
  • In-depth knowledge of data collection and data preprocessing for Machine Learning Linear Regression problem
  • Course contains a end-to-end DIY project to implement your learning from the lectures
  • Basic statistics using Numpy library in Python
  • Data representation using Seaborn library
  • Linear Regression technique of Machine Learning using Scikit Learn and Statsmodel libraries

 

Machine Learning Basics in R

Learn the basics of Machine learning and how to use a linear regression model to predict future outcome in this course and accelerate your business and career growth.

Why use R for data Machine Learning?

Understanding R is one of the valuable skills needed for a career in Machine Learning. Below are some reasons why you should learn Machine learning in R

  1. It’s a popular language for Machine Learning at top tech firms. Almost all of them hire data scientists who use R. Facebook, for example, uses R to do behavioral analysis with user post data. Google uses R to assess ad effectiveness and make economic forecasts.
  2. Learning the data science basics is arguably easier in R. R has a big advantage: it was designed specifically with data manipulation and analysis in mind.
  3. Amazing packages that make your life easier
  4. Robust, growing community of data scientists and statisticians.

 

What will students learn in this course?

  • Learn to apply algorithms such as Regression analysis for solving machine learning problems.
  • Preliminary analysis of data using Univariate and Bivariate analysis before running Linear regression
  • Understand how to interpret the result of Linear Regression model and translate them into actionable insight
  • Learn advanced variations of OLS method of Linear Regression
  • Course contains a end-to-end DIY project to implement your learnings from the lectures
  • How to do basic statistical operations in R
  • Advanced Linear regression techniques using GLMNET package of R
  • Graphically representing data in R before and after analysis

 

Advanced Machine Learning in Python

This course will cover advanced topics of Machine Learning and how to implement those techniques in Python. All these topics will be covered from business perspective i.e. the course will make sense to business managers, marketing managers and operations leaders. We will try to keep it simple and jargon free. After this course you will be able to make predictive and prescriptive models and take data driven business decisions.

Advanced Machine Learning in R

This course will cover the advanced techniques of machine learning and there implementation in R software. You will learn classification techniques such as logistic regression, Discriminant Analysis, K-nearest neighbors, Support Vector Machines and Decision trees. These are all the trending topics of machine learning. After this course, you will understand the true potential of Machine Learning and how it can transform businesses.

According to Analytics India Magazine,

Who are we?

We are a team of professionals who were previously working in the field of data science, but in different industries.

Our instructors have worked as managers of global Analytics consulting firm and thus are well-versed with the practical aspects of Data analysis.

Some of our basic courses on Excel, SQL and Machine Learning have been loved and appreciated by students. Our courses have been enrolled by 125,000+ students from 160+ countries.

 

When will the course be released?

We are done with the basic courses and are in process of creating the advanced courses of machine learning. The entire program will be completed in July 2019. Our supporters would receive access to the basic courses as reward for supporting us and an email informing them when the entire program is released.

 

Risks and challenges

With our previous experience in creating online courses, we are confident that we can safely fulfill this campaign on time.

Making courses is our passion, and we will be doing everything possible to go above and beyond in providing value to our supporters!

 

Video Credits: This video is derivative of "Keplertek | AI & Robotics Ecosystem" by Petrick is licensed under CC BY

Music: www.bensound.com

Info-graphic design credits: <a href="https://www.freepik.com/free-photos-vectors/inf... vector created by macrovector - www.freepik.com</a>

Understand how to interpret the result of Linear Regression model and translate them into actionable insight
Learn advanced variations of OLS method of Linear Regression
Course contains a end-to-end DIY project to implement your learnings from the lectures
How to do basic statistical operations in R
Advanced Linear regression techniques using GLMNET package of R
Graphically representing data in R before and after analysis
 Advanced Machine Learning in PythonThis course will cover advanced topics of Machine Learning and how to implement those techniques in Python. All these topics will be covered from business perspective i.e. the course will make sense to business managers, marketing managers and operations leaders. We will try to keep it simple and jargon free. After this course you will be able to make predictive and prescriptive models and take data driven business decisions.Advanced Machine Learning in RThis course will cover the advanced techniques of machine learning and there implementation in R software. You will learn classification techniques such as logistic regression, Discriminant Analysis, K-nearest neighbors, Support Vector Machines and Decision trees. These are all the trending topics of machine learning. After this course, you will understand the true potential of Machine Learning and how it can transform businesses.According to Analytics India Magazine, Who are we?We are a team of professionals who were previously working in the field of data science, but in different industries.Our instructors have worked as managers of global Analytics consulting firm and thus are well-versed with the practical aspects of Data analysis.Some of our basic courses on Excel, SQL and Machine Learning have been loved and appreciated by students. Our courses have been enrolled by 125,000+ students from 160+ countries. When will the course be released?We are done with the basic courses and are in process of creating the advanced courses of machine learning. The entire program will be completed in July 2019. Our supporters would receive access to the basic courses as reward for supporting us and an email informing them when the entire program is released. Risks and challengesWith our previous experience in creating online courses, we are confident that we can safely fulfill this campaign on time.Making courses is our passion, and we will be doing everything possible to go above and beyond in providing value to our supporters! Video Credits: This video is derivative of "Keplertek | AI & Robotics Ecosystem" by Petrick is licensed under CC BYMusic: www.bensound.comInfo-graphic design credits: <a href="https://www.freepik.com/free-photos-vectors/inf... vector created by macrovector - www.freepik.com</a>

story:
About the Marx-Engels-Lenin Press

For the past year, the Marx-Engels-Lenin Press has been publishing high quality anti-capitalist literature. Our team works on a volunteer basis which ensures free or very low cost publishing services. Through offering these services to all radical, anti-capitalist scholars, activists, writers, etc., we aim to combat bourgeois media and cultural hegemony. 


What We Need & What You Get

We need to raise money to print our material for free distribution to libraries and radical organizations as well as to  advertise our services on the internet.

  • Our perks are well worth it! For ever donation above $10 you will receive a book and more!
  • If we don't meet our goal, the funds will still be used to distribute material and advertise.

story:
Samenvatting
 



In dit unieke themapark kunnen alle kinderen tussen 4 en 14 jaar zichzelf volwassen voelen in een stad die op maat is gemaakt.  Ze laten de economie draaien, handhaven de orde, werken, spelen en leren onder deskundige begeleiding. Ze staan springend van enthousiasme buiten in de korte rij, 'vliegen' naar hun eigen wereld, rennen naar de bank om hun eigen 'geld' op te halen, en als het op is, gaan ze met een vrolijk gezicht 'werken' in alle beroepen waar ze ooit van hebben gedroomd en meer. Ze leren dat je meer verdient wanneer je eerst iets gaat studeren, dat je voor elkaar en de omgeving iets kunt betekenen, en dat je aan het eind iets kleins kunt kopen met het verdiende 'geld', maar iets groots wanneer je het bij elkaar legt, bijvoorbeeld met een hele klas, of door te sparen op een eigen 'bankrekening'. 


Introductie


  • Het begon allemaal met een vader van 3 zoons, waarvan één met autisme. Voor zijn kinderen werden geboren, was hij instructeur bij de Koninklijke Luchtmacht. Vanwege alle zorg die zijn gezin nodig had, begon hij met iets heel anders en ging o.a. van die mooie beloningsplaatjes verkopen voor scholen. 

  • Ook richtte hij 2 stichtingen op: SOVA en Autstede, om gezinnen met autistische kinderen de tijd van hun leven te geven. Hij bedacht een levende, maar stille knuffel-kabouter, zodat de kinderen konden communiceren wat ze wilden, zonder enig commentaar. En hij huurde twee gebouwen voor speciale vakantie weekends. Gezinnen konden met hun autistische kind en de brusjes - (broers en zusjes) komen. Vader en moeder zouden verblijven apart van de kinderen, met de mogelijkheid om met de andere ouders te praten, en samen een leuk weekend te hebben. De kinderen kregen een speciale kleur T-shirt en een persoonlijke gids met dezelfde kleur en konden allerlei activiteiten doen, met een grote show op het einde van het weekend. Wonderen konden gebeuren op het moment dat ALLE kinderen hun bijzondere talenten toonden, omdat ze  vrij en zonder angsten waren. 

  • Mede door het enthousiasme van zijn nieuwe vrouw (een lerares met interesse voor stoere ICT- dingen) en zijn oudste zoon is zijn motivatie alleen maar sterker geworden. Het idee om kinderen te laten ontdekken waar ze allemaal goed in zijn, terwijl ouders/verzorgers lekker tot rust kunnen komen, werd steeds groter. 

  • Samen met een vriendelijke financiële tovenaar om de magie te laten gebeuren (onmisbaar bij zo'n groot project) en een vrolijke gastheer van ons favoriete restaurant, is er een team gegroeid om dit stevig op te pakken en een enorme stap verder te zetten. We reisden naar verre landen om een stad te vinden voor kinderen waar ze nu al kunnen zijn wat ze ooit willen worden.

  • We ontmoetten een franchise-organisatie die al heeft gerealiseerd waar wij nog over dromen. Na 18 maanden werk aan een solide businessplan kunnen we niet wachten om te beginnen met de bouw van een permanente plek voor alle kinderen, waar ook de ouders een fijne tijd voor zichzelf kunnen hebben, dicht bij hun kinderen die vrij zijn om hun gang te gaan en te spelen dat ze volwassen zijn in hun eigen economie.


Wat we nodig hebben & wat je krijgt

  • Het is echt nodig dat jullie meedoen. Zo kunnen we de bank, de overheid en grote investeerders overtuigen dat heel veel mensen achter ons initiatief staan, en ze mee krijgen om deze droom ook voor kinderen in Nederland uit te laten komen. Daarna kunnen we volle kracht vooruit. Klik op 'Contribute now' en doneer een willekeurig bedrag (anoniem kan ook) of kies een 'Perk' zodat je een van de eerste bezoekers wordt van het themapark. Voor we officieel open zijn mogen volwassenen ook meedoen met de beroepen, de activiteiten waar ze in passen en ervaren wat het is om elk beroep te kunnen uitvoeren, waar je je hele leven al van hebt gedroomd. Het is wel nodig gegevens in te vullen, zodat we de entreebewijzen en uitnodigingen voor een VIP-dag naar het juiste adres kunnen sturen. Niet iedereen heeft of wil een PayPal rekening. Vink dan bij het betalen de optie voor een PayPal rekening uit. Daarna krijg je de optie om met een creditcard te betalen. Heb je ook geen creditcard maar wil je wel doneren, stuur dan een berichtje via 'contact'. We sturen je dan het rekeningnummer en een bevestiging zodra het geld gestort is. Deze bevestiging kan je gebruiken als toegangskaartje, wanneer je graag gebruik wilt maken van de speciale aanbiedingen. Het geld wordt verzameld op onze PayPal rekening, en uitbetaald aan het Themapark zodra we de doelstelling halen. Wanneer je iets wilt vragen, of je kunt niet alle informatie invullen die nodig is
    ( b.v. een telefoonnummer ), klik dan op 'contact' . We kijken elke dag naar de berichten, dus krijg je snel antwoord of bevestiging dat je gegevens goed zijn aangekomen. 


  • Als we het volledige bedrag niet via IndieGoGo bij elkaar kunnen krijgen, dan moeten we de plannen uitstellen totdat we een andere manier hebben gevonden om onze stoere stad te realiseren. Iedereen die heeft meegedaan krijgt in dat geval netjes zijn geld terug. Om deze kinderstad echt mogelijk te maken, hopen we dat jullie net zo enthousiast worden als wij en meedoen aan het realiseren van een fantastisch leuk en leerzaam themapark, zodat het over ongeveer 18 -21 maanden werkelijk in gebruik genomen kan worden.

  • We hebben een speciale actie voor scholen, teams en jeugdclubs: zij kunnen een gratis bezoek winnen rondom de eerste openingsdagen om zelf te komen kijken en ervaren dat de kinderen zich enorm zullen vermaken en de leerkrachten of begeleiders 5 uur lang een ontspannen schoolreisje kunnen hebben. De kinderen ervaren een grote zelfstandigheid, omdat ze hun eigen weg kunnen kiezen. Er is genoeg gelegenheid om te kijken en foto's te maken van de kinderen van de eigen groep. Het goed opgeleide personeel van het themapark staat overal klaar om elke activiteit tot een succes te maken.  

  • Bent u bereid om 1000 euro of meer te betalen, dan krijgt u een VIP-dag aangeboden voor het hele gezin. Geniet de hele middag van een geweldige ervaring in het themapark, geheel verzorgd en uiteraard met extra hapjes en verse drankjes in de lounge, een voorstelling in het theater en een officiële 'statie'-foto samen met de stoere animatie-karakters op het centrale plein, die u als aandenken mee naar huis kunt nemen.

Wat betekent de komst van dit unieke themapark?

  • Op 12 februari 2015 is de regering van Nederland begonnen met Platform # Onderwijs 2032. Het platform houdt zich bezig met de inhoud van het onderwijs in Nederland. De nadruk zal liggen op drie onderwerpen: Kennis over leren en arbeid, maatschappelijke vorming en persoonlijke ontwikkeling.
    Met al het onderzoek dat we het afgelopen anderhalf jaar hebben gedaan en de resultaten die we hebben gezien in de educatieve parken van de franchise organisatie in de grote steden over de hele wereld, denken we dat we in de geest van dit Platform ons onderwijs kunnen verrijken met de ervaringen die de kinderen opdoen in zo'n rijke, vrije en veilige omgeving om te experimenteren, te ontwerpen en gewoon te dóen. Prof. dr. Jelle Jolles van de VU in Amsterdam geeft aan dat het gedrag en beleving van een kind en tiener worden bepaald door zowel biologische als psychologische, sociale en culturele factoren. Daarom zal alles op alles worden gezet om de Nederlandse cultuur en de sociale waarden van de mini-gemeenschap die de kinderstad is, zo compleet en verantwoord mogelijk aan te bieden. De aandacht die aan voeding voor de geest en het lichaam wordt besteed is erop gericht om kinderen te laten ervaren hoe leuk en lekker het kan zijn om een gezonde en uitdagende maaltijd klaar te maken, en ook de rijpe vruchten te laten plukken van de toegankelijk en spannend gemaakte Universiteits-lessen, ook voor de jonge bezoekers. De richtlijnen van fora voor hoogbegaafdheid worden hierin  meegenomen, maar ook voor leermoeilijkheden. 

  • Omdat we een land zijn waar ruimtevaart, gezondheid en duurzaamheid hoog in het vaandel staat, verwachten we zeker ook op dat gebied een aantal kinderen te inspireren, zodat zij de beroepen uit kunnen vinden waar we nu nog geen naam voor hebben bedacht. 



  • We hebben een diep geloof in onze Nederlandse trots en hopen dat we met crowdfunding en vele aanhangers van een geweldig idee een begin kunnen maken, en dat we genoeg steun van ouders, de overheid, onderwijsinstellingen en idealisten met focus op de toekomst kunnen vinden, om het themapark daadwerkelijk te kunnen realiseren.

Uitdagingen



  • We hebben gezien dat meer dan 450.000 kinderen per jaar een geweldige tijd zouden kunnen hebben, meer dan 150 mensen kunnen een nieuwe baan krijgen, en beroepen die nog niet eens een naam hebben, zouden wel eens een welwillend en buitengewoon begaafd publiek kunnen vinden in onze stad van stoere kinderen.

  • Om alle geldstromen goed te kunnen reguleren hebben we FEBA Holding BV opgericht met de voorzitter en vice-voorzitter. Verder hebben we de functies van CFO, F&B en PR vervuld, allemaal nodig voor het uitvoeren van het steeds groter wordende takenpakket. Met onze CFO, die ervaring heeft met grote geld-zaken voor een landelijke onderneming, merken we dat we een sterke waakhond in huis hebben.

  • Met een flexibele instelling, een docent voor het voortgezet onderwijs en 37 jaar ervaring op allerlei niveau's, is de inhoud bewaakt en blijft de organisatie leren van de kinderen. Tal van vaardigheden en verdere studie op gebied van recreatie en management, maken de overgang mogelijk naar een grotere schaal.



    De franchise onderneming heeft over de hele wereld bewezen, dat ze weten wat ze aan het doen zijn. Ze hebben vertrouwen in ons team, maar maken zich zorgen over het geld. Dat doen wij ook, maar zodra we de eerste stappen kunnen betalen, krijgen we van hen alle steun om namens hen te spreken als officiële franchisenemer.

  Andere manieren waarop je kunt helpen


Voor wie gewoon niet financieel bij kan dragen, maar wel wil helpen:  
stuur een SMS met  GO STAD  naar 1008   ( 90 cent ) , Like ons op Facebook, retweet en deel deze link op Google + zodat we aan de bank en de investeerders kunnen laten zien dat deze stad een plaats in ons land moet hebben. En denk aan de groepsactie met de kans om voor zelfs voor een hele school, het team of de jeugdclub een dag gratis toegang te kunnen winnen. 

Maak één euro over en laat ons vooral weten hoe jullie actie hebben gevoerd, en hoe we jullie kunnen bereiken, zodat we de winnaars kunnen uitnodigen voor een superdag! Klik op 'Select a perk' rechtsonderaan deze pagina. Vele kleintjes maken iets groots mogelijk !

story:
Bethesda Child Support Agency was established in 2001 to provide quality education to orphans and vulnerable children in poorest Nigerian communities. At Bethesda, our primary aim is to create avenues for socio-economically disadvantaged children to have access to quality education through contributions from the public and private sector.

Over the years, Bethesda has provided free standard education, school supplies, nutritional and health care to over 3,000 orphaned and vulnerable children in Lagos and Ogun states, Nigeria. A good number of these children have completed their basic education and are currently in high schools, while 4 have graduated from tertiary institutions.

Our programs include;

  • Scholarships and Mentorship for school-aged children
  • Community service covering; awareness, advocacy and health related initiatives
  • Establishment of tuition-free schools in urban slums termed “Schools-in-Poor-Communities.”

Presently, we have four nursery and primary schools in Ikota, Ijaiye-ojokoro, Bariga and Matogun communities in Lagos and Ogun states

These schools have been running on donations from individuals and corporate organizations.

At the moment, we have about 500 children in our four schools who are in
different classes ranging from Nursery 1 to final basic class (Those who are
set to move on to high schools). Bethesda Child Support Agency through this platform and other fundraising drive would love to put smiles on the faces of our children by ensuring a continuous education.

With your contribution;   
Hopes will be restored   
High level of illiteracy will be reduced
Child labour, child abuse, early marriage, rape and violence reduced.
Over population will be checked
National economic growth and development sustained.
A better and safer society for all

Each child requires the sum $130 (N30,000 - Nigerian Naira) to get enrolled for next session and a total of $13,000 for 100 children.

We have barely '60 DAYS' to achieve this...

Join us today and lets make it happen!

'The best way to find yourself is to lose yourself in the service of others' - Mahatma Gandhi.

Our Account Details are as follows;

Bank Name: Skye Bank
Account Name: Bethesda Child Support Agency
Naira Account Number: 1770005232
Dollar Account Number: 1771497939
Pounds Account Number: 1771480524

Bethesda
Child Support Agency was established in 2001 to provide quality education to
orphans and vulnerable children in poorest Nigerian communities. At Bethesda,
our primary aim is to create avenues for socio-economically disadvantaged
children to have access to quality education through contributions from the
public and private sector.Over the
years, Bethesda has provided free standard education, school supplies,
nutritional and health care to over 3,000 orphaned and vulnerable children
in Lagos and Ogun states, Nigeria. A good number of these children have completed their basic
education and are currently in high schools, while 4 have graduated from tertiary institutions.

story:
Trunks is your personal assistant in monitoring who enters your network.

What is "Trunks"?

Wanna know if your girlfriend is home?
Wanna know if anyone is in your house?
Tired of not knowing who is in your network?

Trunks can do this for you!
Trunks will inform you when a device enters your network through mail.


How does it work?

Trunks sees it when a device joins your network. It will send you a mail containing when and who joined your network. The script is wrapped in a Raspberry Pi for ease. This way you only need to plug it in and Trunks will do the work for you 

 
 


Trunks is a program written in Python-Scapy.
Trunks sniffs the DHCP vendor class identifiers of the DHCP packets. In the vendor class identifiers is listed what kind of device it is(not all devices have this) other devices will be reconized through MAC address' and the DHCP options.

Trunks will be shipped all around the globe for $125
It can be shipped with or without a WiFi Stick 150mhz.

**SPECIAL**:

We will built Trunks in the awesome mini Unix-based PC when it officially comes out!


Have a look at it here:

Click here to learn about C.H.I.P!


Specifications of Trunks:

10/100 Mbits USB adapter on the third/fifth port of the USB hub.
EDIMAX WiFi 150 Mbps wireless 802.11b/g/n nano USB Adapter(optional).
Broadcom BCM2835 SoC processor with 700MHz ARM1176JZF-S core
512MB RAM
microSD card slot
Videocore 4 GPU supports up to 1920x1200 resolution used for monitoring
4 x USB 2.0 ports, HDMI, audio/video jack, GPIO header, microUSB power port, DSI and CSI ports, 85.6x56mm

story:
Why Start A Program To Teach Software Development?

There's an overwhelming shortage of software development skills - web, mobile, gaming, enterprise, UX, UI, cyber security and more in the software industry. That translates to several thousands yet-to-be-filled tech job positions across the world and growing. You know why? Innovation happens in the software industry at a rate the school curriculum as we have it now..... simply can't catch up with! There is need for training programs specifically designed to remedy that skills gap.

Why Africa?

Talent is evenly distributed the world over, opportunity is not!

Most people in developing countries of the world are nearly completely excluded from the digital revolution due to inadequate learning resources, internet facilities and power supply, a phenomenon often referred to as the digital divide. Whereas right here in Africa lies the potential to supply in a cost-effective way most of the human resources needed to fill those tech job openings because there is an ever growing population of talented, motivated  and excited young men and women in developing countries, especially Africa.

Action Plan

Codetime Africa is an ambitious program that aims to bridge this divide by:-

      1. Starting a self-sustaining training center, Guardian Code School in select towns and cities across Africa, equipped with all resources necessary to teach software development - computers, robust internet access, power, etc.

      2. Strategically locate each Guardian Code School near a University or College especially one that offers Computer Science Programs.

      3. Provide regular 3-month, 6-month and year-long highly engaging training and certification programs.

      4. Connect our job-ready learners to industry partners for internships and employment as they qualify.

What We Need & What You Get

We need $25,000 for the pilot project. The funds will enable us to:-

      1. Get classroom space to accommodate 24 learners at a time, 12 in each classroom.

      2. Install hybrid backup power that includes solar.

      3. Buy 26 computers, 2 Projectors and a printer/scanner.

      4. Furniture and other classroom equipment.

      5. Mobilize our volunteer instructors and Guardian fellows.

Growth Plan

The pilot project is to start the premier Guardian Code School in Lagos Nigeria to be followed by Kumasi, Ghana, Johannesburg, South Africa, Yaounde, Cameroon and more

The Impact

  • Imagine the next generation of innovators that will develop the next wave of solutions and products using technology walk right out of Africa.
  • Imagine African youths and kids become producers of the computer games they play.
  • Youths we work with are already showing extraordinary aptitude with code on mini projects and that's inspiring.
It is our dream that in a near future, great software solutions, for instance, systems that will make the skies a safer place to fly and city transports systems that are highly efficient would come right out of Africa.

How Do I Support This Project?

Select a perk of your choice and prompt others in you social network to do so. Though we appreciate you backing this project in a big way, doing so in a little way as is convenient for you may be more effective to start supporting. To do so scroll down this page, select a perk, then prompt your friends to do the same using the share tools at the top left side of this page today. Thank you!

What You Get

We appreciate all contributions, big or small, from our backers and will update you as we put them to good use . To us, all contributions are a great way to show your love for humanity and for that you'll get rewarded in ways more spiritual than material.

Codetime Africa is a long term project and The Guardian Code School is going to be an ever-expanding computer education institution that we hope to outlive us founders, therefore there will be tons of promotional materials as we go from the launch of the premier code school, of which all our backers will get one or the other as perks throughout their lifetime.

The biggest reward for YOU and i, however is the sense of fulfillment that comes from being part of an initiative to serve humanity by bringing opportunity to talented African kids, some of who come from backgrounds where there are no means to support them or their talent is not recognized.

All founding contributors, corporate and institutional backers will have their names and photos/logo on a special founders plaque of honor at the entrance of the premier Guardian Code School, a printed plaque of honor at each Guardian Code School anywhere else in Africa and a virtual plaque of honor on our website. So this is a first hand opportunity to be part of something great done wholeheartedly for humanity.

Other Ways You Can Help

  • If you can't contribute but you believe in Codetime Africa, help us get the word out on our campaign by sharing it among all your social networks, friends and family using the share tools right on your left side of this page.

  • Feel free to let us know how you feel about our campaign - and if you have any questions at all we're happy to hear from you.

  • Remember....support and share the Codetime Africa project today. Thank you!
